https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: An automated meeting invitation email from Teamleader Focus with a meeting room link.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This image shows an example of an automated email notification sent to a participant. The footer contains a 'Powered by Teamleader' badge. This is relevant for users setting up meeting scheduling or virtual meeting rooms within the CRM.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The Meeting Rooms overview page in Teamleader Focus showing a grid of available rooms.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This screen shows the 'Meeting Rooms' management interface. At the top right, there is a teal button labeled 'Create a meeting room'. Below the header, there are filter tabs for 'Personal' (selected), 'Team', and 'All'. A search bar with the placeholder 'Search meeting rooms' is positioned in the center. To the right of the search bar, there are toggle buttons for grid and list views, with the grid view currently active. The main area displays three room cards: 'test-meeting-room', 'test-meeting-room-1', and 'test-meeting-room-2', all showing a status of 'Never opened' with a document placeholder icon.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The Statistics menu item in the Teamleader Focus sidebar navigation.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A close-up of the 'STATISTICS' navigation menu item. It features the word 'STATISTICS' in dark grey uppercase text next to a line graph icon showing an upward trend. The icon is highlighted with a red square border to indicate its location in the user interface.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Context menu showing 'Turn into primary' and 'Delete' options in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A close-up of a three-dot vertical ellipsis menu (highlighted with a red box) that has been clicked to reveal a dropdown menu. The dropdown contains two actionable items: 'Turn into primary' in blue text and 'Delete' in red text. This menu is typically used for managing secondary contact details or addresses within a CRM record.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Currency and exchange rate selection in a form with a warning for missing exchange rates.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A close-up of a form showing settings for Layout, Currency, and Exchange rate. The 'Layout' field is set to 'Default layout'. The 'Currency' dropdown is set to 'ARS - Argentine Peso'. The 'Exchange rate' dropdown is open, showing 'Custom' as the selected option while 'Preset' is disabled/grayed out. An information tooltip is visible, stating: 'This currency has no exchange rate defined in your currency settings.' This screen appears when a user selects a currency that hasn't been configured with a standard rate in the account settings.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Customizing the appearance of a 'Book a meeting' button with a color picker.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This interface shows settings for a call-to-action button, likely for a meeting scheduling feature. It includes fields for 'Button color' (hex code #362626), 'Button text color' (#ffffff), and 'Button text' ('Book a meeting'). A color picker pop-up is active, showing a gradient map, an eyedropper tool, a hue slider, and RGB value inputs (R: 54, G: 38, B: 38). Below the text field, there is an 'Icon' toggle switch set to 'on' (teal), a preview of a video camera icon, and a 'Clear icon' button. Supported file types for icons are listed as JPG and PNG.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Selecting a work type for a task in Teamleader Focus
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This image shows the process of assigning a work type to a task. A task titled 'Task 1' is listed with a checkbox. Below it, a user is typing 'Com' into a work type selection field, which is indicated by a paint bucket icon. A dropdown suggestion appears with the value 'PC11: Computer', and a mouse cursor is hovering over this option to select it. This demonstrates how to categorize tasks with specific work types for time tracking or reporting purposes.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Unavailable dates' section in Teamleader Focus with an 'Add dates' button.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A UI component from Teamleader Focus showing the 'Unavailable dates' collapsible section. It features a grey header with an upward-pointing chevron indicating the section is expanded. Inside the section, there is a white box containing a teal '+ Add dates' button, which allows users to specify periods when they or a resource are not available for scheduling or planning.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Invite User' dialog box in Teamleader Focus for adding new team members.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A modal window titled 'Invite User' used to add new users to the platform. It contains a message stating that each invited user reserves a seat and that permissions can be set later. The form includes three input fields: 'Email' (filled with anneliestest1@teamleader.eu), 'First Name' (filled with Annelies), and 'Last Name' (filled with Test). At the bottom right, there are two buttons: a white 'Cancel' button and a teal 'Send Invite' button with an envelope icon.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Deals across Phases' report showing a bar chart of deal volume and revenue by sales stage.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A comprehensive sales pipeline report in Teamleader Focus. The screen shows a bar chart comparing the number of deals (purple bars) and potential revenue (blue bars) across four phases: 01. New, 02. Contacted, 04. Quotation sent, and 05. Accepted. Top navigation includes buttons for 'Export to Excel', 'Restore', and 'Save as new report'. Filter options are visible for 'Chart and table' view, 'Group by Deal phase', 'Pipelines = Sales Pipeline', and 'Date added in last year'. There is also an '+ Add filter' button and a field to 'Add tag(s)'. The chart toggle allows switching between bar chart, line chart, time view, and summary statistics.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Browser compatibility table for Teamleader Focus features on Android smartphones.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A comparison table showing feature support across different mobile browsers on Android. Columns include: Android (smartphones), Audio & video sharing, Basic support, Screensharing, Co browsing, and Recording. Browsers listed are Chrome, Brave, Firefox, Opera, Edge, Safari, and Internet Explorer. Chrome, Brave, Firefox, Opera, and Edge show support for audio/video and basic features (with specific version requirements like >= 78 or >= 132) and 'Viewing only' for screensharing and co-browsing. Safari and Internet Explorer are highlighted in red, indicating no support for these features on Android. Recording is not supported on any listed Android browser.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Add time tracking' form in the Teamleader Focus mobile app for logging work duration.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A mobile interface for adding a time tracking entry. At the top, there is a 'Save' button. The 'Duration' section features a toggle between 'Log time' (selected) and 'Log specific hours'. It includes a 'Start date' field set to '28-06-2023' and numerical steppers for 'hours' (set to 1) and 'minutes' (set to 0). The 'General information' section contains selectable fields for 'Customer' (Choose customer), 'Task', and 'Work type' (Choose work type), followed by a multi-line 'Description' text box.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The User management settings page in Teamleader Focus showing active, invited, and deactivated tabs.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A screenshot of the 'Users' section within the Teamleader Focus Settings. The left-hand navigation menu shows 'Overview' and an 'ACCOUNT' category with options for 'Users' (selected), 'Teams', 'Vacation', and 'Integrations'. The main content area is titled 'Users' and features three tabs: 'ACTIVE 4', 'INVITED 1', and 'DEACTIVATED 1' (currently selected). Below the tabs, there is a search bar with the placeholder text 'Search on name, email'.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The Contact widgets overview in Teamleader Focus showing a created widget and its embed code.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This screen displays the 'Contact widgets' management interface. At the top right, there is a 'Create a widget' button. A specific widget titled 'Meet John Doe' is shown with options to delete (trash icon) or edit (pencil icon). The widget preview includes a 'Meet John Doe' button and a link to 'John Doe's booking page'. Below the preview, the 'USE CODE' section contains a script snippet for website integration. Two primary action buttons are highlighted at the bottom: 'Send to webmaster' (labeled with a 1) and 'Copy to clipboard' (labeled with a 2). This interface is used to generate and retrieve the code needed to embed meeting booking widgets on external websites.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Warning banner indicating that browser settings are blocking Teamleader Focus desktop notifications.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: An informational warning banner in Teamleader Focus with a light orange background and an 'info' icon. The text states: 'You have notifications turned on but your browser is blocking desktop notifications. Click here to give the necessary permissions. If desktop notifications still aren't working after giving your browser the necessary permissions, you can check out this help article.' It contains two hyperlinks: 'Click here' to trigger the browser permission prompt and 'this help article' for further troubleshooting.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The Recordings overview page in Teamleader Focus showing temporary local and cloud recordings.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This screen displays a list of meeting recordings divided into two sections: 'Temporary local recordings' and 'Cloud recordings'. A warning banner at the top advises that browsers may delete local recordings and recommends uploading them. The tables include columns for 'Created at' (date and time), 'Meeting room' (e.g., john-doe), 'Creator' (with avatar and name), 'Duration', and 'Size'. Each recording entry has a play icon button on the left. The 'Cloud recordings' section shows multiple entries with durations like 38m 30s and file sizes like 38 MB.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: JSON API response showing company details like name, status, and website in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A technical view of a Teamleader Focus API response with a '200 OK' status. The screenshot displays a JSON object for a company record, specifically 'A.F. Funeral Home'. Visible fields include 'id', 'status' (active), 'telephones' with a phone number, 'website', 'language' (en), and 'web_url' which links directly to the company_detail.php page in the Focus interface. It also includes timestamps for 'added_at' and 'updated_at', and a 'responsible_user' object containing a user ID. This view is typical for developers working with the Teamleader Focus API to manage CRM data.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Import dialog for customer data in Venice (Teamleader Focus integration)
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A dialog box titled 'Importeren - Klant' used for importing customer data from external files. The 'Identificatie' section shows file paths for 'Gegevensbestand' (.txt) and 'Beschrijvend bestand' (.cli). Action checkboxes include 'Vormelijk testen' (checked), 'Toevoegen' (checked), and 'Aanpassen' (unchecked). The 'Methode' is set to 'Stoppen bij de eerste fout'. A 'Vooruitgang' (Progress) tab is visible at the bottom with a progress bar showing 0/2 passes. Bottom buttons are labeled 'Importeren', 'Einde', 'Beschrijving', and 'Help'. This interface is part of the Venice accounting software integration with Teamleader Focus.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The Project billing methods dialog in Teamleader Focus for selecting available and default methods.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A dialog window titled 'Project billing methods'. It contains a section 'AVAILABLE BILLING METHODS' with three checked checkboxes: 'Time and materials', 'Fixed price', and 'Non-billable'. Below this is a dropdown field labeled 'Default billing method' which is currently set to 'Time and materials'. At the bottom right, there are two buttons: a white 'Cancel' button and a teal 'Save preferences' button. This interface allows users to configure which billing types are active for projects and which one is selected by default.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Link items to expense' dialog box in Teamleader Focus for assigning costs to projects.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A modal window titled 'Link items to expense'. It features three radio button options: 'Link full amount (€100,00)' (selected), 'Link partial amount', and 'Link document only'. Under the selected option, there is an orange info banner stating 'Selected customer will be added to Test for support centre project.' The form includes several dropdown fields: 'Link to' (set to Project), 'Project' (set to Test for support centre), 'Group' (set to Group: Parking), 'Project line' (set to Material: Parking), and 'Customer' (set to NV Teamleader). There is also a 'Description' text area containing 'This is an example description.' The dialog has two buttons at the bottom right: 'Cancel' and a teal 'Link items to expense' action button.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Edit planned time' dialog box in Teamleader Focus for adjusting task duration.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A small pop-up window titled 'Edit planned time'. It features a time input field currently set to '08' hours and '00' minutes with up/down arrows. Below the input is a 'Suggest time' link. A progress bar shows '08h00 (+02h00) / 10h00', indicating current time vs. total capacity. The dialog includes a trash can icon for deletion, a 'Cancel' button, and a teal 'Save' button. This is used for resource planning and task scheduling.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Teamleader Focus 'No host available' error message dialog
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A white dialog box with the Teamleader logo at the top. It displays the heading 'No host available' followed by the message: 'There is no host available right now. Please try again later or book a moment that suits you.' The phrase 'book a moment that suits you' is a blue hyperlink. This screen typically appears when trying to initiate a live support session or meeting when no agents are online.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The Availability settings section in Teamleader Focus for scheduling.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This image shows the 'Availability' step (numbered 2) in a setup or configuration workflow. It features a toggle switch to choose between 'Hours' and 'Calendar' views, with 'Hours' currently selected. On the right side, it displays the current 'Timezone' as 'Europe/Amsterdam' with a 'Change' button to modify it. This section is likely part of the Lead Capture or Meeting Scheduler configuration where users define when they are available for appointments.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Copy availability from' tool in Teamleader Focus settings.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A settings interface section labeled 'Copy availability from'. It features a dropdown menu currently selecting 'chris Jones', a blue 'Copy' button to apply that user's schedule, and a 'Reset to default' button on the far right to clear custom availability settings. This is used for managing user schedules and calendar availability.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The maintenance screen for configuring a payment condition in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This form allows users to define payment terms. Key fields include 'Code' (14), 'Description' (14 days + Direct Debit), and a 'Payment method' dropdown set to 'Direct debit'. Under the 'Due date' section, 'Number of days' is set to 14. The screen also features a 'Discount' section for setting early payment incentives and an 'Example' sidebar that calculates a sample due date and discount based on an invoice date of 08-03-2017. Action buttons at the top left include 'Save', 'Delete', and 'Close'.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Excel VLOOKUP (VERT.ZOEKEN) formula used for data preparation before importing into Teamleader Focus
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A screenshot of an Excel spreadsheet showing the Dutch VLOOKUP formula '=VERT.ZOEKEN($B3;Companies!$A$1:$F$2243;3;ONWAAR)'. This demonstrates a common data preparation step where users link data from different sheets (like a 'Companies' export) using a lookup value before importing the final file into Teamleader Focus. The formula tooltip is visible, showing the arguments: zoekwaarde, tabelmatrix, kolomindex_getal, and benaderen.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Configuration modal for adding an automatic reminder for an overdue invoice in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A dialog window titled 'Add an automatic reminder for an overdue Invoice' divided into three sections. 'BASIC SETTINGS' includes a dropdown for 'Send' (set to 0 days after invoice being overdue) and toggle switches for 'Send via email' and 'Send via postal service'. 'APPLY COSTS?' contains toggles for 'Apply late payment interest' and 'Apply fixed late fee'. 'PICK A TEMPLATE' features a 'Default template' dropdown and an 'Add extra language' button. A teal 'SAVE' button with a checkmark is located at the bottom right.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: A sample quotation document generated in Teamleader Focus showing layout and line items.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A preview of a professional quotation document. The layout includes a company logo at the top, followed by 'From' and 'To' address blocks containing contact details for the sender (Red Cross) and recipient (NV Teamleader). It displays document metadata such as 'Date' (26/09/2025) and 'Valid until' (05/06/2025). The document title is 'Quotation 2025 / 479: Quotation 500'. A line item table features columns for Description, Quantity, Unit price, and Total, showing two example items totaling €300,00 excluding VAT. The bottom of the page includes a signature area for both parties to agree to the content.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Colleagues attending' and 'Contacts attending' sections for managing event participants.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A UI snippet from a meeting or event page in Teamleader Focus. The 'Colleagues attending' section displays a list of internal team members, showing one user 'Eline' with a blue avatar. This section includes an edit pencil icon in the top right and a three-dot menu next to the colleague's name for further actions. Below, the 'Contacts attending' section features a plus (+) icon, allowing users to add external contacts to the meeting or calendar event.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Calendar connection screen for creating a personal booking page in Lead capture Booster.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This setup screen titled 'Create your personal booking page' allows users to sync their external calendar with Teamleader Focus. Under the 'Connect your calendar' section, there are four selectable buttons: 'Google', 'Office 365 - Outlook', 'iCloud', and 'Exchange'. The left-hand navigation menu shows this page is located under 'Scheduling' > 'Calendar settings' within the Lead capture Booster module. The interface includes instructional text about automatic availability calculation and specific login requirements for Office 365 and Outlook accounts.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: A public contact form powered by Teamleader Focus for lead generation.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A web-based contact form titled 'Contact marketing agency x'. The form includes three required input fields: 'First name', 'Last name', and 'Email'. Below the fields is a Google reCAPTCHA 'I'm not a robot' verification box. At the bottom, there is a black 'Send' button and a 'Powered by Teamleader' badge. The footer contains social media icons for Facebook, LinkedIn, and YouTube. This represents a lead capture form integrated with Teamleader Focus CRM.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Header of an invoice detail page in Teamleader Focus showing amount due and due date.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: The header of an invoice view (Invoice 2022 / 138). It displays the 'AMOUNT DUE' as € 875,00 with a 'View calculation' link, and the 'DUE ON' date as 29/10/2022. Action icons include a download (arrow down) button and a 'Send feedback' button. Below the header, there are navigation tabs for 'INVOICE' and 'CREDIT NOTE' with a notification badge showing '1'.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Project planning timeline view in Teamleader Focus showing task scheduling and resource allocation.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A view of the project planning tool in Teamleader Focus. It features a horizontal timeline with dates (Mo 20 to Su 2). The top row shows a project named 'Website Design' for 'Test AG' with a grey progress bar indicating the project duration. Below, a resource row for 'Charlotte_test' displays individual task blocks scheduled across the timeline. Some task blocks are highlighted in green, indicating active or planned work. A pop-over on the right shows details for a specific task 'Website Design' from 2017 Mar 24 with 'no estimate' listed.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Top navigation bar and project action buttons in Teamleader Focus
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: The image shows the top header and action bar of the Teamleader Focus interface. The top bar includes a search field, a '+' quick-add button, user/community icons, a help icon, a time tracker showing '00:00', a video meeting icon, and a user profile circle. Below this, there is a 'Need help?' link and a purple 'Request switch' button. On the right side of the main content area, there are view toggle buttons (list vs. board), an 'Export' button, and a teal 'Add project' button.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Resizing columns in a Teamleader Focus list view to reveal hidden data like Cycle time.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A close-up of a table header in Teamleader Focus showing the interaction for resizing columns. The user is hovering over the divider between the 'Title' and 'Cycle time' columns, indicated by a double-headed arrow cursor and an orange highlight on the divider line. The table includes columns for 'Title' (showing 'Offerte 17'), 'Cycle time' (showing '14w 1d'), and 'Date added' (showing '22-03-2024'). This demonstrates how to adjust column widths to view more information in a list or pipeline view.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Send invoice' dialog box showing the email configuration and signature selection.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This dialog box allows users to send an invoice via email. It includes fields for 'Sender' (dropdown), 'To' (email address), '+ CC', and '+ BCC' buttons. There is a 'Template' dropdown currently set to 'No template selected'. The interface also features a 'Subject' line, a large text area for the email body, an attached file 'Invoice 31.pdf', and an 'Add attachments' button.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Tooltip in the calendar view showing overtime tracked compared to the weekly schedule.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A close-up of the Teamleader Focus calendar interface. A blue progress bar under 'Tue 17' is being hovered over by a mouse cursor, triggering a tooltip. The tooltip message reads: 'You’ve tracked 0h56 more than is available on this day, according to your week schedule.' This illustrates how the software tracks time registration against a user's predefined work schedule, highlighting overtime in blue.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Info' section of an invoice in Teamleader Focus with the actions dropdown menu open.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Add Product' dialog in Teamleader Focus showing product info and pricing fields.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A modal window titled 'Add Product' used for inventory management. VAT)' with fields for Price (filled with '0,10') and a Unit dropdown (currently set to 'None'). There is a close 'X' icon in the top right corner.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Project work breakdown view showing time tracking, estimated time, and task completion status.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Email forwarding settings page in Teamleader Focus for redirecting emails to another account.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: The screenshot displays the 'Forwarding' section within the Email Settings of Teamleader Focus. On the left, a navigation menu shows 'Email' as the active category. The central pane lists sub-options where 'Forwarding' is highlighted. The main interface includes a checkbox for 'Enable forwarding' (checked), a text input field labeled 'Forward my emails to:' for entering a destination email address, and a checkbox for 'Keep a copy of forwarded messages' (checked). Action buttons 'Save' and 'Discard' are located in the top right corner.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Configuration form for linking a dossier and setting up an accounting integration, likely Octopus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This form shows the setup process for an accounting integration. It includes fields for 'Start date' (set to 26/12/2019), 'Username', and a masked 'Password' field. There is a teal button labeled 'LINK DOSSIER'. Below this, dropdown menus allow the user to select a 'Dossier' (selected: Teamleader CRM), 'Journal Invoices' (selected: V2: Verkoopsfacturen), and 'Journal Credit notes' (selected: V2: Verkoopsfacturen). A toggle switch is enabled for 'Import companies from Octopus'. The form concludes with 'BACK' and 'SAVE' buttons at the bottom.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The Merge contact dialog in Teamleader Focus for resolving data conflicts between two contacts.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A dialog window titled 'Merge contact' used to combine two contact records (Katrin Kirchmann and Katrin Kirchman). It displays a pink warning banner stating: 'The following fields contain conflicting data. Which values would you like to keep?'. The interface provides a side-by-side comparison for 'CONTACT 1' and 'CONTACT 2' across three specific fields: 'Last name', 'Email address', and 'Pricelist'. Users can see the differing values to choose which data to preserve. A teal 'MERGE CONTACT' button with a checkmark icon is located in the bottom right corner.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The text color picker dropdown in the Teamleader Focus document editor.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A close-up of the font color selection menu within a rich text editor. The menu includes an 'Automatic' option (black), a grid of 'Theme Colors' with various shades of blue, orange, grey, yellow, and green, and a row of 'Standard Colors'. At the bottom, there are options for 'More Colors...' and a 'Gradient' flyout menu. This interface is used when customizing text in templates, emails, or document descriptions.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Browser compatibility table for Teamleader Focus video meeting features.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A comparison table showing desktop browser support for various meeting features. Rows list browsers: Chrome, Brave (chromium), Firefox, Safari, Opera, Edge, and Internet Explorer. Columns list features: Audio & video sharing, Basic support, Screensharing, Co browsing, and Recording. Green cells indicate full support with version requirements (e.g., Chrome >= 78, Edge >= 131). Orange cells indicate limited support for Firefox and Safari in 'Co browsing' (Cooperate only) and 'Recording' (Viewing only). Red cells indicate that Internet Explorer is not supported for any feature.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Add segment' dialog in Teamleader Focus for creating a filtered list of companies.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This dialog shows the configuration for creating a new segment. Under 'GENERAL INFORMATION', the 'Name' field is filled with 'French companies' and the toggle 'Only I can see this segment' is set to 'YES'. Under 'SEGMENT RULES', the logic is set to 'All rules must apply'. 'Rule 1' is configured with three dropdowns: the first selects 'Country', the second selects 'Equals', and the third selects 'France'. There is a teal '+' button to add more rules and a trash icon to delete the current rule. This interface is used for filtering contacts or companies based on specific criteria.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Email notification from Teamleader Focus showing a ticket reference code at the bottom.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A screenshot of an email received from Teamleader Focus. The email is from 'Cast Away via teamleader.be' and contains a message from 'Charlotte Vanden Tester'. At the bottom of the email, a green arrow points to the 'Ticket reference' followed by a long alphanumeric tracking ID (e.g., #a0db5a8b-7218-41f3-8661-d32ff907dc00#). This reference code is used by the system to automatically link email replies to the correct support ticket in the CRM.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Selection field for an online meeting room in Teamleader Focus

Below the field, there is a blue 'Preview room' link with an external link icon, allowing users to test the meeting link configuration.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Your meeting rooms' dropdown menu in Teamleader Focus showing a list of available rooms.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A dropdown menu interface for managing meeting rooms. At the top, there is a 'Booking links' dropdown and a teal 'Start a meeting' button. Below the header 'Your meeting rooms', there is a search bar. The list includes several room names such as 'timmi-turner', 'will-do', 'miriam-daken', 'rik-riksen', 'bart-1', 'bart', 'jos-jansens', 'mircea-rednic', 'alain-vandam', and 'meeting-room-879'. At the bottom, there is a prompt 'None of these?' next to a teal '+ Add a new room' button.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Context menu for managing columns in a Teamleader Focus list view.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A dropdown menu triggered from a column header (labeled 'Customer') in a table. The menu options include: 'Sort ascending' with an up arrow icon, 'Sort descending' with a down arrow icon, 'Move left', 'Move right', 'Pin', and a final option 'Remove column' highlighted in orange with a trash can icon. This interface allows users to customize their data grid layout and sorting preferences.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Warning message in the 'Edit quotation' dialog regarding hidden unit costs and profit margins.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A header for a dialog box titled 'Edit quotation' with a close (X) icon. Below the header, a warning banner contains the text: 'This quotation contains unit costs for its items, to which you have no access. By editing this quotation you might be impacting its margin.' This indicates a permission-based restriction where a user can edit a quote but cannot see the underlying cost prices, warning them that changes could affect the calculated profit margin.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Company information header in Teamleader Focus with Trends Top integration and edit options.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A close-up of the 'Company information' section for a CRM contact. It displays a company logo placeholder with the initials 'TC', the company name 'Test company', and a Belgian VAT number (BE 0899.623.035). On the top right, there is a 'Trends Top' button for financial data integration, a pencil icon for editing the company details, and a vertical three-dot menu icon for additional actions.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: MailChimp integration setup screen in Teamleader Focus for syncing CRM contacts.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: The MailChimp integration settings page. It displays a header 'MailChimp' with the subtitle 'Sync your CRM contacts and companies to MailChimp.' Below, a text instruction explains that users must select a MailChimp audience list that has no existing subscribers. There is a dropdown field labeled 'Audience' with 'Teamleader' currently selected. Below the dropdown, it shows 'Linked account: None'. At the bottom, there is a teal 'SAVE' button. This screen is used for the initial configuration of the email marketing integration.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Total expected revenue widgets for March, April, and May in Teamleader Focus
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A horizontal row of three dashboard widgets showing 'Total expected revenue' for consecutive months. The first widget for March shows € 1.145,30; the second for April shows € 655,90; and the third for May shows € 500,00. Each widget includes a small question mark icon for help/information tooltips. This view is typically used for financial forecasting and sales pipeline tracking.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The Audience management view in Teamleader Focus showing contact actions like Archive and Unsubscribe.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This screenshot displays the 'Audience' management interface, specifically for an audience named 'ElineG'. It shows a list of contacts with columns for Email Address, Address, Phone Number, Birthday, Tags, Email Marketing status (shown as 'Subscribed'), Source ('Admin Add'), and Contact Rating. A contact is selected via a checkbox, and the 'Actions' dropdown menu is open, revealing options to Unsubscribe, Resubscribe, VIP, and Archive. Other visible UI elements include navigation tabs for Overview, Manage contacts, Add contacts, Subscriber preferences, and Settings, along with buttons for 'Toggle Columns' and 'Export Audience'.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Table of document signature shortcodes and their descriptions in Teamleader Focus
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A table showing three shortcodes used for document templates. The first column lists the shortcodes: DOCUMENT_SIGNATURE_AREA, DOCUMENT_SIGNATURES, and CLIENT_SIGNATURE. The second column provides their descriptions: 'Signatures', 'Names of the responsible person, client and their signatures', and 'The signature of the customer' respectively. This is used for customizing document layouts like quotations or invoices.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Add time tracking' dialog in Teamleader Focus after completing a task.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A modal window titled 'Add time tracking' that appears after a task is marked as done. It asks 'Do you also want to track time on this task?'. The interface shows a 'TIME TRACKING: 00H23' summary bar. Fields include: Project (Teamleader Tea: test van ma), Phase (Subtitle 1), Customer (Teamleader Tea), Billable (toggle set to YES), Start Date and End Date (17/06/2021), and Start and End times (09:02 to 09:25). There is a link to 'Edit description...' and a toggle for 'Add products' which is currently off.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: A card for a 'Meet the team' scheduling link in Teamleader Focus with meeting types and duration.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A UI card for a collective scheduling link titled 'Meet the team'. At the top left, there are three colored tags indicating meeting types: 'Online' (blue), 'Offline' (green), and 'Phone' (orange). To the right of the title is a red exclamation mark icon, likely indicating a configuration issue. Below the title is the description 'Book a meeting and meet the members of our team'. The bottom left shows a clock icon with '30 minutes' duration. The top right contains a 'Copy link' button and a three-dot menu icon. The bottom right displays avatars of team members involved, including two photos, one 'AD' initials icon, and a '+4' indicator for additional members.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: A table row showing a failed DNS record test result in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A table with two columns: 'Test' and 'Result'. The first row shows a red 'X' icon indicating a failure. Under the 'Test' column, it says 'DNS Record Published'. Under the 'Result' column, it displays the error message 'DNS Record not found'. This is typically seen during email domain verification or white-labeling setup.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Dialog box for creating or joining a meeting room in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A modal window titled 'Create or join a meeting room'. It contains two main fields: 'Meeting name' with an '(Edit)' link and a text input currently showing 'John-Doe' as a placeholder; and 'Meeting template' which features a search bar with a magnifying glass icon and the placeholder text 'Search a meeting template'. Below the search bar, two existing templates named 'Ui' and 'Test' are listed as options.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Add meeting' dialog in Teamleader Focus showing fields for customer, date, and online rooms.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A modal window titled 'Add meeting' used for scheduling calendar events. The form is divided into sections: 'CUSTOMER' with fields for Customer (search box) and Projects (dropdown); and 'DESCRIPTION' with fields for Title (required), Assign to (dropdown set to Ben Feldman), Date (16/09/2022), Start time (09:00), Duration (01:00), and Online meeting room. The 'Online meeting room' dropdown is open, showing options 'personalmeetingroom', 'test-meeting-room-2', and a '+ Create new meeting room' button. Other fields include a large text area for Description and a Location dropdown set to 'Virtual meeting'. A teal 'Save' button is located at the bottom right.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Microsoft Word settings for embedding fonts to preserve document fidelity.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A settings menu section titled 'Preserve fidelity when sharing this document' for a file named 'Document1'. It shows font embedding options: 'Embed fonts in the file' is checked. Underneath, 'Embed only the characters used in the document (best for reducing file size)' is unchecked, and 'Do not embed common system fonts' is checked. This is relevant for Teamleader Focus users when setting up document templates in Word to ensure layout consistency.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Add product' dialog in Teamleader Focus for creating a new quotation.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This screenshot shows the initial setup for adding products to a new quotation. At the top, there is a prompt 'Would you rather base your quotation on an existing one?' with a button labeled 'Use existing quotation'. Below this, there are two dropdown fields: 'Company entity' (currently set to 'Elinedemoaccount') and 'Layout' (currently set to 'Default layout'). This interface is used when a user starts the process of building a quote or proposal.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: A dialog box to enable Peppol for a company entity by confirming business details.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: The 'Enable Peppol for company entity' dialog window requires the user to confirm business information. It contains three text fields: 'KBO number' (filled with 0212643695), 'VAT number' (filled with BE0413773294), and 'IBAN' (filled with BE28 0960 0000 9620). Below the fields is a checkbox labeled 'I confirm that the information is correct.' At the bottom right, there are two buttons: a white 'Cancel' button and a teal 'Save and continue' button. This is part of the e-invoicing setup workflow in Teamleader Focus.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Add Type of call outcome' dialog box in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A modal window titled 'Add Type of call outcome' used for configuring call tracking settings. It contains three fields: 'Name' (a required text input), 'Type' (a required dropdown currently set to 'Incoming'), and 'Follow-up action' (a dropdown currently set to 'No action'). A teal 'SAVE' button with a checkmark icon is located in the bottom right corner. This interface allows users to define custom outcomes for phone calls to better categorize CRM activity.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Add contact' form in the Teamleader Focus mobile app for creating new CRM contacts.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A mobile interface for adding a new contact. At the top, there is a 'Scan business card' button. The 'General information' section includes input fields for 'First name', 'Last name' (marked as required with an asterisk), 'Date of birth' (with a calendar icon), 'Gender' (dropdown), and 'Language' (set to English). Below this is an 'Addresses' section with a link to '+ Add primary address'. The top navigation bar includes a back arrow, the title 'Add contact', and a 'Save' button.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Edit view of columns' dialog in Teamleader Focus for customizing list table columns.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This dialog allows users to customize which columns are visible in a list view, likely for invoices or subscriptions. It features two main lists: 'Available columns' on the left and 'Selected columns' on the right. Users can move items between lists using right and left arrow buttons. On the right, 'Booking number' is highlighted with a red box, and up/down arrow buttons allow for reordering the selected columns. The 'Selected columns' list currently includes: Number (detailed), Customer name, Total price without VAT, Date, Status, Last reminder (detailed), and Booking number. A teal 'SAVE' button with a checkmark is located at the bottom right.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The Expenses module header with a recurring icon in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A simple UI element showing the text 'Expenses' in a bold sans-serif font. To the right of the text is a grey circular arrows icon, which in Teamleader Focus indicates recurring expenses or a synchronization status within the financial management module.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Mapping VAT codes between Teamleader Focus and Exact Online integration
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A configuration form titled 'Link VAT codes to Exact Online'. It features nine dropdown menus for mapping specific sales tax categories to their corresponding codes in Exact Online. The categories listed are: Sales 0% VAT, Sales 6% VAT, Sales 12% VAT, Sales 21% VAT, Sales inside EU, Sales outside EU, Sales medecontractant, Sales inside EU services, and Alternative VAT rate. All dropdowns currently show the placeholder 'Choose...'. At the bottom left, there are two buttons: a white 'BACK' button and a teal 'SAVE' button.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Convert to project' dialog box with options to create a new project or use a template.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A modal window titled 'Convert to project' showing three selectable cards for project creation. The first card, 'Create new project', is currently selected with a teal border and checkmark. The other two options are 'Create from template' and 'Add to existing project'. At the bottom right, there are two buttons: a white 'Cancel' button and a teal 'Convert to project' action button. This interface is used when transitioning a deal or quotation into the project management module.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The header of an accepted quotation in Teamleader Focus with the 'Convert to invoice' button.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A detailed view of Quotation 257-1 with an 'Accepted' status badge. The interface shows key metadata including Customer (NV Teamleader), Company entity (Red Cross), Deal number (1), and Total excl. VAT (€ 1.000,00). Below the header, there are tabs for 'DETAIL', 'PREVIEW', and 'FOLLOW-UP'. A teal box highlights the 'Convert to invoice' dropdown button, which is located next to the 'Send quotation' action button. This screen demonstrates the workflow of turning a signed or accepted quote into a billing document.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Configuration screen for setting up a Webhook URL to POST form data in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This interface allows users to configure a Webhook for form data. It features a header titled 'WebHook: POST your form data to a URL' with a brief explanation and a 'Find out more' link. Below a dark grey banner asking 'What URL do you want us to POST your form data to?', there is a text input field labeled 'URL for POST:' containing a sample URL starting with 'https://www.teamleader.be/webhooks/'. This is used for integrating external forms with the CRM by sending data to a specific endpoint.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Set user rates' dialog box for configuring hourly billing rates per team member in a project.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A modal window titled 'Set user rates' used to define the hourly price for specific users on a project. It lists four users: Eline (€ 100,00/h), Justien (€ 103,00/h), Lander (€ 99,00/h), and Sara (€ 50,00/h). Each user has an editable currency input field. Below the list is an unchecked checkbox labeled 'Update all unbilled time trackings for this project.' The dialog includes a 'Cancel' button and a teal 'Save rates' action button.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Selecting OAuth 2.0 authentication for a Teamleader Focus API request in a debug tool.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: An API client interface showing a GET request to the Teamleader Focus companies list endpoint (https://api.focus.teamleader.eu/companies.list). The 'Auth' tab is active, and a dropdown menu is open with 'OAuth 2.0' highlighted by a cursor. Other authentication options in the list include Basic Auth, Digest Auth, OAuth 1.0, and Microsoft NTLM. The interface also shows tabs for Body, Query, Headers, and Docs, along with a purple 'Send' button. This is a typical step for developers setting up API integrations with Teamleader Focus.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The Audio/video settings dialog in a Teamleader Focus meeting room.

It includes dropdown menus for 'Choose microphone' (set to MacBook Pro microfoon), 'Choose speaker' (set to Externe koptelefoon), and 'Choose camera' (set to No camera active). There are buttons to 'Test your mic' and 'Test your speaker'. A toggle for '(BETA) Enable noise suppression' is switched on. On the right side, under 'Meeting room', there is a toggle for 'Private notes' which is enabled. The bottom of the modal contains buttons for 'Save as template' and 'Invite people'. The background shows the meeting interface with a bottom toolbar containing icons for Cam off, Mic on, Leave, Settings, Recordings, Invite, Raise hand, Chat, and Private notes.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Preferences menu showing toggles for automatic expense scanning and Teamleader Wallet usage.

The second toggle, highlighted with a teal rectangular border, is labeled 'Use Teamleader Wallet when free scans are used up' and is also switched on. Both options have a small information icon (i) next to the text.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Add Deal' form in Teamleader Focus showing Title, Customer, and Contact fields.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Pricing configuration dialog in Teamleader Focus showing three billing method options.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A 'Pricing' selection dialog window. It presents three distinct cards for choosing a billing method: 'Price per user' (currently selected with a teal border and checkmark), 'Price per work type', and 'Fixed price per hour'. Each option is accompanied by a representative icon. At the bottom, there is a 'Previous step' link on the left, and 'Cancel' and 'Save' buttons on the right. This interface is typically used when setting up project billing or financial preferences for services.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: A calendar event card in Teamleader Focus showing distance and task details.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A light blue rectangular UI element representing a scheduled task or calendar event. https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Meeting info header in Teamleader Focus with options to add work orders or create meeting reports.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: User permission settings for the Products module in Teamleader Focus.

'Products': Enabled (teal), allows managing goods, services, prices, and units. 2. 'Product editing': Disabled (grey), controls if a user can add, edit, or delete products versus just viewing them. 3. 'Unit cost visible': Enabled (teal), allows using unit costs on quotations to calculate margins or markups. This screen is used to define what specific users can see or do within the product catalog.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Mobile view of the Expenses list in Teamleader Focus with an 'Add expense' menu overlay.

The screen also features a search bar and tabs for 'All expenses' and 'To review'.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Onboarding screen for creating contact widgets in the Lead Capture Booster.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Add Pricelist' dialog box in Teamleader Focus showing calculation method options.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Meeting info section in Teamleader Focus showing details for a virtual meeting.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The quotation actions menu in a deal overview, highlighting the 'Rename' option.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Add materials to project' dialog box for tracking extra costs and margins in Teamleader Focus.

VAT), Quantity, and Subtotal. The first row shows an entry for 'Extra costs example' with a unit price of €1.000,00, a unit cost of €750,00, a margin of €250,00, and a quantity of 1. https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Browser site permissions for meeting.teamleader.eu with notifications and pop-ups set to Allow.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Internal cost and external price configuration fields in a user or project settings form.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Company entities settings page showing the action menu to deactivate or delete an entity.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: The screenshot displays the 'Company entities' management screen in Teamleader Focus. Two tabs are visible: 'ACTIVE' (currently selected) and 'DEACTIVATED'. The list shows several entities including 'test' (marked as Default), 'Red Cross', 'Peppol', and 'dutchentity'. For the 'Peppol' entity, a vertical ellipsis menu is open, revealing options: 'Disable Peppol', 'Set as default', 'Deactivate' (highlighted with a teal border), and 'Delete' (in red text). https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The CRM actions menu for companies, showing options to export, import, add, and bulk create tasks.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The Timesheets overview in Teamleader Focus showing time tracking stats and user selection.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Add bookkeeping tool email' dialog box in Teamleader Focus for expense synchronization.

It contains: 1) An input field for 'Bookkeeping tool email' (required). 2) A 'Company entity' dropdown menu (required). 3) An 'Auto sync to bookkeeping tool' dropdown, currently set to 'Never'. 4) A confirmation checkbox with the label 'I confirm that this is my bookkeeping tool email address'. The dialog includes 'Cancel' and 'Save' buttons at the bottom right.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Project info and work breakdown view in Teamleader Focus showing budget and phases.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: The screenshot displays the 'Project Info' tab of a project named 'New project' with an 'On track' status. It features two main cards: 'Details' (showing Title, Project number 150, Dates 06/11 - 13/11/2020, and Budget € 1.000,00) and 'Description'. Below these, a financial overview shows 'Budget Spent', 'Budget Provided' (€ 1.000,00), and 'Completed' percentage. The 'Work Breakdown' section includes buttons for 'Add phase' and 'Add task'. A specific 'Phase 1' is visible with columns for 'Budget spent', 'Budget provided', and 'Due date' (13/11/2020). Navigation options include 'Back to overview', 'Filters', and 'Budget' dropdowns.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Interface for editing a meeting template in the Teamleader Focus meeting room.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A screenshot of the Teamleader Focus meeting room interface while in 'editing a meeting template' mode. A teal banner at the top states 'You are editing a meeting template. Every action you perform in the meeting room will be automatically saved' with a button to 'Return to meeting template overview'. The main area features the Teamleader logo. A right-hand sidebar includes options for 'Whiteboard', 'Upload file...', 'Share screen', and 'Cobrowse', along with a 'Meeting notes' preview box. The bottom toolbar contains controls for 'Cam off', 'Mic off', 'Leave', 'Settings', 'Recordings', 'Invite', 'Raise hand', 'Chat', and 'Private notes'.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Add a new room' dialog box in Teamleader Focus
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A modal window titled 'Add a new room' with a close icon (X) in the top right. It contains a text input field for 'Room title' with the value 'new-meeting-room' entered. Below that is a dropdown menu for 'Start from template' with the selection 'Start from scratch'. At the bottom right, there are two buttons: a white 'Cancel' button and a teal 'Create' button.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: User capacity and time tracking overview showing daily tasks and weekly progress.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A UI component from Teamleader Focus showing a user's workload and time tracking status. On the left, a user avatar is surrounded by a progress ring with '29h30/40h00' displayed below, representing weekly capacity. On the right, a daily breakdown shows '8h /8h' with a full green progress bar. Two specific entries are shown: 'Translations' (Administration category) for 4h00 with a checkmark icon, and 'Design task' (Design category) for 4h00 highlighted in orange with a task icon. This interface is used for resource planning and monitoring billable or tracked hours.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Deal pipeline progress bar in Teamleader Focus showing the 'Quotation sent' stage.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A screenshot of a deal header titled 'Deal 254: Multiple quotations'. It features a pipeline progress bar with five stages: New (01/06/2021), Contacted, Meeting planned, Quotation sent (15/07/2021), and Accepted (13/07/2021). The 'Quotation sent' stage is currently highlighted. In the top right, there are status buttons for 'Open' (selected), 'Lost', and 'Won', alongside an orange trash icon for deletion. A 'Back' link is visible in the top left.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Alternative email addresses' settings page in Teamleader Focus showing how to manage emails.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This screenshot displays the 'Alternative email addresses' section within the user settings. It lists three email addresses with different statuses: one marked as 'Primary' with a blue badge, one verified gmail address, and one marked as 'Unverified' with an orange badge. A context menu is open for the second email address, highlighting the option 'Turn into primary' in a red box. Below it is a 'Delete' option in red text. At the top right, there is a '+' icon to add new email addresses. The text explains that these addresses can be used to send emails, invitations, and quotations.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Quick view pop-up of a Deal in Teamleader Focus with a 'View detail' link highlighted.

A close 'X' button is visible in the top right corner.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'External costs' section in a Teamleader Focus project with no costs linked.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A screenshot of the 'External costs' widget within a project module. It shows a header titled 'External costs' with a plus (+) icon on the right side for adding new costs. The main body contains the placeholder text: 'No external costs linked to this project.' https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Invoice header details in Teamleader Focus showing totals, origin, and bookkeeping status.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A detailed view of an invoice header in Teamleader Focus. It displays the following fields: 'Total excluding VAT' (€ 1.000,00), 'Total including VAT' (€ 1.000,00), 'Origin' (Manual), 'Payment reference' (+++030/1425/22048+++), and 'Bookkeeping status' (Not sent). https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Smart Segments navigation menu with 'Unassigned' highlighted
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A sidebar menu section titled 'SMART SEGMENTS' in Teamleader Focus. It lists four filtering options: 'Made by me', 'Open', 'Closed', and 'Unassigned'. The 'Unassigned' option is highlighted with a red rectangular border, indicating it as the focus of the tutorial or action. This menu is typically used to filter lists of contacts, companies, or tickets based on their assignment status.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Example of an invoice email sent from Teamleader Focus to a customer.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A preview of a standard invoice email sent via Teamleader Focus. The email includes a greeting 'Dear Customer', the invoice number (2022 / 32), the payment deadline (15/03/2022), and a closing signature. A thumbnail of the invoice is visible with a 'View this invoice' hyperlink that leads to the CloudSign platform. The bottom of the email features a 'Powered by Teamleader' footer.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Send invoice' dialog in Teamleader Focus showing how to add time tracking attachments.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A 'Send invoice 2022 / 30' modal window. It contains fields for 'Template' (set to 'No template selected'), 'Signature' (set to 'Tidal'), and 'Subject'. A large text area is available for the email body. At the bottom, there is an 'Add attachments' button which has opened a dropdown menu. The dropdown lists available files including 'Invoice 30.pdf', 'Time Tracking.pdf', 'Time Tracking.xlsx', and 'Invoice.pdf'. The time tracking files are highlighted with a red box to demonstrate how to attach time logs to an invoice email. There is also an option to upload a '+ File from your computer'.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Mobile app view of a company profile showing associated Deals and Files in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A mobile interface for the company 'NV Teamleader'. The screen is divided into two main sections: 'Deals' and 'Files'. The Deals section lists three entries: 'Offerte 100' (€ 4451.00), 'Project conversion' (€ 1.00) with a green 'Won' badge, and 'Quotation conversion to project' (€ 5690.00). There is a 'View all deals' link. The Files section shows three documents: two meeting reports and a text file named 'E-Mail-Vorlagen.txt' with their respective dates and file type icons. A floating action button with a '+' sign is visible in the bottom right. The bottom navigation bar includes Home, Timer, Search, and Menu.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Shortcodes for quotation name and deal title in Teamleader Focus
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A list of two shortcodes used for document automation or email templates. The first row shows '#QUOTATION_NAME' with the description 'Name of the quotation'. The second row, highlighted with a light grey background, shows '#DEAL_TITLE' with the description 'Name of the deal'. These placeholders are used to dynamically pull information into quotations and deals.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The drag-and-drop form builder interface for creating custom web forms in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This image shows the 'Form Elements' builder interface. On the left sidebar, there are three tabs: 'BASIC', 'PAYMENTS', and 'WIDGETS'. The 'BASIC' tab is active, displaying draggable elements like Header, Full Name, Email, Address, Phone, Date Picker, Appointment, Signature, Fill in the Blank, Product List, and Short Text. A green 'Send' button is at the bottom of the form. Options to '+ ADD YOUR LOGO' and '+ ADD NEW PAGE HERE' are visible on the canvas.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Introductory banner for Email Templates in Teamleader Focus
A 'Book a meeting' call-to-action section on a website featuring an 'About Us' description.

It features a large header 'Book a meeting with our team'. Below, the layout is split: the left side shows a photo of a smiling business owner in a pottery studio, and the right side contains an 'ABOUT US' text block describing the business's commitment to service in the San Francisco area. At the bottom right, there is a prominent teal button labeled 'Book a meeting' with a calendar icon, which likely links to the Teamleader Focus scheduling tool or a lead capture form.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Top navigation bar icons including presentation mode, focus mode, statistics, and user profile.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Time tracking overview showing daily progress bars for recorded hours.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A view of the time tracking feature in Teamleader Focus showing two daily entries: Monday, Aug 23 and Tuesday, Aug 24. Each row includes an expandable arrow, the date, a blue progress bar indicating tracked time versus the daily goal, and the numerical ratio (e.g., 3h00 / 8h00 and 6h00 / 8h00). On the far right of each row is a 'plus' icon button inside a stopwatch symbol, used to manually add time tracking entries for that specific day.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: A dialog box stating that a Chrome extension is required to start cobrowsing.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A modal window with the title 'Chrome extension required' and a puzzle piece icon. This is likely triggered when a user attempts to use the cobrowsing feature in Teamleader Focus without the necessary browser add-on installed.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: A single line item in a Teamleader Focus document showing product details and pricing.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Timeline entry in Teamleader Focus showing a refused Peppol invoice notification.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A screenshot of a timeline activity log. At the top, there is a 'Show all' dropdown menu. The specific entry is tagged with a grey 'Invoice' label and dated '31/10/2024 15:32'. The notification text states: 'Invoice 2024 / 2 was refused via Peppol.' followed by a Dutch message 'Uw factuur wordt verwerkt door onze boekhouding' (Your invoice is being processed by our accounting). There is a 'Read less' toggle link and a vertical three-dot options menu on the right. This image is useful for troubleshooting Peppol invoice delivery statuses.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The actions menu for a form in Teamleader Focus, highlighting the 'Edit form' option.

The dropdown menu includes options for: 'Preview form' (eye icon), 'Edit form' (pencil icon), 'Duplicate form' (copy icon), and 'Delete form' (trash icon in red). At the bottom of the menu, there is an 'Active' toggle switch set to the 'on' position (teal).

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Contact information widget in Teamleader Focus showing details for a contact named Carl Doe.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: A list of billable items in Teamleader Focus including tasks, meetings, and mileage.

The list includes a group header 'Website' with a dropdown arrow, followed by 'Task 4' and 'Task 8' (indicated by clipboard icons), a 'Meeting' (indicated by a calendar icon), and 'Mileage: Meeting' (indicated by a car icon and highlighted with a teal box). Each row has a checkbox on the left for selection. At the bottom, there is a '+ Add line' button to manually add new items to the list.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Dropdown menu for the 'Calculation' field with options 'Weighted' and 'Absolute'.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A close-up of a user interface element in Teamleader Focus showing a dropdown menu for the 'Calculation' field. The menu is expanded, displaying two options: 'Weighted' and 'Absolute'. 'Weighted' is currently highlighted as the active selection. This setting is used to determine how deal values are calculated in sales pipelines or reports, either by the full amount or weighted by the probability of closing.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Bulk action dialog in Teamleader Focus to change the deal phase for multiple deals at once.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A modal window titled 'Do action on 149 deals: Change deal phase'. It features a dropdown menu for selecting a new 'Phase' across different pipelines. The dropdown shows 'Sales Pipeline' options (New, Contacted, Meeting planned, Geplande call, Quotation sent, Accepted, Refused) and 'Pipeline 2' options (Nieuw, Offerte verzonden, Aanvaard, Geweigerd), with 'Aanvaard' currently highlighted. A pink warning banner at the bottom states: 'This action will be done on 149 deals from the segment 'Activity''. There is a 'Confirm action' toggle switch and a teal 'DO NOW' button with a checkmark icon.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Dropdown menu for file actions in Teamleader Focus showing the Delete file option.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A close-up of a context menu triggered by a three-dot vertical ellipsis button next to a date (01/09/2022). The menu contains four options: 'Download file', 'Send by email', 'Show history', and 'Delete file'. The 'Delete file' option is highlighted with a teal box and the text is in red, indicating it is the primary action being demonstrated for removing a document or attachment.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Planning preferences toggle for calendar integration impact
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A settings section titled 'Planning' containing a 'Preferences' card. Inside the card, there is a single toggle switch that is currently turned ON (teal color). The label for the toggle reads 'Calendar events from integrations affect planning'. This setting determines if external calendar events synced to Teamleader Focus should be considered when calculating user availability and planning.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Project details header in Teamleader Focus with settings dropdown menu open.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A screenshot showing the project header details and action menu. The header displays fields for Start date, End date, Billing method (set to 'Time and materials'), Price (€ 0,00), Cost (€ 0,00), and Price budget. On the top right, there is a 'Hide details' link and a vertical ellipsis icon that opens a dropdown menu. https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Teamleader Focus notification center showing a quotation viewed online via Cloudsign.

The specific message states: 'NV Teamleader viewed (1x) the quotation OPTION 1 of TEST on Cloudsign - 23/06/2021 16:55'. Other visible UI elements include the global search bar, the '+' quick-add button, user icons, a gift icon, a help question mark, a time tracker showing '00:00', and a user profile initial 'E'.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Mailchimp Audience dashboard showing a list of contacts with email addresses and first names.

The 'Audience' tab is active in the top navigation bar. Below the navigation, there are options for 'Filter by Tags', 'View Segment', and a 'New Segment' button. Two sample contacts are shown: 'test3@teamleader.eu' and 'test2@teamleader.be', both with the first name 'marie'. Each row has a checkbox for selection.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: General user permissions settings in Teamleader Focus showing calendar and export toggles.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A screenshot of the 'General' user permissions section. It includes several toggle switches and a dropdown menu. The 'Calendar' feature is enabled (toggle on), with 'Calendar access' set to 'Team only' via a dropdown. The toggle for 'Team members can see my agenda' is disabled (toggle off). The 'Dashboard' feature is enabled (toggle on). A teal box highlights the 'Export' setting, which is currently enabled (toggle on) and described as 'Allows user to export data from the account.' This interface is used to manage individual user rights for tasks, meetings, calls, and data exporting.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Introductory banner for CloudSign by Teamleader Focus.
The header section of the Teamleader Focus Dashboard with view toggles and action buttons.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: The top navigation bar of the Dashboard feature. It includes a toggle switch to choose between 'Personal' (currently selected in blue) and 'Team' views. On the right side, there is a notification bell icon, a 'Booking links' dropdown menu, and a prominent teal 'Start a meeting' button with a video camera icon. This interface allows users to switch between individual and team-wide data and quickly initiate scheduling or video calls.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Header of a support ticket in Teamleader Focus showing status, client, and timetracking.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: The header section of a support ticket (ID 7486773) titled 'Teamleader test'. It shows the ticket status as 'Open' in a grey pill badge. Key fields include: 'Client' linked to 'NV Teamleader', 'Assigned to' set to 'Sara', and 'Timetracking' showing '0h30 worked by: Eline'. In the top right corner, there is a pencil icon for editing and a three-dot vertical menu for more actions.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Vertical sidebar tab for 'Files' with a folder icon and a count of 77
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A dark blue vertical tab used for navigation within Teamleader Focus. It features a folder icon at the bottom, the word 'Files' written vertically, and the number '(77)' in parentheses at the top, indicating the number of documents or attachments associated with the current record.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Information banner stating that draft invoices will be booked when sent.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A horizontal orange information banner with brown text that reads: 'You're sending out draft invoices, these will be booked in the process.' This notification appears in Teamleader Focus when a user attempts to send an invoice that is still in draft status, informing them that the action will automatically finalize and book the invoice.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Notification showing an Octopus synchronization error in Teamleader Focus
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A notification popup titled 'SYNCHRONISATIE OCTOPUS'. It displays a sync icon and a blue circle with the number '1'. The message in Dutch states: '1 bedrijven werden geëxporteerd naar Octopus. Het dagboek V1 in Octopus is van het verkeerde type. Dit moet "verkoop boekingen" zijn, maar is "facturen".' This indicates a configuration error where the journal type in Octopus does not match the required type for the integration to function correctly.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Configuration settings for collecting payments when booking a meeting in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A settings card titled 'Collect payments' with the subtitle 'Set up a payment method for your meetings'. It features a checked checkbox labeled 'Require payment when booking a meeting'. Below this, there is an 'Amount' section with a numerical input field (marked with a teal circle '1') containing the value '25' and a currency dropdown (marked with '2') set to 'EUR'. At the bottom, there is a 'Payment terms' text area (marked with '3') containing the text 'Read more about our payment terms on our website.' This interface allows users to monetize their scheduling links.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Form for creating a calculated custom field to determine VAT amount using a formula.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This form shows the configuration for a calculated custom field in Teamleader Focus. It includes four main fields: 'Name' (required, set to 'VAT amount'), 'Description' (set to 'This formula calculates the VAT amount.'), 'Field type' (a dropdown set to 'Integer'), and 'Formula' (required). The formula field contains a calculation: 'Total including VAT - Total excluding VAT'. Below the formula box, a helper text indicates that users can type '@' to insert fields and use basic mathematical operators like +, -, *, /, and ().

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Error message stating a company cannot be deleted due to linked deals

It states 'Action done by Eline at 10/12/2019 16:34' and 'Action failed on 1 Companies.' The specific error message is: 'This company may not be deleted because there are linked Deals.: Funeral Home', where 'Funeral Home' is a clickable hyperlink to the specific company record.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Toggle switches for invoice automation settings: Book directly, Autosend invoice, and Direct debit.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A settings interface showing three automation options for invoicing in Teamleader Focus. 'Book directly' is toggled ON (teal). 'Autosend invoice' is toggled OFF (grey) and includes an information icon. 'Direct debit' is toggled ON (teal) and also includes an information icon. These settings control the workflow for processing and sending invoices automatically.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Action buttons for Invoices: Export, Invoice unbilled time, and Add Invoice.

From left to right: a white 'Export' button, a white 'Invoice unbilled time' button with a stopwatch icon, and a teal 'Add Invoice' primary action button. These buttons allow users to export invoice data, bill tracked time that hasn't been invoiced yet, or create a new manual invoice.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: A company contact row in Teamleader Focus showing Peppol verification status.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A single row from a contact or company list. It features a teal icon with the letter 'V', the company name 'Vinto', an email address 'vintotest@testcompany.com', and a VAT number 'BE0899623035'. On the right side, there is a status message in blue text that reads 'Not Peppol verified yet' accompanied by a small help icon.
