https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Company entities settings page showing Peppol integration status for different departments.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: The screenshot shows the 'Company entities' settings interface in Teamleader Focus. It lists two departments: 'Teamleader department 1' (marked as Default) and 'Teamleader department 2'. For Department 1, the Peppol integration section is expanded, showing 'Sending' as 'Enabled' with a Peppol ID (0208:0123456789) and 'Receiving' as 'Disabled' with a link to 'Activate receiving documents'. For Department 2, the Peppol integration is not yet active, displaying an 'Enable Peppol' button. Each entity row includes an edit pencil icon, a three-dot menu, and a progress bar indicator. A plus (+) icon is visible at the top right to add new company entities.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: macOS System Settings for Safari browser notifications and alerts
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A screenshot of the macOS 'Notifications & Focus' settings panel specifically for the Safari browser. The 'Allow Notifications' toggle is switched on. The 'Safari alert style' is set to 'Alerts'. Several checkboxes are enabled: 'Show notifications on lock screen', 'Show in Notification Center', 'Badge app icon', and 'Play sound for notifications'. The 'Show previews' dropdown is set to 'always' and 'Notification grouping' is set to 'automatic'. This image is used to guide Teamleader Focus users on how to enable browser-level notifications to ensure they receive platform alerts.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Project settings toggle switches for financials and costs in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A settings interface under the 'PROJECTS' header. It features three hierarchical toggle switches, all currently enabled (teal color). The main toggle is 'Projects', with a description: 'Create customer projects from scratch or quotation. Invoice projects according to progress.' Nested underneath are two sub-settings: 'Show financials on projects' and 'Show costs on projects'. This screen allows users to enable project management features and control the visibility of financial data and cost tracking within the projects module.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Meeting Types overview in Teamleader Focus showing booking link options and meeting cards.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: The Meeting Types interface displays a card for an 'Online meeting' (30 minutes) with a share icon highlighted. Navigation filters include 'Hosted by me' and 'All'. Action buttons at the top right include 'Bulk update settings', a 'Booking links' dropdown menu, and 'Create new'. The 'Booking links' dropdown is open, showing options: 'Copy personal booking link', 'Copy personal embedded HTML', 'Copy team booking link', and 'Copy team embedded HTML'. This screen is used for managing scheduling links and meeting templates.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Configuration window for the Winbooks Linker integration in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A screenshot of the 'Winbooks Linker' desktop application interface used for syncing Teamleader Focus with Winbooks accounting software. The 'Eigenschappen' (Properties) tab is active. Top navigation buttons include: Verbinding (Connection), Opslaan (Save), Taal (Language - set to French flag), and Verlaten (Exit). The UI is divided into three sections: 'Gebruiker/Bedrijf' with fields for Gebruiker (SYSTEM), Wachtwoord (Password), Bedrijf (TLDEMO), and Boekjaar (Bkj 2014); 'Bedrijf' showing the company name (PARFILUX S.A.) and directory path; and 'Informatie' which includes dropdowns for Defaultperiode and Formaat van het (TXT Bestanden), plus a Werkdirectory path field. Other tabs visible but not selected are Bewerkingen, Verwittigingen, Ernstige fouten, Oplossingen, and Divers.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Global search results in Teamleader Focus showing matches across deals, companies, and projects.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A screenshot of the global search interface in Teamleader Focus. The search query 'Hubo' has returned 50 results. The interface features tabs to filter results by category: All (50), Deals (37), Tickets (5), Companies (3), Invoices (3), Projects (1), and Meetings (1). A 'Sort' dropdown is set to 'Most relevant'. The results list displays various items including 'Deal 713: Teamleader', the company 'hubo', 'Meeting Hubo <> Us', and 'Project 130: Blog Hubo DIY'. Each entry shows relevant metadata like creation date, status (e.g., Open, Won, Active), and associated values or dates.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Activities timeline in Teamleader Focus showing an incoming invoice added via Peppol.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A screenshot of the 'Activities' section in Teamleader Focus. It features an '+ Add note' button at the top. Below, a dropdown filter is set to 'Show all'. The timeline displays an entry with a teal invoice icon and a label 'Incoming invoice'. The text states: 'Incoming invoice 2024 / 7 - Test Company was added via Peppol.' A timestamp '22/11/2024 15:57' and a vertical three-dot menu icon are visible on the right side of the activity entry.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Add Custom field' dialog box in Teamleader Focus for creating a new product field.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A modal window titled 'Add Custom field' with several configuration options. The 'Name' field is filled with 'Description ES'. The 'For' dropdown is set to 'Product'. The 'Group' field is set to 'Translation'. The 'Type' dropdown is set to 'Multiline text'. There is a toggle switch for 'Required field' which is currently set to off (gray). A teal 'SAVE' button with a checkmark icon is located at the bottom right.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: API request and JSON response showing custom field definitions in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A screenshot of an API client (like Postman or Insomnia) demonstrating how to retrieve custom field IDs. The top bar shows a POST request to 'https://api.teamleader.eu/customFieldDefinitions.list' with a 'Send' button. The right pane shows a '200 OK' response with a JSON body containing an array of custom field objects. Each object includes 'id', 'context' (e.g., meeting, sale, company), 'type' (e.g., single_line, date), and 'label'. Red boxes highlight the URL and the specific UUIDs for each custom field, which are necessary for API integrations and webhooks.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Dropdown menu for selecting a 'Current audience' in a marketing or contact integration.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A UI element showing the 'Current audience' selection process. The dropdown is currently set to 'Potted Planter Staff'. The open menu displays alternative audience options: 'Potted Planter Fans and Customers' (692 contacts) and 'Potted Planter People' (5 contacts). At the bottom of the list, there is a clickable link labeled 'View audiences' with a mouse cursor hovering over it. This is likely part of a Mailchimp or email marketing integration within Teamleader Focus.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: HTML code snippet for a 'Book a meeting' button using a Vectera booking link.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A screenshot of a code editor showing HTML for a call-to-action button. The code includes a div container and an anchor tag (<a>) with the text 'Book a meeting'. The link points to a Vectera booking URL (vectera.com/book/...). The anchor tag is styled with CSS to appear as a button with a black background (#000000), white text (#FFFFFF), 10px 20px padding, and a 5px border radius. This snippet is used for setting up meeting scheduling integrations or custom email signatures within Teamleader Focus.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The configuration form for creating or editing an email template for quotations in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This interface allows users to set up an email template for sending quotations. It includes fields for 'Template name' (set to 'Default text'), 'Subject' (using the placeholder 'Offer #QUOTATION_NAME'), and a 'Language' dropdown (selected as 'English'). There is a blue '+' button for adding 'Attachments'. The 'Email content' text area contains a message with dynamic placeholders like #LINK, #MY_NAME, and #DEPARTMENT_NAME. The header is teal with a gear icon and a close 'X' button.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Customization settings for the Customer Meeting add-on in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This screenshot shows the 'Customization' section within the Customer Meeting add-on settings. On the left, a navigation sidebar displays options for Dashboard, Scheduling, Meeting rooms, Contact widgets, and Settings. Under the 'Settings' dropdown for 'DESK2010', the 'Customization' tab is highlighted in teal. The main panel on the right allows users to configure visual elements: 'Waiting room background' (currently showing a nature landscape with a waterfall), 'Meeting room background' (showing a handshake icon), and a partially visible 'Camera background image' section. Each setting includes an information icon for additional context.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Financial summary showing unit cost, margin, and VAT totals for a quotation or invoice.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A financial breakdown section in Teamleader Focus. On the left, it displays 'Total unit cost' (€750.00) and 'Total margin' (€250.00) with a percentage (25%). On the right, it shows the tax calculation: 'Total excl. VAT' (€1,000.00), 'VAT 21%' (€210.00), and the final 'Total incl. VAT' (€1,210.00). This view is typically used to see profitability and tax totals on a deal, quotation, or invoice.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Bulk actions menu for managing multiple incoming invoices and receipts in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A screenshot showing the bulk action bar in a list view where 10 items are selected. The action bar includes buttons for 'Mark as approved 3', 'Send to bookkeeper 7', 'Mark as paid 6', and a red 'Delete 10' button. A dropdown menu is open, showing additional options: 'Mark as refused 9' and 'Mark as pending 8'. The table below shows rows for 'Incoming invoice' and 'Receipt' with status badges like 'Approved' and 'Pending'. This interface is used for batch processing financial documents.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Upcoming meetings' table in Teamleader Focus showing scheduled appointments.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A table widget titled 'Upcoming meetings' displaying a list of scheduled events. The table includes columns for: 'Meeting with' (showing attendee initials JD, JD, A, the name 'john doe', and the time 'Tomorrow, 12:30–13:00'), 'Meeting Type' (set to 'Online meeting'), 'Type' (indicated by a blue 'Online' badge with a camera icon), 'Duration' (30 minutes), and 'Location' (a clickable link 'john-doe' with a camera icon). A three-dot vertical menu icon is visible on the far right of the row.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Project health dashboard showing budget, time, unbilled amounts, margin, and pending work metrics.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A detailed view of the 'Project health' widget in Teamleader Focus. It displays six key performance indicators (KPIs) for a project: 1. Budget remaining (€ 81,67 / 7%), 2. Time budget remaining (-00h40 / -17% with a red warning icon indicating an overage), 3. Amount unbilled (€ 1.143,33 / 100%), 4. Margin (€ 1.050,00 / 92%), 5. Pending work (100%), and 6. Cost budget remaining (€ 6,67 / 7%). Each section includes a 'View more details' link and a breakdown of figures such as total price, cost, budget spent, and time tracked. A settings gear icon is located in the top right corner of the widget.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Selecting a Teamleader Focus trigger or action in a Make (formerly Integromat) automation scenario.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This screenshot shows the process of building an automation scenario in Make using the Teamleader Focus integration. A large blue '+' button is highlighted, which opens a sidebar menu of available modules. Under the 'COMPANY' category, options include: 'Watch Companies' (Instant/ACID trigger), 'Watch Companies Updated' (ACID trigger), 'List Companies', 'Create a Company', 'Get a Company', 'Update a Company', and 'Delete a Company'. Under the 'CONTACT' category, 'Watch Contacts' is visible. The interface includes a 'Run once' button and a 'New scenario' title, demonstrating how to set up triggers and actions for CRM data synchronization.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Comparison of screen sharing options in Vectera with and without the browser extension.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A side-by-side comparison showing how screen sharing appears in Vectera (integrated with Teamleader Focus). On the left, 'With extension' shows a simplified dropdown menu with options: 'Full screen', 'App window', and 'Browser tab'. On the right, 'Without extension' shows the standard browser dialog 'Choose what to share' from meet.vectera.com, featuring tabs for 'Entire Screen', 'Window', and 'Chrome Tab', along with 'Cancel' and 'Share' buttons. This illustrates the UI improvement when using the dedicated browser extension for online meetings.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Customizing the layout of a company or contact detail page by hiding or reordering widgets.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This interface allows users to customize their view of a detail page in Teamleader Focus. It shows a list of draggable widgets including Quotations, Deals, Open calls, Linked companies, Linked contacts, and Meetings. Each widget has an eye icon on the right to toggle visibility; a cursor is shown clicking the eye icon on the 'Deals' widget to hide it. At the top, there are options for 'Company information' with a 'Full width' toggle, 'Background information', and action buttons: 'Restore default view', 'Cancel', and 'Apply changes'. A small note indicates that changes will only be applied to the current user's view.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Items on the credit note' form in Teamleader Focus showing line items and the save button.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Configuration settings for the Exact Online integration in Teamleader Focus.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Company information and background information widgets in a Teamleader Focus CRM company profile.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The Custom CSS dialog box in Teamleader Focus for document template styling.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A modal window titled 'Custom CSS' used for advanced template customization. The dialog includes a link to 'Visit our knowledge base' for more information. At the bottom right, there is a teal 'Save' button. The header is teal with a white 'X' close icon.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Items on the quotation' section in Teamleader Focus for adding products and pricing.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This screenshot shows the line item editor for a quotation. https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Markdown formatting for links in Teamleader Focus with a live preview

A status message at the top reads 'The meeting host is not present' with an information icon.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: A progress bar tooltip in Teamleader Focus showing task status breakdown.

This visualization helps users quickly see the distribution of tasks within a specific project or phase.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The Info widget of an invoice in Teamleader Focus showing Peppol status and payment actions.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The Quotations widget in a detail view with the visibility icon highlighted.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Contact page for booking a 60-minute online meeting with a Teamleader Focus representative.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: A success message dialog stating 'The upload was successful' with a green checkmark icon.

It features a large green checkmark icon inside a circle at the top, followed by the text 'The upload was successful' in a dark grey font. https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Calculate markup' dialog box for a product in Teamleader Focus.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Microsoft Word interface for editing custom document templates for Teamleader Focus
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A screenshot of the Microsoft Word desktop application, which is used to create and edit .docx templates for Teamleader Focus documents like invoices and quotations. The 'Home' tab is active, displaying the ribbon with font settings (Calibri, size 11), paragraph options, and the Styles gallery (Normal, No Spacing, Heading 1, etc.). https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Project budget overview showing budget spent, budget provided, and completed tasks.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Selecting 'Create Company' as a step in a Zapier or automation workflow for Teamleader Focus.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Setting the number of additional invitees for a guest in Teamleader Focus.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The quotation action menu in Teamleader Focus with 'Mark as accepted' highlighted.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The quotations overview list in Teamleader Focus, highlighting the 'Valid until' column.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Project management filter cards showing counts for open phases and work items.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The header of the Invoices module in Teamleader Focus with the 'Add Invoice' button highlighted.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This image shows the top navigation and action bar of the Invoices section. It features a large 'Invoices' title. https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: General settings section for contact form images with a link to team settings.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: How to unpin a column in a Teamleader Focus list view

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Project list view filters and search bar in Teamleader Focus
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A close-up of the project management interface showing filtering options. https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Action icons in Teamleader Focus: a teal checkmark for saving and a trash can for deleting.

From left to right: a teal square button with a white checkmark (Save/Confirm), the teal Teamleader Focus origami bird logo, and a dark grey trash can icon (Delete/Remove).

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Find and Replace dialog box showing a search for 'England' to be replaced with 'EN'.

Action buttons at the bottom include 'Replace All', 'Replace', 'Find All', 'Find Next' (highlighted), and 'Close'. There is an 'Options >>' button for advanced search settings. This interface is used for data cleaning, such as standardizing country names or codes in a list.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The screensharing interface within a Teamleader Focus meeting room.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A screenshot of the Teamleader Focus meeting room interface while a user is sharing their screen. The main viewport displays a browser window showing the Teamleader blog. On the right sidebar, collaboration tools are visible: 'Whiteboard', 'Upload file...', 'Stop screensharing', and 'Cobrowse'. The bottom toolbar contains meeting controls: 'Cam off' (orange), 'Mic off' (orange), 'Leave', 'Settings', 'Recordings', 'Invite', 'Raise hand', 'Chat', and 'Private notes'. https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Configuration screen for invoice journal settings in an accounting integration.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Empty state of the Profit & loss section in a Teamleader Focus project.

The body text reads: 'This project doesn’t contain billables or costs yet. Track time or add materials to get real-time profit insights.' https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'To review' section in Teamleader Focus showing a document card for an invoice.

The card features a 'New' badge, a placeholder thumbnail for the document, a selection checkbox, and a blue 'Review' action link at the bottom.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The quotation action menu in Teamleader Focus with 'Mark as refused' highlighted.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A close-up of the quotation management interface. The dropdown menu is open, showing several options: 'Mark as sent' (greyed out), 'Mark as accepted', 'Mark as refused' (highlighted with a teal box), 'Remove from CloudSign', 'Preview on CloudSign', and 'Copy link'. In the background, a line item table shows 'Unit price' (€ 1,00), 'Quantity' (1), and 'VAT' (21 %).

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Project phase budget forecast table showing spent vs. provided amounts and budget status.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A detailed view of the 'Phase budgets' section in Teamleader Focus. At the top, a green checkmark banner displays a forecast: 'with 1h00 of work remaining, this project will stay € 1.400,00 under budget'. Below, a table lists two phases: 'Phase 1' and 'Phase 2', both with 'Fixed price' billing methods. Phase 1 shows €400,00 spent out of €3.000,00 provided with a green progress bar and a checkmark forecast of €600,00. Phase 2 shows €3.000,00 spent out of €2.000,00 provided, marked with an orange warning bar and an exclamation icon, indicating it is over budget. A red pill notification reads '1 Fixed price phase over budget'.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Using the 'Text to Columns' feature in Excel to prepare data for Teamleader Focus import
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A screenshot of Microsoft Excel showing how to split data before importing it into Teamleader Focus. The 'Data' tab is selected in the ribbon. The 'Text to Columns' button is highlighted with a red box. A tooltip explains that this feature splits a single column of text into multiple columns, such as separating full names or handling comma-separated values. Below the ribbon, a spreadsheet shows an 'Email address' column where one cell contains two email addresses separated by a comma (sales@jandj.uk,office@jandj.uk), demonstrating a common scenario where this tool is needed for data cleaning.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Email notification for a booked meeting via Teamleader Focus Lead Capture Booster.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: An automated email notification sent to a user when a meeting is booked through the scheduling tool. The email includes: a greeting ('Hi my name'), the name of the person who booked ('John Doe'), the meeting type ('30 minute online meeting'), a description of the meeting's purpose, the date and time ('Monday 1 May 2023 - 10:30 a.m.'), the duration ('30 minutes'), and a location link for the online meeting room. It also mentions compatible browsers (Chrome, Firefox, Safari, or Edge) and has a section for 'Participants'.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Form editor for creating a multiple-choice question with a real-time preview.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A configuration screen for adding a question to a form or survey. The left side contains editable fields: 'Question' text box with 'Which features do you need?', a 'Type' dropdown set to 'Multiple selection', and a list of options (Projects, CRM, Quotations, Online meeting rooms, Scheduling, Other...) each with a delete icon. There is an 'Add an option...' field and a checkbox for 'An answer is required'. The right side shows a 'PREVIEW' of how the checkboxes will appear to the user. Action buttons at the bottom right are 'Cancel' and 'Save question'.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Confirmation dialog for removing the Project management Booster from a Teamleader Focus account.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A modal window titled 'Remove Project management'. It contains a warning box stating that the Booster will be removed on the next renewal date (08/02/2025) and data will be permanently deleted, with a link to 'export the data'. It lists features that will be lost: Flexible project management, Work breakdown in projects in groups & tasks, and Project budget management & post calculation. At the bottom, there is a checked checkbox with the label 'I understand what will happen to my data when I proceed' and an orange 'Confirm' button.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Step 3 of the booking page setup in Teamleader Focus for adding meeting type templates.

Each template includes a plus icon to add it to the booking page. Navigation buttons at the bottom are labeled 'Go Back' and 'Continue'. This step allows users to define the duration and location (Online or Offline) of meetings customers can schedule.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Weekly timesheet view in Teamleader Focus for tracking billable hours across projects and contacts.

Time is entered in HH:MM format using increment/decrement arrows. For 'NV Teamleader', 2 hours are logged on Tuesday and Wednesday. For 'Jeroen De Wit', 8 hours are logged on Wednesday, 2 on Thursday, and 3 on Friday. The current day (Thursday 19) is highlighted with a blue circle.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Add a new room' dialog box for creating a meeting room in Teamleader Focus.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Send quotation' dropdown menu in Teamleader Focus with 'Remove from CloudSign' highlighted.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Setting the bookkeeping tool email for syncing expenses in Teamleader Focus.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Financial calculation widget showing cash forecast and payment statuses in Teamleader Focus.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Project planning view showing project name, dates, and timeline bar

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Kanban board view of the Deals pipeline in Teamleader Focus showing deal stages and values.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: The Deals overview page in Kanban (pipeline) view. It displays four columns representing deal stages: 'NIEUW' (New), 'OFFERTE VERZONDEN' (Quotation sent), 'AANVAARD' (Accepted), and 'GEWEIGERD' (Refused). Each column shows the number of deals and their total value. Individual deal cards display the customer name (e.g., Bill Gates, Apple, Teamleader), deal description, value, probability percentage, and owner initials. Top navigation includes a search bar, pipeline selector (set to 'Pipeline 2'), status filter, user filters, date filters, an 'Export' button, and a green 'Add deal' button. The view toggle allows switching between list and board view.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Add Project' dialog in Teamleader Focus showing project template and planning options.

Under the 'PROJECT' section, it includes fields for Project title (required), Customer (searchable dropdown), Template selection, Start date, Budget planning, and Assigned to. A tooltip is visible explaining the difference between forward planning (picking a start date) and back-planning (picking an end date) when using a project template. The 'Pick end date (back-planning)' option is selected in a dropdown, with a date field showing '17/08/2021'. The 'Assigned to' field is pre-filled with 'Eline'.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: List of shortcodes for document templates in Teamleader Focus
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A table showing document template shortcodes and their corresponding meanings under 'THE DOCUMENT' section. The left column lists the shortcode variables, and the right column provides the description. Key shortcodes shown include: SALE_TITLE (Title), SALE_NUMBER (Number), SALE_TITLE_DETAILED (Title+Number), QUOTATION_PO_NR (PO number), DATE (Date), VALID_UNTIL_DATE (Expiry date - highlighted with a teal box), and QUOTATION_TEXT (Introduction text). This is used for customizing document layouts like quotations or invoices.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Form to create or edit a custom question in Teamleader Focus with a preview pane.

On the right, a 'PREVIEW' section shows how the question will appear to users. Action buttons at the bottom right are 'Cancel' and 'Save question' (highlighted in teal).

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Selection screen for invoicing project phases and compensating advance invoices.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: A list of project items in Teamleader Focus showing tasks and a meeting placeholder warning.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Configuration screen for creating and customizing a website contact widget button.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: The 'Contact widget' setup page in Teamleader Focus. https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Excel VLOOKUP (VERT.ZOEKEN) formula example for linking data between sheets during import preparation.

Below the formula, the Excel syntax tooltip is visible, displaying the arguments: zoekwaarde, tabelmatrix, kolomindex_getal, and [benaderen]. This is typically used when preparing a CSV or Excel file for import into Teamleader Focus to link contacts to existing companies using a unique identifier.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The time tracking dropdown menu in the Teamleader Focus top navigation bar.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: A digital signature on a Teamleader Focus document with a timestamp and IP address.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The Microsoft Excel Options dialog box showing the Trust Center settings tab.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Chrome browser dialog for sharing a tab during a Teamleader Focus Customer Meeting.

The header text says 'Customer Meetings wants to share the contents of your screen with cloud.staging.teamleader.eu.' It lists three available tabs: '~~~~~~~ SELECT THIS TAB TO START RE...', 'Helpdesk : Teamleader', and 'Teamleader Focus'. The 'Helpdesk : Teamleader' tab is currently highlighted. On the right, a preview area says 'Select a tab to share'. At the bottom right, there are two buttons: a blue 'Cancel' button and a greyed-out 'Share' button. This is part of the screen-sharing workflow within the Customer Meetings feature.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Invoicing preferences dialog in Teamleader Focus showing Peppol configuration options.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A modal window titled 'Invoicing preferences' used for configuring customer-specific billing settings. The form includes: 'Send invoices to' dropdown (set to Automatic), a highlighted section for 'Send invoices via Peppol to' (set to Other), a 'Prefix' dropdown (set to 0208 (KBO)), and an empty 'Peppol identifier' text field. Below this are dropdowns for 'Payment terms' (empty) and 'Currency' (set to EUR - Euro). At the bottom are 'Cancel' and 'Next step' buttons. This screen is essential for setting up e-invoicing via the Peppol network for specific contacts or companies.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'three dots' or 'more actions' menu icon highlighted in a list view.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This image shows two rows from a list in Teamleader Focus. The first row displays 'Company website' with 'Teamleader' underneath. The second row shows a contact 'Bart Heyndrickx' with the title 'Developer'. On the far right of each row, a grey 'three dots' (hamburger/list) icon is circled in red, indicating where a user should click to access more actions or options for that specific record.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Financials section in Teamleader Focus showing billing method, price, and linked expenses.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A detailed view of the 'Financials' section for a project or task. It shows the 'Billing method' set to 'Unit price' with a 'Quantity' of 1. The 'Price' is currently € 0,00. There are clickable options to add '+ Unit price' and '+ Budget'. The 'Cost' field shows € 1.000,00. Help icons (question marks) are present next to Billing method, Budget, and Cost for additional information.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The header of a quotation detail page in Teamleader Focus with the actions menu open.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: The screenshot shows the header for 'Quotation 279' with a 'Sent' status badge. It displays key metadata including Customer (EN CLIENT), Deal No. (279), Assignee (Eline), Date created (30/05/2022), Deal title (EN DEAL), Company entity (Red Cross), Deal status (Open), Deal phase (Quotation sent), CloudSign activity (Online), and Margin (+ € 1.000,00). An actions dropdown menu is open on the right, highlighting the 'Rename quotation' option with a teal box. Other menu options include Edit quotation, Copy quotation, Customise header, and Delete quotation. At the bottom right, there are primary action buttons for 'Convert to invoice' and 'Send quotation'.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Days off' calendar view in Teamleader Focus for requesting time off.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A full-year calendar view for 2016 showing 'Days off'. On the right, a 'Request time off' sidebar is open for '16 AUGUST'. The sidebar includes a dropdown menu currently set to 'Jour de fête', a display showing '08h Selected' and '16h Remaining', an 'All day' toggle set to 'YES', and a date field showing 'Tuesday 16 August'. At the bottom of the sidebar is a teal 'ADD' button. On the main calendar, August 16th is highlighted in blue, while other weekend or non-working days are shaded in grey.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Add phase' form in Teamleader Focus project management, highlighting the dependency feature.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A form titled 'Add phase' used for project planning. It contains fields for 'Title' (filled with 'Phase 2'), a rich-text 'Description' box with formatting icons (Bold, Italic, Lists, Link), and a 'Responsible user' dropdown (selected as 'Eline'). At the bottom, a '+ Dependency' button is highlighted with a red box. An information tooltip is visible above the dependency button, explaining: 'By setting a dependency you are creating a relationship between the due dates of two phases. You'll be warned when setting a deadline before the due date of the phase it is dependent on.'

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Warning banner in the Invoices module showing failed invoice delivery with a retry option.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A screenshot of the Teamleader Focus Invoices module. At the top, a yellow warning banner displays the message '4 invoices failed to sent.' followed by a clickable link 'Retry send'. The interface shows tabs for 'INVOICES' (active) and 'CREDIT NOTES'. Below the banner, the 'Invoices' header is visible next to a teal '+' button for creating new invoices and a clock icon button for recurring invoices. The left sidebar shows the 'Calendar' navigation icon.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Export options for the Sales Performance by deal owners report in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A screenshot of the 'Sales Performance by deal owners' report header. A teal box highlights the export dropdown menu which is currently open. The menu options include 'Export to CSV', 'Export to PDF', and 'Copy link'. The primary button visible is 'Export to Excel'. Other UI elements include report filters like 'Group by Date accepted, Assignee', 'Deal status = Won', and 'Date accepted in last year'. There is also a 'Save as new report' button and source tags for 'Deals' and 'Customers'.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Notification in Teamleader Focus showing a quotation has been downloaded online via CloudSign.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A notification banner from the Teamleader Focus dashboard. It features a teal icon with the number '1', the header 'Quotations downloaded online', and a 'Mark as read' link in blue. The notification text states: 'NV Teamleader downloaded (1x) the quotation OPTION 1 of TEST on CloudSign'. This indicates a customer has viewed or downloaded a proposal through the CloudSign platform.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Join screen for a Teamleader Focus video meeting with audio and video selection options.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A modal window titled 'Hi Olivia' asking the user to join a conversation. It features three distinct call-to-action buttons: a teal 'Audio + video' button with a camera icon, a teal 'Audio only' button with a microphone icon, and a grey 'Join without audio/video' button at the bottom. The background is a blurred office setting with origami birds. The bottom left of the modal indicates 'Powered by Teamleader'.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Informational warning about Safari browser compatibility issues with video meeting software.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A blue informational banner under the Teamleader logo. It contains an 'i' icon and text stating: 'There are some issues in your version of Safari that impact all video meeting software. We recommend using a different browser, or updating Safari.' There is a 'More info' hyperlink at the bottom of the message. This is likely shown when a user tries to access the meeting feature in an outdated Safari browser.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Error message stating that a layout variation cannot be archived because it contains a default layout
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A warning dialog box in Teamleader Focus. It features an orange exclamation mark icon at the top. The title text reads 'Layout variation cannot be archived'. The body text explains: 'This layout variation contains at least one default layout. Change the default layouts to archive this entire variation.' At the bottom, there is a single teal-colored button labeled 'OK'. This message appears when a user tries to archive a document layout that is currently set as the default for one or more document types.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The dialog box for adding a BCC email address for all invoice and credit note emails.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A pop-up dialog titled 'Add BCC for all invoice & credit note emails' within the Invoices preferences section. It contains a single required text field labeled 'Email address *' for user input. At the bottom right, there are two buttons: a white 'Cancel' button and a teal 'Save' button. In the background, the 'Preferences' menu is visible with several toggle switches and links, including 'Set default invoicing preferences', 'Add VAT rate', and the highlighted link 'Add BCC for all invoice & credit note emails' which triggered the dialog.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The Invoices module header in Teamleader Focus with the sync icon highlighted.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This image shows the top navigation and action bar of the Invoices module. The main tabs visible are 'INVOICES', 'FORECAST' (with a lock icon), and 'CREDIT NOTES'. Below the tabs, the 'Invoices' header is shown with action buttons: 'Export', 'Invoice unbilled time', and 'Add Invoice'. A search bar and a 'Show all' filter dropdown are also visible. In the top right global navigation, a red circle highlights the 'Sync' icon (circular arrows), which is used to synchronize data with external accounting software. Other global icons include a search bar, a plus button, user profile, help, and a time tracker showing '00:00'.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Font settings menu in Teamleader Focus showing title font, size, and color options.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A close-up of the 'FONT' settings section. It includes a dropdown menu for the 'Title' font, currently showing 'Pix' with options for 'Pixelify Sans' and 'Rubik Pixels' visible in the open list. Next to it is a 'Size' input field set to '24'. Below the size field is a black color picker square for selecting the font color. This interface is used for customizing the typography of document templates or headers.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Validation error for a custom email HTML template field in Teamleader Focus
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A screenshot of a form field titled 'Custom email HTML template' with a help icon. The text area contains the word 'test'. Below the text area, a red error message is displayed stating: 'Your custom HTML should have a body (<body></body>).' This demonstrates the validation requirements when setting up custom email layouts or templates.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Settings window in Wings Boekhouding for configuring dossier details and VAT information.

The 'Dossiertaal' dropdown is set to 'Nederlands'. Under 'BTW-gegevens', the 'BTW-plichtig' checkbox is checked, and the 'Ondernemingsnummer' is filled with 'BE 0899.623.035'. Other tabs visible include Boekhouding, Import, Invoerformaten, Afdrukken, E-mail, and Voorkeuren. The sidebar shows 'Snelknoppen' for Klanten, Leveranciers, and various transactions.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Form to invite up to 4 team members to Teamleader Focus via email.

There is a close 'X' button in the top right corner.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Access rights settings for the Planning module in Teamleader Focus
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This screenshot shows the configuration of user permissions for the Planning module. A toggle switch for 'Planning' is enabled (teal). https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Tutorial banner for Customer Meeting add-on: Custom Branding in Teamleader Focus
The 'Reset password' form in Teamleader Focus for creating a new account password.

It includes a title 'Reset password' and instructions stating the password must be at least 6 characters long. https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The top navigation bar in Teamleader Focus featuring search, quick add, and time tracking.

From left to right, it includes: a global search bar with a magnifying glass icon, a teal '+' quick add button, a 'refer a friend' icon (two people), a help/support icon (question mark), a 'what's new' gift icon, a time tracking stopwatch showing '00:00', and a blue circular user profile icon with the initial 'E'.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The Recordings dialog window showing options to start, upload, download, and manage screen recordings.

One local recording is listed with its date, duration (32s), and size (750 KB), featuring action icons for 'Upload to cloud' (highlighted with a '3'), 'Download', 'Play' (highlighted with a '2'), and 'Delete' (highlighted with a '4'). The bottom section, 'Cloud recordings', shows a storage limit indicator (875 KB / 20 GB) and a list of saved recordings. Each cloud recording includes the creator's name, duration, and size, with action icons for 'Copy link' (highlighted with a '5'), 'Download', 'Play', and 'Delete'.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: A list of projects or tasks in Teamleader Focus with status indicators and client names.

The third item is 'Develop new Gregg.co.uk' with a red dot and the client name 'Gregg Rowan' underneath. This view helps users quickly identify project status and associated customers.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Confirmation dialog for unlinking an expense from a project in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A modal window titled 'Unlink expense'. The dialog features two buttons at the bottom right: a white 'Cancel' button and a teal 'Unlink' button. There is also a close (X) icon in the top right corner.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Customize your form' interface in Teamleader Focus for styling lead capture forms.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This screen shows the customization options for a web form. On the left, 'General' settings include 'IMAGES' (Logo and Favicon upload buttons), 'FONT' (dropdowns for Title and Body font 'Pixelify Sans', size inputs, and hex color pickers), 'BACKGROUND' (Page and Form color hex pickers), and 'BUTTON COLOR' (Button and Button text color hex pickers). On the right, 'Page specific' settings allow toggling between 'Form page' and 'Success page'. It includes an 'Introduction' text area with the text 'Hello, welcome to our contact form.' and a 'Button text' field set to 'Send'. A live 'PREVIEW' pane displays the form with the applied styles, showing fields for First name, Last name, and Email.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: A document card in the 'To review' section of the Teamleader Focus document scanner.

At the top, there is a collapsible header 'To review (1)'. Below it, a bulk action bar shows '0 selected' with a disabled 'Scan' button and a disabled 'Delete' button. The document card itself features a checkbox in the top-left corner, a 'Scanned' status badge in the top-right, a thumbnail preview of the document, the filename 'Factuur Vlaam...', the date '08-04-2025', and a prominent blue 'Review' button at the bottom. This interface is used for processing scanned invoices or documents before they are finalized in the CRM.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Configuration panel for the Teamleader Focus Waiting room feature with two checkbox options.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A settings card titled 'Waiting room' containing two configuration options. Below the second option, there is a helper note stating: 'Note: set up your booking page before enabling this setting.' Both options include a small information icon for additional context.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Quotation details view in Teamleader Focus showing the 'Delete' option in the actions menu.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A screenshot of a quotation detail page. The main view displays fields like Deal (IT DEAL), Date created (30/05/2022), Total excl. VAT (€ 1,00), and Profit margin. A dropdown menu is open from the three vertical dots icon, showing options: 'Edit quotation', 'Rename quotation', 'Copy quotation', and 'Delete' (highlighted with a red box). At the bottom, there are action buttons for 'Convert to invoice' and 'Send quotation'.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Error message dialog stating 'We are unable to authenticate your payment method.'
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A pop-up error dialog in Teamleader Focus. The header has a light red background with an exclamation icon, the title 'Error', and a close 'X' button. The body text reads: 'We are unable to authenticate your payment method. Please choose a different payment method and try again.' There is a teal 'Close' button in the bottom right corner. This message typically appears during subscription management or invoice payment when a credit card or payment provider fails authentication.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Project health widget in Teamleader Focus showing budget remaining and profit margin.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A screenshot of the 'Project info' tab within a project. It features a 'Project health' widget with two main sections: 'Budget remaining' and 'Margin'. The Budget remaining section shows a total budget of € 5.000,00 with 100% remaining. The Margin section shows a total price of € 5.000,00 minus a cost of € 1.000,00, resulting in a margin of € 4.000,00 (80%). Both sections include a 'View more details' text link. Navigation tabs at the top include Work breakdown, Kanban, Project info, and Invoices.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: A form builder interface showing a required telephone number question and an 'Add question' button.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A close-up of a form builder UI in Teamleader Focus. It displays a single question block with the text 'What's your telephone number?' marked with a red asterisk indicating it is a required field. To the left of the question is a drag-and-drop handle icon. To the right are icons for 'Edit' (pencil) and 'Delete' (trash can). Below the question block is a button labeled '+ Add question'.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: A project timeline view in Teamleader Focus showing phases, tasks, and milestones.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A Gantt-style project timeline visualization. The horizontal axis represents dates in April and May. A legend on the left identifies project elements: a black circle for 'Start', green for 'Phase 1', red for 'Phase 2', blue for 'Phase 3', and a black diamond for 'End'. Specific tasks listed include 'Administratie: Task 3', 'Werkuren: Task 1', and 'Administratie: Task 2'. The timeline shows a grey progress bar at the top, milestones as colored dots, and tasks as horizontal colored bars indicating their duration across the calendar days.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Activity log for an incoming invoice showing payment history and status updates.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A detailed activity timeline for an incoming invoice in Teamleader Focus. The 'Details' tab is active. At the top right, there are buttons for 'Send to bookkeeper' and a teal dropdown button labeled 'Mark as refused'. The timeline shows a list of events tagged as 'Incoming invoice' with timestamps. Logged actions include: 'Expense was fully paid', 'Eline added a payment of 70 EUR', 'Eline added a payment of 30 EUR', 'Eline removed the payment of 100 EUR', and 'Eline updated the payment of 100 EUR'. A filter dropdown at the top is set to 'Show all'. This view is useful for tracking the audit trail of expenses and payments.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Interface for adding an address question to a form, showing configuration and a live preview.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A configuration window for a form question in Teamleader Focus. The 'Question' text field contains 'What is the address of your company?'. To the right, a 'PREVIEW' section shows how the fields will appear to users, including a 'Country' dropdown and text inputs for 'Street', 'Nr', 'Zip Code', and 'City'. The footer contains a 'Cancel' button and a teal 'Save question' button.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Office 365 Calendar integration page in the Teamleader Marketplace
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A marketplace page for the Office 365 Calendar integration. https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Preferences menu showing toggles for sending quotation attachments and receiving email copies.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The Teamleader Focus video meeting interface with collaboration tools and call controls.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The JotForm form builder interface showing a 'Contact us' form being created.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Notification banner stating 'Your export is ready!' with a Download link.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The project planning interface showing how to close a phase and add tasks.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A screenshot of the project management module in Teamleader Focus. At the top right, there are teal buttons for 'Add phase' and 'Add task' with a dropdown arrow. Below, a specific project phase titled 'Phase 1' is shown with a 'Details' link. To the right of the phase name, a 'Close phase' button is highlighted with a red box, indicating the action to complete a project milestone. Next to it is a secondary 'Add task' button with a dropdown menu.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Safari browser settings for meeting.teamleader.eu showing pop-up and auto-play permissions.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A screenshot of the Safari browser's website settings menu for meeting.teamleader.eu. The gear icon in the address bar is highlighted. The menu shows 'Page Zoom: 100%', 'Auto-Play: Allow All Auto-Play', and 'Pop-up Windows: Allow' inside an orange box, indicating these are the required settings for the Teamleader Focus meeting tool to function correctly. https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: GDPR data processing flowchart showing roles of Data Subject, Controller, Processor, and Sub-processors
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A conceptual diagram illustrating how personal data flows within the Teamleader Focus ecosystem for GDPR compliance. It identifies four key roles: 1. Data Subject (Contact of the Teamleader customer, e.g., lead or partner) who shares data with the customer. 2. Data Controller (Teamleader customer) who collects data and enters it into the software. 3. Data Processor (Teamleader) who securely processes data on behalf of the customer. 4. Sub-processors (Hosting, IT infrastructure, Built-in integrations) who process data under Teamleader's instructions. Arrows indicate the flow of data and legal responsibilities between these entities.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Form to create or edit a question in Teamleader Focus with field mapping options.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Project action menu in Teamleader Focus showing 'Close project' and 'Hide on timeline' options.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Email signature editor in Teamleader Focus with a 'Book a meeting' button and company logo.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Meeting info card in Teamleader Focus showing details and an 'Add work order' button.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Shortcodes for adding SEPA payment QR codes to document templates in Teamleader Focus.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: SEPApp interface for configuring SEPA Direct Debits and generating XML files.

The Pain subformat is set to 'pain format 008.001.02 (Standard format EU)'. A log at the bottom confirms a successful import of 1 row and that the SEPA file was saved. Bottom buttons include 'Create SEPA file', 'Enter licence key', and 'Enter Pro-licence key'.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: An actions dropdown menu in Teamleader Focus with Edit, Duplicate, Delete, and Active toggle.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Project info tab in Teamleader Focus showing budget spent, profit margin, and time tracked.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Browser permission error when trying to share a screen in a Teamleader Focus meeting room.

Below the title is a placeholder 'Description of team meeting type.' and a duration of '30 minutes' next to a clock icon. In the bottom right, there are user avatars (OF, BF, and +2) indicating the team members associated with this meeting type.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The Details section of a task or project showing assignees, quantity, and a product selection field.

It includes three fields: 'Assignees' which is currently set to 'Unassigned' with a grey user icon; 'Quantity' which is set to '1'; and 'Product' which has a dropdown menu containing the value 'Service & Support'. A mouse cursor is hovering over the 'x' icon within the product selection field, indicating the option to clear the current selection. The section is collapsible as indicated by the downward-pointing arrow next to the 'Details' header.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Step 2 of the booking page setup showing calendar availability and event creation settings.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A setup wizard titled 'Set up your booking page'. The left sidebar shows a 4-step progress tracker with 'Calendar settings' currently active. The main pane shows 'Step 2 of 4' and includes two sections: 'Calendars to check for availability' with a list of checkboxes (one Gmail account is selected, 'Birthdays' and 'Feestdagen in België' are unselected) and a 'See all calendars' dropdown. Below this is 'Choose a calendar in which events will be created' with a radio button selection for a Gmail account. Navigation buttons at the bottom include 'Go Back' and a teal 'Continue' button.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: A right-pointing arrow icon indicating a transition or next step in a process.
The Quotations overview list in Teamleader Focus showing a table of unsent quotes.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: The Quotations module interface featuring a list table with columns for Quotation name, Customer, Quotation status, Total amount, Date created, and CloudSign activity. A filter is active for 'Status: Not sent'. The table shows several quotes with the 'Not sent' status badge. At the top right, there is a teal 'Add quotation' button. The CloudSign activity column includes 'View activity' links and status indicators like 'Offline', 'Online', or 'Viewed (1x)'. A search bar for the list and a global search bar are also visible.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Line item editor in Teamleader Focus showing description, price, quantity, and margin fields.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A detailed view of a single line item entry row, likely from a quotation or invoice. It includes columns for '#' (index 1), 'Description' (a text input with a 'None' dropdown), 'Price' (value 1), 'Quantity' (value 1), and 'Subtotal' (value 1). Below the main row, there is a 'Purchase price' field (value 0) which calculates a 'Margin' (value 1). There is also a '+ Add discount' button available for the line item.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Manage contact salutations' dialog box in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A modal window titled 'Manage contact salutations' used to customize greeting options for CRM contacts. It features an 'Options' section with a blue '+' button to add new entries and an 'ABC' button for alphabetical sorting. The current list includes editable text fields for 'Sir', 'Madam', 'Dear', and 'Hi'. To the right of each entry are icons for reordering (up, top, down, bottom arrows) and a trash can icon for deletion. A teal 'SAVE' button with a checkmark is located at the bottom right.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: A blank white image placeholder.
Email action menu in Outlook showing the Teamleader Focus integration option.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A vertical dropdown menu from an email client (Outlook) showing standard email actions like Reply, Reply all, Forward, Delete, and Mark as unread. At the bottom of the list, there is a specific 'Teamleader' option with the Teamleader logo, used to access the Teamleader Focus Outlook add-in for tracking emails or linking them to CRM contacts and projects.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Overview page of a company in Teamleader Focus with the 'Files' tab highlighted.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: The screenshot shows the 'Overview' tab of a specific company profile. It contains several widgets: 'Company information' (with address and account manager), 'Remarks', 'Deals', 'Related contacts', and 'Unbilled time spent'. A red box highlights a vertical 'Files (1)' tab located on the bottom right edge of the screen, indicating where users can access documents attached to this company. The top navigation bar includes a search field, a '+' button for quick actions, and a time tracking timer.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: A user's resource planning view showing scheduled hours in a timeline.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A close-up of the Teamleader Focus planning or resource management tool. It shows a user profile for 'Evert Van Laere' with the role 'Designer'. To the right of the name is a timeline grid. One block is highlighted in orange with the text '6h', indicating 6 hours of work scheduled. Another block further right is filled with a solid teal color, representing a different task or status in the schedule. This view is used for tracking capacity and workload across a team.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Project phase overview showing tasks, time tracking, and completion status in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A detailed view of 'Phase 2' in a project. The header displays 'Time tracked' (5h29), 'Time estimated' (-), and an overdue 'Due date' (02/09/2019). A blue notification banner states 'This task group contains 2 time trackings (5h29) not linked to a meeting or a task.' The task list includes four items: 'Design' (overdue date 10/04/2020 in red), 'Administration' (due 'Today'), 'Development' (due 30/04/2020), and 'Finished task' (status 'Done'). Each row shows an assignee icon and columns for time tracking. The bottom right indicates '1/4 completed'.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: A warning banner stating that the browser is blocking desktop notifications in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: An orange informational banner with an 'i' icon. The text reads: 'You have notifications turned on but your browser is blocking desktop notifications. If you want to see these notifications, you should update your settings and reload the page.' The phrase 'update your settings' is a clickable hyperlink. This banner appears when a user has enabled notifications in their profile but hasn't granted the necessary permissions in their web browser.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Form for converting vCard files to CSV format with custom encoding and filter options.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A configuration form for importing or converting contact data. It includes fields for: 'vCard-File' with a 'Choose File' button (max 8 MB); 'Format' dropdown set to 'CSV' with a secondary delimiter dropdown set to 'Semicolon' and a checked 'Add header line' checkbox; 'Encoding' dropdown set to 'Unicode (UTF-8)'; 'Filter' options with unchecked checkboxes for 'vCards with e-mail only' and 'vCards with phone numbers only'; and a 'Modifications' text field to replace an International Access Code with '0'. A 'convert' button is located at the bottom.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Team settings for meeting room access levels and visibility in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A settings panel titled 'Team' containing permissions for meetings. It includes: 1. A checked checkbox for 'Non-admins can see and edit the meetings of other team members'. 2. A dropdown for 'Meeting room access level for team admins' set to 'Is host'. 3. A dropdown for 'Default meeting room access level for team members' set to 'Should knock'. 4. A checked checkbox for 'Allow overriding the team access level for individual meeting rooms'. This interface is used to manage calendar visibility and meeting room security permissions for different user roles.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Add contact' form in Teamleader Focus showing basic contact information fields.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A partial view of the 'Add contact' dialog box. It contains several input fields: 'First name' (text input), 'Last name' (required text input marked with a red asterisk), 'Title' (dropdown menu currently set to 'Choose...'), 'Email' (text input), and 'Email 2' (text input). All fields are currently empty, representing the initial state of creating a new CRM contact.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Markdown formatting guide and preview for meeting host messages in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A text input field showing how to use Markdown for text styling. It includes examples for bolding text using double asterisks (**) or double underscores (__), italicizing text using single asterisks (*) or single underscores (_), and combining both for bold and italic text (*** or ___). Below the input box, a 'Preview:' section demonstrates how the formatted text will appear to users. The header text reads 'The meeting host is not present' with a help icon.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Link contact type' selection screen in Teamleader Focus showing the 'Contact form' option selected.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A configuration interface titled 'LINK CONTACT TYPE'. It features three selectable cards: 'Meeting type' with a calendar icon, 'Contact form' with a document icon, and 'Waiting room' with a video camera icon. The 'Contact form' card is highlighted with a teal border and a checked checkbox in the top right corner. Below the cards, there is a dropdown menu currently set to 'Form 1', allowing the user to specify which form to link.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: A bar chart in Teamleader Focus showing deal count and amount per deal phase.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This screenshot displays a sales pipeline report with a bar chart comparing the number of deals (Count) and their total value (Amount excl. VAT) across different deal phases. The chart is grouped by 'Deal phase' and filtered for the 'Sales Pipeline' within the 'last year'. The phases shown on the X-axis are '01. New', '02. Contacted', '04. Quotation sent', and '05. Accepted'. A tooltip is visible over the '02. Contacted' phase, showing a Count of 2 and an Amount excl. VAT of € 7.200,00. Top navigation includes dropdowns for 'Chart and table', 'Group by Deal phase', 'Pipelines = Sales Pipeline', 'Date added in last year', and an '+ Add filter' button. View toggle icons for bar chart, line chart, time, and table are visible in the top right.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Add Invoice' dialog box in Teamleader Focus for creating a new project invoice.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A modal window titled 'Add Invoice' overlaid on a project page. The form includes fields for Company entity (Red Cross), Customer (NV Teamleader), Layout (Red Cross), Payment terms (30 days), and Currency (EUR). It features a toggle for 'Prepaid billing' and a checkbox for 'Mark as advance invoice'. The 'Invoice Items' section allows adding line items with fields for Description, Unit price, Quantity, Subtotal, VAT rate, and Account. There are radio buttons to toggle between 'Including VAT' and 'Excluding VAT'. Action buttons at the bottom right are 'Save as draft' and 'Save and book'.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Notification that an email address was not found in Teamleader with an 'Add to Teamleader' button.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A notification banner from the Teamleader Focus email integration. It displays the message '[email address] was not found in Teamleader' indicating that the contact does not exist in the CRM database. Below the message is a teal button labeled 'Add to Teamleader' which allows the user to create a new contact or company record directly from their email client. The Teamleader logo is visible in the bottom right corner.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: A table showing deal statistics grouped by deal phase in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A data table representing a deal pipeline overview. The columns include 'Deal phase', 'Count', 'Amount excl. VAT', and 'Profit margin'. The rows are categorized by deal stages: 01. New, 02. Contacted, 03. Meeting planned, 04. Quotation sent, 05. Accepted, and 06. Refused. Each row displays the total count of deals, the cumulative monetary value, and the total profit margin for that specific phase. The top row shows the grand totals for all 371 deals, amounting to €337.989,68 with a profit margin of €265.123,46.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Activity timeline in Teamleader Focus showing quotation interactions on CloudSign.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A vertical activity timeline tracking the history of a quotation named 'OPTION 1'. The timeline shows five events from bottom to top: 1) Eline sent the quotation for approval (with a 'Read more' link and email icon). 2) NV Teamleader viewed the quotation twice on CloudSign. 3) NV Teamleader downloaded the quotation once. 4) NV Teamleader submitted feedback (with a 'Read more' link and pencil icon). 5) NV Teamleader accepted the quotation on CloudSign. Each entry includes a specific icon (external link, pencil, or envelope) and clickable blue links for the contact name and quotation title.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: A notification banner confirming a quotation is available on CloudSign with a view link.

On the right side of the banner, there is a clickable 'view' link underlined in white. This appears after a user successfully publishes or sends a quotation to the CloudSign platform for digital signing.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Sidebar menu showing Smart Segments options in Teamleader Focus

At the bottom of the menu, there is an 'Active' toggle switch which is currently set to the 'on' (teal) position. This menu is used for managing lead capture forms or webforms.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Create Form' interface in Teamleader Focus for building custom contact forms.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This screenshot shows the configuration page for creating a new web form. https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Time tracking overview showing daily progress bars for a work week.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Linked expenses table within the Project info tab of a Teamleader Focus project.

On the right side of the row, there are icons for editing (pencil) and unlinking (broken link). At the top right of the section, there is a plus (+) icon to add or link new expenses. https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Example of document variables for client name and address in Teamleader Focus
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This image shows two examples of shortcode variables used in document templates within Teamleader Focus. The variables shown are '$CLIENT_NAME$' and '$CLIENT_ADDRESS$', which are used to automatically pull contact information from the CRM into invoices, quotations, or other documents.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Detailed view of a product item named 'PC11: Computer' with stock and status information.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A screenshot showing the details of a specific product or task in Teamleader Focus. The 'Details' section is expanded, showing several fields: 'Assignees' is set to 'Unassigned', 'Quantity' is '1', 'Product' links to 'PC11: Computer', and the 'Stock' level is highlighted at '100'. https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The Search menu in Notepad++ with the 'Replace...' option highlighted.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A screenshot of the 'Search' dropdown menu in the text editor Notepad++, used for data preparation before importing into Teamleader Focus. This step is typically used to clean up CSV files, such as removing unwanted characters or formatting data for a successful import.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Tutorial banner for 'Planning & managing agenda' in Teamleader Focus.
Configuration panel for collecting payments when booking a meeting in Teamleader Focus.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: List of meeting recordings in rooms outside the user's team in Teamleader Focus.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Weekly timesheet overview in Teamleader Focus showing tracked hours and billable time statistics.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Project navigation tabs and invoice filtering options in Teamleader Focus.
