https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Add Custom field' dialog box in Teamleader Focus settings.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A modal window titled 'Add Custom field' used to create new data fields. The form contains three main fields: 'Name' (text input with value 'Email 2'), 'Type' (dropdown menu selected as 'Email address'), and 'For' (dropdown menu selected as 'Contact'). There is a blue text link for 'Show advanced options' on the left and a teal 'SAVE' button with a checkmark icon in the bottom right corner. This interface is used for customizing CRM data structures for contacts, companies, or deals.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Weekly time tracking overview showing daily totals and progress bars in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A horizontal weekly calendar view for time tracking (Week 11, March 2024). It displays a 'Totals' row showing the cumulative hours tracked (29h30/157h00). Each day of the week (Mon 11 to Sun 17) shows the specific hours logged versus the total capacity (e.g., '11h30 /32h' for Tuesday) accompanied by a teal progress bar indicating the percentage of time filled. Friday 15 is highlighted with a blue badge, indicating the current day. This view helps users monitor billable hours and workload distribution.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: A segmented control button group for filtering user status with 'Deactivated' selected.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A horizontal segmented control or toggle switch used for filtering lists, likely in the user management settings. It contains three options: 'Active', 'Invited', and 'Deactivated'. The 'Deactivated' option is currently selected, indicated by a dark blue background and white text, while the other two options have a white background and blue text.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Payment method section in Teamleader Focus showing a masked credit card and a change link.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A UI component titled 'Payment method' within the account or billing settings. It displays the current payment type as 'Credit Card' and shows a masked 'Card number' where only the last four digits are visible (blurred in the image). Below the card details, there is a blue text link labeled 'Change payment method' to update billing information.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Table showing total expenses excluding VAT and their percentage distribution.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A financial report table in Teamleader Focus showing two columns under the 'Expenses' category. The first column is 'Total expenses (Excl. VAT)' with a total sum of € 4.100,00, listing individual values of € 3.000,00, € 1.000,00, and € 100,00. The second column is '% Total expenses (Excl. VAT)' with a total sum of 100%, listing the corresponding percentages: 73.17%, 24.39%, and 2.44%.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Search results header with tabs for All, Deals, and Invoices and a 'Most relevant' sort dropdown.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This UI component shows search results filtered by category in Teamleader Focus. It features a header stating '50 results'. Below are tabs for 'All' (50), 'Deals' (25), and 'Invoices' (13), with 'All' currently selected as indicated by a teal underline. A 'Sort:' dropdown menu is visible with 'Most relevant' as the active selection. This interface allows users to quickly filter search results by entity type and adjust the sorting order.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The Activities section in Teamleader Focus with an 'Add note' button and filter dropdown.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A close-up of the 'Activities' widget found on detail pages (like Contacts, Companies, or Deals). It features a prominent blue '+ Add note' button to log new information. Below the button, there is a dropdown menu currently set to 'Show all', which allows users to filter the activity timeline by type (e.g., calls, meetings, emails, or notes).

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Get started with scheduling' screen in the Lead capture Booster, prompting calendar connection.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This image shows the initial setup screen for the Scheduling feature within the Teamleader Focus Lead capture Booster. The left-hand navigation menu highlights 'Scheduling' in teal. The main content area features an illustration of a calendar and a video meeting card. It includes the heading 'Get started with scheduling' and the text 'Enable customers to book meetings with you and your team, in a fast and convenient way.' A prominent teal button is labeled 'Connect your calendar'. Other visible menu items include Dashboard, Meeting rooms, Contact widgets, Contact forms, Settings, and Help.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Table showing CNAME DNS records for email domain verification with a 'Copy all' button.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A table within the Teamleader Focus settings for email domain white-labeling or verification. It contains two columns: 'Record' and 'Name'. There are three rows, all of type 'CNAME'. The names listed are 'em6375.teamleader.eu', 'tlf94759._domainkey.teamleader.eu', and 'tlf947592._domainkey.teamleader.eu'. Below the table, a 'Copy all' button with a copy icon is highlighted in yellow, allowing users to easily copy these DNS records for their domain provider settings.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Company entities settings page showing active entities and the option to enable Peppol.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A screenshot of the 'Company entities' section in Teamleader Focus settings. It features two tabs: 'ACTIVE' (currently selected) and 'DEACTIVATED'. One active entity is listed: 'Red Cross', marked with a 'Default' badge, showing an email domain and VAT number (BE0413773294). On the right side of the entity row, there is an 'Enable Peppol' button and a three-dot menu icon. At the top right, there is a link 'Only send documents via Peppol?' with an external link icon and a '+' icon to add new entities.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Templates for quotation content' settings section showing a list of existing templates.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A settings interface titled 'Templates for quotation content'. It features a table with a single column header 'Template'. Below the header, there is one entry named 'Template Quotion 1'. On the far right of this entry, there is a pencil icon used for editing the specific quotation template. This screen is used for managing reusable content blocks for sales quotes.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Add contact to meeting' dialog in Teamleader Focus with email invitation options.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A modal window titled 'Add contact to meeting'. It contains a 'Contact' dropdown with 'Michelangelo Buonarroti' selected. A toggle for 'Send meeting invitation' is switched on, revealing an 'EMAIL' section. This section includes: 'Sender' dropdown (elinegrootaert@gmail.com), a read-only 'To' field (michelangelo.buonarroti@teamleader.eu), 'Template' and 'Signature' dropdowns (both set to 'No template selected'/'No signature'), a 'Subject' text field, and a large message body text area. Below the text area is a button for the shortcode '#CUSTOMER_MEETING_ROOM_LINK'. At the bottom, there is a checkbox for 'Send SMS (€ 0,18)' and two action buttons: 'Cancel' and 'Add contact'.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The action menu for creating a project from selected quotation lines in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A close-up of the interface when one or more lines are selected in a quotation or list. It shows a text '1 lines selected' next to a 'Cancel' button. To the right, there is a primary teal action button labeled 'Create new project' with a dropdown arrow. The open dropdown menu reveals two additional options: 'Add to existing project' and 'Create from template'. Below the action bar, column headers for 'price' and 'Quantity' are visible.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Edit segment' dialog box showing general information and rule configuration for a segment.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This dialog box allows users to modify a segment in Teamleader Focus. Under 'GENERAL INFORMATION', there is a 'Name' field with the value 'Target', a 'Show advanced options' link, and a toggle for 'Only I can see this segment' set to 'YES'. The 'SEGMENT RULES' section includes a dropdown for 'Rule' set to 'All rules must apply' with a '+' button to add rules. Two rules are defined: 'Rule 1' is 'Date' 'Is current quarter', and 'Rule 2' is 'Booked' 'Equals' 'Yes'. Each rule has a trash can icon for deletion.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Advanced options toggle for updating product prices in Teamleader Focus
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A snippet of a settings or configuration menu showing a clickable blue link 'Show advanced options'. Below it, there is a toggle switch currently in the 'off' position (greyed out) next to the text 'Update the product price to the most recent one'. This setting allows users to automatically sync product prices when changes occur.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Details section of a deal showing Probability percentage and Close date fields.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A snippet from the deal details view in Teamleader Focus. It includes a 'DETAILS' header with an 'EDIT' button in the top right. Two specific fields are shown: 'Probability (%)' currently set to 50%, and 'Close date' set to 29/02/2020 with a calendar icon. This UI element is used for managing sales pipeline expectations and forecasting.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Table view of incoming invoices and receipts with payment status columns highlighted.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A list view in Teamleader Focus showing incoming documents. Columns include Type (Receipt, Incoming invoice), Supplier, Review status (Pending, Approved), Total excl. VAT, Total incl. VAT, Payment status, Paid amount, and Date paid. A teal box highlights the 'Payment status', 'Paid amount', and 'Date paid' headers. Status labels shown are 'Paid' (green), 'Partially paid' (blue), 'Not paid' (grey), and 'Unknown' (orange). The interface includes a search bar, a 'Filters' button, and a settings gear icon for column customization.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Comparison showing calendar synchronization between Teamleader Focus Agenda and Google Calendar.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A side-by-side comparison of two calendar interfaces. On the left is the Teamleader Focus 'Agenda' view, showing a blue calendar event titled '[Online] Meet the team with John Doe' scheduled for Wednesday. On the right is a Google Calendar interface showing the exact same event synced as a yellow block from 10am - 12pm. An orange arrow connects the two events to demonstrate the synchronization feature. The Teamleader interface includes navigation for Day, Week, Month, and Team views, an Export button, and a user dropdown for 'Vectera team'. Both calendars also show 'Busy' blocks in the afternoon, illustrating how availability is mirrored across platforms.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The stakeholder information step in the Mollie payment integration setup for Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This screen is part of the account activation process for payment integrations (Mollie). The left sidebar shows a navigation menu with 'Get started' highlighted. A secondary navigation pane lists steps under 'Account information' (Organisational details, Stakeholders, Business activity, Payment methods) and 'Documentation' (ID document, Bank accounts). The main content area titled 'Tell us a bit more about your stakeholders' explains the legal requirement to identify authorized representatives and Ultimate Beneficial Owners (UBO). It features a blue 'Add a new stakeholder' button and a 'What do we need?' information box detailing the required data for legal representatives and UBOs. Bottom navigation buttons include 'Need help?', 'Do this later', and a disabled 'Next' button.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Toolbar for screen sharing or document preview with zoom and close controls
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A horizontal toolbar containing several interface controls. From left to right: a camera icon, the text label 'Your screen', a zoom-out magnifying glass (disabled/greyed out), the text '100%', a zoom-in magnifying glass, a vertical separator line, a window/layout icon, and a circular button with a red 'X' to close or stop the session.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Filtering and selecting items to invoice in Teamleader Focus with the 'Bundle groups' option.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This screenshot shows the interface for selecting billable items to include on an invoice. At the top, there are filter options for 'Type', 'Status', and an 'Invoice up to' date picker. A checkbox for 'Bundle groups' is enabled. Below, a list of items is shown with checkboxes. A group titled 'Administration' is expanded, containing 'Task 5'. A tooltip is visible over a crossed-out eye icon next to Task 5, stating: 'Work as part of a bundled group is hidden on the invoice.' This demonstrates how to group multiple tasks or time trackings into a single line item on an invoice while hiding the individual details.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Shared inbox setup screen for configuring ticket email forwarding and reply addresses.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: The 'Shared inbox setup' dialog in Teamleader Focus. It features two main sections: 'Receiving tickets via email', which provides a unique forwarding address (ticketing-46173@teamleaderticketing.be), and 'Replying to tickets', where users can map support email addresses to company names. The form shows three rows of email/company name pairs: support@teamleader.be (Teamleader), support@teamleader.nl (Teamleader NL), and a placeholder support@yourcompany.com (Company support). There is an 'Add extra address' button and a 'SAVE' button at the bottom right.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Configuration settings for button and text colors using hex codes.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A settings section titled 'BUTTON COLOR' within the Teamleader Focus interface. It contains two input fields for customizing UI elements: 'Button color' with the hex value #000000 (black) and a corresponding black color preview box, and 'Button text color' with the hex value #ffffff (white) and a corresponding white color preview box. This is typically used for branding documents, customer portals, or email templates.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Rich text editor in Teamleader Focus showing an email signature with a logo and formatting tools.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A screenshot of the rich text editor used for creating email signatures or messages. The editor contains a sample signature for 'John Doe, Head accountant at XYZ accountancy' including a company logo for 'XYZ ACCOUNTANCY COMPANY'. Below the signature, the text 'aaa' is typed. At the bottom, a formatting toolbar is visible with icons for: insert image, clear formatting, font size, text color, bold (B), italic (I), underline (U), text highlight (yellow), font color (red), bulleted list, numbered list, decrease/increase indent, blockquote, text alignment, and a 'more' (three dots) menu.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Actions' dropdown menu in Teamleader Focus showing bulk action options.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A close-up of the 'Actions' dropdown menu typically found in list views (like CRM contacts or companies). The menu includes the following options: 'Merge' (greyed out/disabled), 'Create calls', 'Create tasks', 'Print labels', 'Add tag' (highlighted with a light grey background), and 'Remove tag'. This menu is used for performing bulk operations on selected records.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: A table view showing deal phases and the total sum of amounts excluding VAT for each phase.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A snippet of a list view in Teamleader Focus showing deal statistics grouped by 'Deal phase'. The table has two columns: 'Deal phase' and 'Σ Amount excl. VAT'. It shows three rows: a top row with a dash (-) and a total sum of € 1.332.989,33; an 'Accepted' phase with a sum of € 123.965,71; and a 'Quotation sent' phase with a sum of € 23.383,40. The phases have expand/collapse arrows next to them, indicating grouped data.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Add Deal' dialog in Teamleader Focus with a dropdown menu open for 'Type of product'.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This screenshot shows the 'Add Deal' creation form. It includes fields for Title (required), Customer (searchable), Template (set to 'Don't use'), Company entity (set to 'Elinedemoaccount'), Close date, and Type of product. The 'Type of product' dropdown is currently open, showing options: Choose..., Product 1, Product 2, Product 3, and Other. On the right side, there are fields for Amount, Assigned to (set to 'Eline'), Source (set to 'Unknown'), Probability (%) (set to '5'), and PO number. A green 'Save' button is located in the bottom right corner.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: File menu in a bookkeeping tool showing Open file, Notes, Synchronise, and Backup/Restore options.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A vertical menu under the 'File' tab of a bookkeeping integration software, likely used for exporting Teamleader Focus data. The menu includes five options: 'Open file' with a notebook icon, 'Notes' with an envelope icon, 'Synchronise' with a gear icon, 'Consolidation' (which is currently disabled/greyed out), and 'Backup/Restore' with a sync icon. The top navigation bar also shows 'Fiscal year' and 'Bookkeeping' tabs.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Email composer in Teamleader Focus with a custom signature and meeting booking button.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: The image shows the email composition interface within Teamleader Focus. At the top, there is a blue 'Send' button with a dropdown arrow, a trash icon, and an external link icon. The 'To' field is visible with 'Cc' and 'Bcc' options on the right. Below the 'Add a subject' line, the email body contains a professional signature for 'John Doe, Head accountant at XYZ accountancy' including a company logo. At the bottom of the message, there is a call-to-action text 'Please use the below button to book a meeting with me' followed by a black 'Book a meeting' button, demonstrating the integration of scheduling links in outgoing emails.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Meeting booking form in Teamleader Focus with fields for contact details and additional invitees.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A booking confirmation form for an online meeting scheduled for Thursday 18 January 2024 at 9:30 AM. The form includes required fields for 'First name' (John), 'Last name' (doe), and 'Email' (johndoe@email.com). There is a checked option for 'Invite more people' which reveals fields to add up to 4 additional email addresses; three are filled (janedoe@email.com, jamesdoe@email.com, markdoe@email.com) with red trash can icons for removal. At the bottom, there is a mandatory checkbox for agreeing to the Teamleader privacy policy.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Form to configure a custom question for a KvK number in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This interface shows the setup for a custom question in a form or lead capture tool. It includes a 'Question' text field with the value 'What's your companies KvK number?', a 'Type' dropdown set to 'KVK number (Netherlands)', and an unchecked checkbox for 'An answer is required'. On the right, a 'PREVIEW' box displays how the question will appear to users. At the bottom right, there are two buttons: 'Cancel' and 'Save question'.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Editing a contact segment for marketing permissions with specific conditions.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: The screenshot shows the 'Editing marketing permission' interface for creating or modifying a segment in Teamleader Focus. It includes a 'Segment name' text field with the value 'marketing permission'. Below this, a rule-builder section allows users to define conditions. The current configuration is set to 'Contacts match all of the following conditions:'. The specific condition defined uses three dropdown menus: the first is set to 'Marketing Permissions', the second (operator) is set to 'is', and the third (value) is set to 'Email'. This interface is used for filtering contacts based on their marketing preferences.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Selecting the Embed element from the Add menu in a website builder to insert custom code.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This screenshot shows a sidebar menu titled 'Add' with the 'Elements' tab active. A teal arrow points from the plus (+) icon in the far-left navigation bar to the 'Embed' element (represented by code brackets </>) located under the 'Advanced' section. This UI is typically used when a user needs to paste a Teamleader Focus Web2Lead form code or widget into their website. Other visible element categories include Structure, Basic, Typography, CMS, Ecommerce, Media, and Forms. Other specific elements shown include Search, Background Video, Dropdown, Lightbox, Navbar, Slider, Tabs, and Map.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Overview of tracking emails in Teamleader Focus using a personal BCC address or IMAP.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A feature banner titled 'Track email from your own inbox'. It displays a 'PERSONAL TEAMLEADER INBOX' email address (tracking-1-109552@teamleadertracking.be) and an 'IMAP' button. A diagram illustrates the workflow: an email sent to 'Your clients, leads..' is also sent via 'BCC' to the personal tracking address. Explanatory text states that users can BCC this address or use IMAP to scan their inbox, noting that untracked emails are deleted after 2 weeks.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: WordPress plugin settings page for connecting a form to Teamleader Focus via Webhook URL.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: The image shows the 'Plugin settings' screen within a WordPress dashboard for the Teamleader integration. It outlines a 4-step process to connect a form: 1. Install the integration, 2. Go to integration settings, 3. Paste the Webhook URL, and 4. Use a shortcode. There is a text input field labeled 'Webhook URL' and a blue 'Save' button. A link at the bottom points to the Teamleader Knowledge Base for more information. The WordPress sidebar is visible on the left with 'Settings' selected.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Group by' configuration menu in Teamleader Focus for organizing list data.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A dropdown menu for grouping data in a list or report. The top blue bar shows the current active grouping: 'Group by Date added / Name of month, Date added / Year'. Inside the menu, there are two levels of grouping. The first level 'Group by' has two dropdowns set to 'Date added' and 'Name of month'. The second level 'And' has two dropdowns set to 'Date added' and 'Year'. Each row has an 'X' icon to remove the grouping level. At the bottom, there is a blue link labeled 'Switch groups' with a refresh icon.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Lead-Gen Form Results menu showing options to view, download, or integrate lead data.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A menu titled 'Lead-Gen Form Results' with two main sections. Under 'View & Download Leads', there are links for 'View CSV' and 'Download CSV'. Under 'Integrate your Form', there are links for 'Configure Flowtown' and 'Configure WebHook'. A mouse cursor is hovering over the 'Configure WebHook' option, which is highlighted.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Pagination controls, table settings icon, and the vertical Import button in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This UI snippet shows the controls typically found at the top or bottom of a list view. It includes a pagination selector with options for '10' (currently selected), '20', and '50' items per page. To the right is a gear icon for table settings/column customization. On the far right, there is a vertical black button labeled 'Import' with a star icon, being hovered over by a mouse cursor.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The Planning section of a task showing start/end dates, estimated time, and tracked time progress.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A detailed view of the 'Planning' section for a task or project in Teamleader Focus. It displays the 'Start date' (30/12/2023), 'End date' (02/02/2024), and 'Time estimated' (05h00). The 'Time tracked' section shows 03h00 with a teal progress bar indicating completion status. Below this, there is an expandable 'View time trackings' link showing that 'Eline' has tracked 03h00. At the bottom, there is a clickable '+ Add time tracking' button.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Empty state for the Profit & loss section in a Teamleader Focus project.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A screenshot showing the 'Profit & loss' widget in a project view when no data is available. It displays the heading 'Profit & loss' with a help icon. The main message reads: 'This project doesn’t contain billables or costs yet', followed by the instruction: 'Track time or add materials to get real-time profit insights.' This is relevant for users wondering why their project financial overview is empty.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Export to Excel' dialog window showing segment and selection options.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A modal window titled 'Export to Excel' in Teamleader Focus. It contains two dropdown fields: 'Segment', which is currently set to 'Select all', and 'Select', which is set to 'Teamleader example'. To the right of the 'Select' dropdown, there is a pencil icon for editing and a trash can icon for deleting the selection, with the trash can icon highlighted by a red box. This interface is used for exporting CRM data like contacts or companies based on specific segments and templates.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Mollie integration settings page in Teamleader Focus for online payments.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: The settings page for the Mollie integration. It features the Mollie logo and a header stating 'Have customers pay online with Mollie.' The main interface includes a text field labeled 'Your API key' for users to link their account. A teal 'SAVE' button is located below the input field. The sidebar provides links for 'Support', 'Support centre', and an option to 'Remove integration'. Instructions on the page explain how to find the API key in a Mollie account under 'Website profiles' and note that the integration does not support multi-currency.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Edit contact' form in Teamleader Focus highlighting the 'Opt-in marketing mails' toggle.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A detailed view of the 'Edit contact' interface. The form includes fields for First name (Jeroen), Last name (De Wit), Title (Dhr.), Email, Address (Belgium, Gent), Mobile, Phone, Fax, Website, VAT number, Gender (Male), Date of birth, Payment terms, IBAN, and BIC. A red box highlights the 'Opt-in marketing mails' toggle, which is currently switched to the 'on' position (teal). Below it, the 'No automatic reminders' toggle is switched to 'off' (grey).

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: An HR accomplishments report for a user named Eline showing targets and billable hours progress.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A 'Report HR' dashboard for July 2023. It features three circular progress charts for 'July' (83%, 5/6), 'Q3' (83%, 5/6), and '2023' (67%, 101/151). To the right, a 'Targets' section displays two green checkmarks indicating that '0 billable hours this month has been accomplished' and '0% billable hours this month has been accomplished'. The report is titled 'Report HR' for user 'Eline' and includes the Teamleader Focus logo.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Notification that a meeting room is full and cannot accept more participants.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A notification banner in a meeting interface showing that a user named 'Stephanie' wants to join, but the room is full. It states: 'Stephanie wants to join the meeting room, but the meeting room is full. We currently support meetings with up to 10 people.' The interface includes a grey avatar with the letter 'S' and three action buttons: 'Chat' with a speech bubble icon, 'Deny access' with a red prohibited icon, and a disabled 'Let in' button with a checkmark icon.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Data conflict resolution screen between current CRM data and Trends Top data in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A 'Lookup for Teamleader' dialog box showing a data discrepancy warning: 'The data returned by Trends Top is different from your data. Please tell us which version you would like to keep.' It displays a side-by-side comparison of 'CURRENT DATA' (blurred) and 'TRENDS DATA'. Fields include Street (Dok-Noord), Number (3 bus A/10), Zip code (9000), City (Gent), and Phone. Green checkmark icons indicate selected fields from the Trends Data column. A 'BUY NOW' button with a checkmark is located at the bottom right. This interface is used for data enrichment and company information verification.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Overview of Contact forms in Teamleader Focus showing responses, creators, and data destinations.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: The 'Contact forms' dashboard displays a table of existing forms. At the top right, there is a teal 'Create a form' button. A toggle allows users to switch between 'Personal' and 'Team' views. https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Diagram illustrating the GDPR data flow between Teamleader customers, Teamleader, and data processors.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A conceptual flowchart explaining data privacy and GDPR roles within the Teamleader Focus ecosystem. It features three main blocks: 1. 'Teamleader customer' (Data subject), 2. 'Teamleader' (Data controller), and 3. 'Data processors' (including Newsletter, Customer feedback, Referral program, and Debt collection). Arrows describe the flow: the customer shares data with Teamleader, Teamleader collects data from the customer, Teamleader shares data with service providers (processors) for specific purposes, and processors securely process that data on behalf of Teamleader.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Form for creating a custom question in Teamleader Focus with field mapping to a Deal Amount.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This interface shows the configuration for a custom question. The 'Question' field contains 'What is the current value of your car?'. The 'Type' dropdown is set to 'Money'. There is an unchecked checkbox for 'An answer is required'. A section titled 'Link answer to Teamleader Focus' shows a dropdown mapped to 'Deal - Amount'. On the right, a 'PREVIEW' pane displays how the question will look to a user, featuring a text input followed by 'EUR'. Action buttons at the bottom right are 'Cancel' and 'Save question'.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Access denied error message stating 'Sorry, you don't have access to this report'.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: An error screen in Teamleader Focus indicating a lack of permissions. It features an illustration of a settings window with a red 'X'. The main text reads 'Sorry, you don't have access to this report', with a subtext instruction to 'Please check with your colleagues to get access.' A teal call-to-action button at the bottom is labeled 'Back to the dashboard'.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Detailed view of an approved and paid expense for 'Parking' in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: The header shows an expense titled 'Parking' with status badges 'Approved' and 'Paid'. Key fields include: Company entity (Red Cross), Type (Incoming invoice), Invoice date (16-09-2025), Supplier (NV Teamleader), Total excluding VAT (€ 100,00), Total including VAT (€ 120,00), Origin (Manual), Payment reference, IBAN number, and Bookkeeping status (Not sent). Navigation tabs at the bottom include Preview, Details, Payments, and Linked items. Action buttons visible are 'Enable sending to bookkeeping tool' and a dropdown button 'Mark as refused'. There are also icons for editing and more actions in the top right.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: A card for an 'Online meeting' scheduling type in Teamleader Focus with a share button highlighted.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This image shows a meeting type card within the scheduling or calendar feature. The card is titled 'Online meeting' and includes a description: 'Book a 30 minute online meeting with John Doe.' It features an 'Online' badge with a camera icon, a duration indicator of '30 minutes', and a user avatar 'JD'. A teal circle highlights the 'Share' icon (network node symbol) located in the top right corner next to a three-dot menu icon, indicating how to distribute the booking link.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Project planning overview in Teamleader Focus showing details, description, and action buttons.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A project overview page titled 'New project' with a status badge 'On track'. The 'Details' section shows the project title, number (150), dates (06/11 - 13/11/2020), and budget (€ 1.000,00). A 'Description' box contains placeholder text. Below, a project phase named 'Phase 1' is visible. A red box highlights the primary action buttons: 'Add phase', 'Add task', and a dropdown menu containing 'Add meeting'. The interface also includes filters for 'Time' and summary metrics for 'Time tracked', 'Time estimated', and 'Completed'.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Add formatting' dialog box for setting conditional formatting rules in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This dialog window allows users to create conditional formatting rules for reports or lists. It contains the following elements: a 'Field' dropdown set to 'Billability rate', a condition dropdown set to 'Less than', a value field containing '% 50', and a formatting action dropdown set to 'Highlight cell' with a yellow color picker selected next to it. At the bottom, there is a checkbox for 'Apply formatting on group level'. The top right contains 'Cancel' and 'Save' buttons.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Field mapping screen for importing contacts into Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This image shows the 'Import' interface where users match columns from an uploaded file to CRM fields. A success message indicates '45 records were found'. On the left, columns from the file are shown with sample data: 'VORNAME' (Roger, Lieven, Michael), 'NACHNAME' (Waters, Westerlinck, Schumacher), 'EMAIL', and 'STRASSE'. On the right, 'Belongs to' dropdown menus allow users to select the corresponding Teamleader field. One dropdown is open, showing options like 'Do not import', 'New custom field', and specific contact fields such as 'First name', 'Last name', 'Street', 'Zip code', and 'Email address'. This step is crucial for data migration and contact management.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Tutorial banner titled 'Invoicing a project' for Teamleader Focus.
The project invoicing interface in Teamleader Focus showing how to deduct advance invoices.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This screenshot displays the 'Invoices' tab within a project. It shows the process of creating a final invoice while deducting an advance payment. Key elements include: a 'Deduct advance invoices' section with a selected invoice (2025 / 4) for €1.500,00; a list of billable items like 'Administration' and 'Branding' set to 'Time and materials'; and a top action bar with filters for 'Type', 'Status', and 'Invoice up to' date. The total 'Amount' to be invoiced is highlighted as €2.418,78. Buttons visible are 'Cancel' and 'Create invoice'. A 'Bundle groups' checkbox is also enabled.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Advanced options for invoice automation settings including payment terms and autosend toggles.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A settings section titled 'Hide advanced options' showing configuration for recurring invoices or subscriptions. The left column contains dropdowns for 'Payment terms' (set to 30 days), 'Invoice timing' (set to 'The day itself'), 'Project' (set to 'Choose...'), and an 'End date' date picker. The right column features four toggle switches: 'Book directly' (ON), 'Autosend invoice' (ON), 'Autosend via Peppol' (ON), and 'Autosend via postal service' (OFF). This interface is used to automate the creation and distribution of invoices.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Example of a document template in Teamleader Focus using custom field shortcodes.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A sample 'Construction Contract' document demonstrating how Teamleader Focus uses shortcodes to pull data into templates. The document includes placeholders like $CUSTOM_FIELD_XXXX$ for dynamic data insertion such as project locations, estimate dates, and insurance values. It also shows placeholders for lists like '{list of changes, if any, to the estimate}' and '{details of payment plan}'. This illustrates the document automation feature for creating contracts or quotes with CRM data.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: A pie chart and table showing deal distribution by phase in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A dashboard view showing a deal phase breakdown. It features a multi-colored pie chart with a tooltip highlighting the 'New' phase with a count of 123. Below the chart is a legend with categories: Accepted (purple), Contacted (blue), Meeting planned (teal), New (maroon), Quotation sent (red), and Refused (dark brown). At the bottom, a table summary shows a total 'Count' of 371 deals and a total 'Amount excl. VAT' of € 337.989,68. The 'Count' column is highlighted with a teal selection box.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Edit phase' form in Teamleader Focus project management.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This screenshot shows the 'Edit phase' side panel for a project. It includes fields for 'Title' (set to 'Fase 1'), a rich-text 'Description' box, and a 'Responsible user' dropdown (selected as 'Eline'). Under the 'PLANNING' section, there is a 'Due date' field (set to 30/08/2019) and a '+ Dependency' link. Under the 'BUDGET' section, the 'Billing method' dropdown is open, showing options for 'Time and materials', 'Fixed price', and 'Non invoiceable'.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Invoices tab in a project with a date filter for 'Invoice up until'.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A close-up of the project management interface in Teamleader Focus. It shows three tabs: 'Work breakdown (3)', 'Project info', and the active 'Invoices (0)' tab. Below the tabs, there is a dropdown menu set to 'Show all' and a date picker field labeled 'Invoice up until' with the selected date '21/06/2023' highlighted by a teal border. This interface is used to filter which billable items are included in a project invoice based on a specific cutoff date.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: A 'LET'S START' introductory banner with a paper plane illustration on a light blue background.
Meeting room card in Teamleader Focus showing status, participants, and management icons.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A UI card for a meeting room named 'test-meeting-room'. The interface includes: (1) the room title, (2) action icons for copying the meeting link and deleting the room, (3) a status label 'Currently opened', (4) a user avatar with a green online status indicator, and (5) a footer indicating the active content 'Demo presentation (1 / 1)'. This component is used for managing collaborative sessions and tracking active presentations.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Email notification from Teamleader Focus stating an invoice was refused via Peppol.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: An automated email notification from Teamleader Focus. The main message displays an envelope icon with a red 'X' and the heading 'Invoice was refused'. The text specifies that invoice '2024 / 2' was refused by 'Belgian company name' via Peppol. It includes a specific refusal reason in Dutch: 'Uw factuur wordt verwerkt door onze boekhouding.' Below the main message, there is a link to manage email preferences, app store download buttons for iOS and Android, and social media icons.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Warning banner in Teamleader Focus stating 'This company has been deactivated'
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A notification banner appearing at the top of a company record page. It features a bell icon and the text 'This company has been deactivated' on a light orange background. Above the banner, the 'OVERVIEW' tab is visible, indicating the context of the CRM company profile.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Reset meeting room' dialog box with options to clear meeting data.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A modal window titled 'Reset meeting room' asking 'What do you want to reset?'. It features a list of checkboxes for different data types: 'Meeting activity', 'Participant activity' (with help icon), 'Chat history' (checked), 'Whiteboards and files' (checked), 'Cloud recordings', and 'Specific user access' (with help icon). At the bottom, there is a prominent orange 'Reset' button. This interface is used to clear specific content or history from a virtual meeting room in Teamleader Focus.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: A warning banner indicating that browser settings are blocking desktop notifications.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A yellow informational banner with an 'i' icon. The text reads: 'You have notifications turned on but your browser is blocking desktop notifications. If you want to see these notifications, you should update your settings and reload the page.' The phrase 'update your settings' is a clickable hyperlink. This banner appears when a user has enabled notifications in Teamleader Focus but hasn't granted the necessary permissions in their web browser (Chrome, Firefox, etc.).

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Close-up of dragging the fill handle in a spreadsheet to duplicate cell values for data import.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A spreadsheet interface showing four cells selected with a green border, all containing the text 'Avenue Vi'. A black plus-sign cursor is active on the bottom-right fill handle, demonstrating how to copy values across multiple rows or columns. This step is common when preparing CSV or Excel files for importing data into Teamleader Focus to ensure consistent values across records.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Payments' tab for an expense in Teamleader Focus with an option to add linked payments.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A screenshot of the 'Payments' tab within an expense record. The navigation bar shows tabs for 'Preview', 'Details', and the active 'Payments' tab. On the top right, there is a button labeled 'Send to bookkeeper'. The main content area contains a section titled 'Linked payments' which currently states 'There are no payments for this expense.' Below this message, there is a blue '+ Add payment' link. A gray plus icon is also visible in the header of the 'Linked payments' section.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Audio, video, and meeting room settings dialog in Teamleader Focus
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A settings modal for a meeting room. The left side 'Audio / video' section includes dropdowns for 'Choose microphone' (No microphone active), 'Choose speaker' (Unknown speaker) with a 'Test your speaker' button, 'Choose camera' (No camera active), and 'Choose background mode' (No background). It also features toggles for 'Disable incoming video' (off) and 'HD Video Quality' (on). The right side 'Meeting room' section shows the 'Meeting room size' (0 B), a 'Private notes' toggle (on), and three buttons: 'Save as template', 'Invite people', and a highlighted 'Reset meeting room' button in red text.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: List view of work orders in Teamleader Focus showing titles, employees, customers, and statuses.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: The 'Work orders' overview page featuring a searchable table. Columns include Title (e.g., 'Repair', 'Wall injection'), Employees (shown as avatars), Customer, Date added, Project, and Status. Status labels are color-coded: 'Final' in green and 'Draft' in grey. The UI includes a search bar at the top left, pagination at the bottom left (showing 66 pages), and a results-per-page selector (10, 20, 50) at the bottom right.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Notification banner confirming that an invoice export is ready for download.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A dark blue notification banner containing the text 'Your export of 1116 invoices is ready!' followed by a 'Download' hyperlink. This appears in Teamleader Focus after a user triggers a bulk export of invoice data, providing the final step to retrieve the file.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Create or join a meeting room' dialog in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A modal window titled 'Create or join a meeting room' with a close (X) button. It features a search input field containing the text 'John-Doe'. Below the search bar, there are two sections: 'Create a new meeting room' with options to 'Create John-Doe' and 'Create John-Doe from template...', and a 'Join an existing meeting room' section which currently displays 'No results found'.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Add phase' form in Teamleader Focus for creating a new project phase.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This form allows users to create a new phase within a project. It includes fields for 'Title' (set to 'Phase 2'), a rich-text 'Description' box, and a 'Responsible user' dropdown (selected: 'Eline'). Under the 'PLANNING' section, there is a 'Due date' field (set to 30/04/2020) and a '+ Dependency' link. The 'BUDGET' section includes a 'Billing method' dropdown (selected: 'Time and materials') and a 'Budget' currency field (set to € 0,00). The form concludes with 'Cancel' and 'Add phase' buttons at the bottom right.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: A confirmation dialog for disabling company-related questions in a form or lead capture tool.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A modal window titled 'Disable company' with a warning message. The text states: 'The following questions are linked to company: Company name, What's your company's address. If you disable this option, these questions will be deleted. Do you want to continue?'. The dialog contains a 'Cancel' button and a prominent orange 'Disable' button. There is also a close (X) icon in the top right corner.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The Teamleader Focus top navigation bar showing a stock level notification.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A close-up of the Teamleader Focus header and notification center. The top bar includes a search icon, a '+' create button, a notification bell with a red '1' badge, a people icon, a help icon, a time tracker showing '00:00', and a user profile icon. Below the header, a notification dropdown is open showing an alert: 'Stock dropped below minimum' for the item '5" screws'. There is a 'Mark as read' link next to the notification and a checkmark icon to the left of the item name.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: A list view of a Work order in Teamleader Focus showing completed tasks and tracked items.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This image shows a detailed breakdown of a 'Work order' entry. It includes four rows: the main 'Work order' header with a progress bar and date (01/02/2024), followed by three sub-items: 'Working hours', 'Computer', and 'Distance'. Each sub-item is marked with a teal 'Done' status badge. The 'Working hours' row is assigned to 'Eline' and dated 01/02/2024. The 'Computer' and 'Distance' rows show generic user icons and no specific date. Each row has a checkbox on the left and a three-dot vertical menu on the right. At the bottom, there is an '+ Add line' button and a completion status of 'Completed 3/3'.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The header and action bar of a sent quotation in Teamleader Focus with a 'Convert to invoice' button.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This screenshot shows the detail view of 'Quotation 279' which has the status 'Sent'. The header displays key information including Customer (EN CLIENT), Deal (EN DEAL), Total excl. VAT (€ 1.000,00), and Profit margin. A 'CloudSign activity' link is visible. Below the header, there are tabs for 'DETAIL', 'PREVIEW', and 'FOLLOW-UP'. On the right side, a primary action bar contains a 'Convert to invoice' button (highlighted with a teal box) and a 'Send quotation' dropdown button. This view is used when a user wants to transition a won quotation into an invoice.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Excel spreadsheet showing how to combine multiple tags into one column for Teamleader Focus import
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A close-up of an Excel spreadsheet demonstrating the preparation of data for a CRM import. Column L is labeled 'Tag 1' with values 'Lead' and 'Customer'. Column M is labeled 'Tag 2' with the value 'Starred'. Column N is labeled 'Tags together' and shows the combined value 'Lead,Starred' in a single cell. A red box highlights the fill handle (plus icon) in the bottom right corner of the active cell in column N, indicating the action of dragging the formula down to combine tags for other rows. This illustrates the requirement to use commas to separate multiple tags in a single CSV/Excel column when importing contacts or companies into Teamleader Focus.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The Teamleader Focus notification center showing a new shared report notification.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A close-up of the top navigation bar in Teamleader Focus. It features a global search bar, a teal '+' button for quick actions, and a notification bell icon with a red badge indicating '6' unread notifications. Below the bell, a notification dropdown is open showing 'New reports shared with you' with a teal '1' icon. The specific notification states 'Eline shared report "Top Products by Revenue" with you'. There is a 'Mark as read' link in the top right of the dropdown.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Add multiple time trackings' dialog showing a weekly grid to log hours for a project.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This dialog allows users to log time across a full week (16 - 22 Aug in this example). It features a row for a specific client ('NV Teamleader, Gent, Belgium') with a 'Billable' toggle switched on. Below the client name is a dropdown to 'Select an item' for the work description ('What have you been working on?'). The main section is a grid with columns for each day of the week (Mon-Sun), each containing input fields for hours and minutes. Thursday the 19th is currently highlighted. A trash icon is available to remove the project row, and navigation arrows allow switching between weeks.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The Closing days calendar overview in Teamleader Focus showing recorded company holidays.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A screenshot of the 'Closing days' section within Teamleader Focus. It displays a calendar view for the year 2023, specifically showing the months January, February, March, and April. Several dates are highlighted in grey, indicating recorded closing days or holidays. On the right side, a summary shows '104h Recorded' for closing days. A cursor is hovering over a three-dot menu icon in the top right corner, revealing an 'Export' button. This interface is used for managing company-wide non-working days that affect planning and time tracking.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The Invoices tab within a project view in Teamleader Focus, showing billing progress and status.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A screenshot of the 'Invoices' tab in a project. At the top, a progress circle shows 38% completion alongside financial metrics: Total price (excl. VAT) of € 3.918,78, Amount billed (excl. VAT) of € 1.500,00, and Amount paid (incl. VAT) of € 0,00. An 'Add Invoice' button is visible in the top right. Below this, a table lists invoices with columns for No., Customer (NV Teamleader), Date (14-03-2025), Amount billed, Amount paid, and Status. One entry is shown as an 'Advance invoice' with the status 'Not paid'.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Summary step for creating a meeting type in the Lead Capture booking tool.

At the bottom, there is a toggle switch labeled 'Publish to the public booking page' which is currently set to 'on' (green).

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Detailed view of an overdue invoice in Teamleader Focus with payment and email options.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Dropdown menu for quotation actions including CloudSign preview and sharing options.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Contact information card in Teamleader Focus with the actions dropdown menu open.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The website profiles settings page in Teamleader Focus for managing online payment configurations.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Header of the Companies module in Teamleader Focus with search, filter, and action buttons.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Browser permission dialog for screen sharing in a Teamleader Focus meeting room.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Confirmation dialog for archiving a layout variation in Teamleader Focus.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Grey sync or recurring icon with two arrows in a circular loop.
A form field for entering button text with a character counter.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Add segment' form in Teamleader Focus showing general information and segment rules.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: A graphic banner featuring the text 'FAQ' with a magnifying glass and a document icon.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Navigation menu for Insights showing My Reports with Favourites and By me options.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Pagination controls and a settings gear icon for list views in Teamleader Focus.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The file management menu in Teamleader Focus showing options to download, email, or delete a file.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Timesheets overview in Teamleader Focus showing weekly time tracking and user selection.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Select product' dialog box in Teamleader Focus showing product search results and details.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The dropdown menu for quotation actions in Teamleader Focus, highlighting 'Mark as sent'.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The Meeting rooms overview in Teamleader Focus showing a guest waiting in a personal waiting room.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Generate report' dialog box in Teamleader Focus for project or time tracking reporting.

The form contains a required 'Groups' dropdown (set to 'All'), and date picker fields for 'Start date' and 'End date'. Under 'REPORT CONTENTS', there are four checked checkboxes: 'Budgeting information of selected groups', 'Time tracking details', 'Materials', and 'Invoice information'. https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Permission denied error message: 'Sorry, you don't have permission to see this data.'

A teal button labeled 'Back to the dashboard' allows the user to navigate away from the restricted page.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The export dropdown menu in Teamleader Focus with PDF, Excel, CSV, and Bookkeeping options.

It includes three configuration options: 'Fallback font' with a dropdown currently set to 'Copy from Word' and a help icon; 'Page numbers' with a dropdown set to 'No'; and 'Custom CSS' with an 'Edit' button to allow manual styling of templates using CSS code.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The Invoices overview page in Teamleader Focus with the sync icon highlighted.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Column selection menu in Teamleader Focus to customize table views using toggle switches.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A dropdown menu accessed via a gear icon that allows users to customize visible columns in a list view (likely for Deals). VAT, Title, Company entity, Customer, Linked contacts, Customer email address, Date accepted, Date added, Lost date, Close date, Last activity, Profit margin, Deal number, and PO number. Active toggles are highlighted in teal, while inactive ones are grey. This interface is used to personalize the data shown in tables.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Interface for linking payments to invoices showing a zero balance remaining.

A specific line item shows '€ 1.000,00' with two action icons: a pencil icon for editing and a broken link icon for unlinking the payment from the invoice. This indicates a fully reconciled payment where the transaction amount matches the linked amount.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Edit view of columns' dialog box for customizing list views in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A modal window titled 'Edit view of columns' used to customize table displays. It features two main list boxes: 'Available columns' on the left and 'Selected columns' on the right. Between them are arrow buttons (right and left) to move fields between lists. To the right of the 'Selected columns' list are up and down arrow buttons for reordering. 'External ID' is currently highlighted in the available list. Selected columns include Number (detailed), Customer name, Total price without VAT, Date, Status, Total price including VAT, Number of days ago the last reminder was sent, Last reminder (detailed), Total, and Title of related deal. A teal 'SAVE' button with a checkmark is located at the bottom right.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Step 3 of the Excel Convert Text to Columns Wizard, setting the data format to 'Text'.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This dialog box shows the final step of the 'Convert Text to Columns Wizard' in Excel, a process often used to fix formatting for Teamleader Focus exports. The 'Column data format' is set to 'Text' (selected radio button). The 'Data preview' section shows a column of phone numbers highlighted with the 'Text' format applied to prevent leading zeros from being removed. Other options visible include 'General', 'Date', and 'Do not import column (skip)'. The destination field is set to '$J$1'. Bottom buttons include 'Cancel', '< Back', and 'Finish'.
