https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A close-up of the 'Budget' section in a project form. The 'Billing method' dropdown is open, showing four selectable options: 'Unit price', 'Fixed price', 'Project fixed price' (currently selected), and 'Non-billable'. Other visible fields in this section include 'Unit cost', 'Budget spent', and 'Cost'. This interface is used to define how a project or task will be invoiced to a client.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Pagination controls and settings gear icon in a Teamleader Focus list view
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A UI snippet showing list navigation and customization options. On the left, there is a segmented control for selecting the number of items per page, with options '10', '20', and '50' (the '10' option is currently selected and highlighted in dark grey). To the right, there is a settings gear icon highlighted with a red square, which is typically used in Teamleader Focus to open the 'Choose columns' or 'Manage columns' dialog for a table or list view.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Adding a note in Teamleader Focus activities using the @mention feature to tag a colleague.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: The screenshot shows the 'Add a message' interface within the Activities section of Teamleader Focus. A dropdown menu on the right is set to 'Note'. Inside the text input area, the user has typed '@sara', which has triggered an autocomplete suggestion box displaying the user 'Sara' with a profile icon. The UI includes an 'Email tracking' button at the top right, and 'Cancel' and 'Add' buttons at the bottom right. This feature is used for internal communication and tagging team members in CRM notes.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The creation form for a quotation introduction text template in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This screen shows the 'Templates for quotation introduction text' editor. It includes fields for 'Company entity' (set to Red Cross), 'Name' (set to Test), and 'Language' (set to English). Below these is a rich text editor for 'Contents' containing the text 'This is a test template for the introduction text of the quotation.' The editor toolbar includes standard formatting options like bold, italic, lists, and alignment. At the bottom, a list of available variables is displayed, such as #NAME, #FULL_NAME, #COMPANY_NAME, #QUOTATION_NAME, and #PRICE_EXCL, which can be used to personalize the quotation text automatically.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: A confirmation dialog for updating permissions in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A modal dialog box titled 'Update permission' with an information icon. The text warns: 'This will change your permission. You will lose access to this report.' It contains two buttons: a primary teal button labeled 'Yes' and a secondary white button labeled 'Cancel'. This appears when a user is about to downgrade their own access rights to a specific report or feature.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: User permission settings for the Projects module in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A close-up of the user access settings for Projects. The 'Projects' module is toggled to 'YES' (green). Below this, the 'Access' dropdown is set to 'Access to all projects'. There are two additional toggles currently set to off (grey): 'Projectplanning' and 'Profit on projects'. A mouse cursor is hovering over the 'Profit on projects' toggle, indicating the action of changing user permissions for project financial data.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: A signed quotation document in Teamleader Focus showing the signature and date.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A close-up of the signature section of a quotation document. It includes the text 'Both parties agree to the content of the quotation.' followed by a horizontal line. Below the line, on the left, it lists 'Red Cross' and 'Eline' with a handwritten digital signature. On the right, it mentions 'NV Teamleader'. At the bottom left, the date '15/05/2023' is highlighted with a teal border, indicating the date of signing.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Action menu for Peppol settings in Teamleader Focus
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A dropdown menu triggered by a three-dot vertical icon. The menu contains four options: 'Disable Peppol', 'Set as default', 'Deactivate', and 'Delete' (highlighted in red). This menu is typically used for managing electronic invoicing settings or company entity preferences.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Project template header in Teamleader Focus showing template status and auto-assigned users.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A screenshot of the header section for a project marked as a template. At the top, an information banner states: 'This project is marked as a template, any change here will be applied to future projects created with this template.' followed by a 'Configure template preferences' link. The project title is 'Project' with a 'Template' tag next to it. The details section shows: Owners (Eline), Assignees (Sara - Auto-assigned), Deals (linked to Deal 1), and a Start date (16-02-2024).

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: An example of CSS code used for document styling in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A snippet of CSS code used within the document template settings to define general styles. The code shown is: /* general styles */ *{font-size:16px;color:#000000}. This demonstrates how users can customize the font size and text color for their invoices or quotations using custom CSS.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Teamleader Focus referral program banner with a unique referral link and email option.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A promotional banner for the Teamleader Focus referral program titled 'Help others work smarter'. The main text says 'Invite a friend and earn €150 when they become a customer!'. Below this, there is a section to share a unique link. It features a 'Copy Link' button next to a text field containing a referral URL (referral.teamleader.eu). To the right, separated by a vertical line, is a teal 'Send Mail' button accompanied by a paper plane illustration. This interface is used by users to refer new customers and earn rewards.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Peppol configuration settings showing enabled status for sending and receiving e-invoices.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A settings table under the 'Peppol' tab within Company information. The table has four columns: Type, ID, Peppol ID, and Status. It shows three entries: 1) Type: Sending, ID: KBO, Peppol ID: 0208:0212643695, Status: Enabled. 2) Type: Receiving, ID: KBO, Peppol ID: 0208:0212643695, Status: Enabled. 3) Type: Receiving, ID: VAT, Peppol ID: 9925:be0413773294, Status: Enabled. This screen confirms that electronic invoicing via the Peppol network is active for both sending and receiving.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Mapping spreadsheet fields to Teamleader Focus contact fields in a Zapier-style integration.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This image shows a field mapping interface, likely within an integration tool like Zapier or a native Teamleader Focus importer. A user is mapping the 'First name' field (optional). Below the input field, a dropdown menu shows data from a 'New Response in Spreadsheet'. The specific field 'firstname' with the example value 'Mathilde' is highlighted with a red box and a cursor icon, indicating it should be selected to map to the 'First name' field in Teamleader. Other available spreadsheet fields shown include 'lastname' (Lacante), 'timestamp', and 'email'.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: A pie chart visualization in Teamleader Focus with view toggle buttons.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This image shows a multi-colored pie chart representing data distribution. In the top right corner, there is a toggle menu to switch between different visualization types: a bar chart icon, a line graph icon, a pie chart icon (currently selected/active in blue), and a numerical '123' icon for list or total views. This interface is typically found in the Statistics or Insights section of Teamleader Focus to analyze metrics like time tracking, sales, or project statuses.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Merge contact' dialog box for merging Alexia Coppens with another contact record.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A modal window titled 'Merge contact: Alexia Coppens'. It contains a single input field labeled 'Contact #2' where the user can search for or select the second contact to merge. At the bottom, there is a grey 'Cancel' button on the left and a teal 'MERGE CONTACT' button with a checkmark icon on the right. This interface is used for deduplicating contact records in the CRM.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Mobile app 'Quick access' settings menu to select and rearrange up to 5 shortcut features.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A modal window in the Teamleader Focus mobile app titled 'Quick access'. It displays a list of features with toggle switches and drag-and-drop handles. The instruction text says 'Select 5 (max) & rearrange the order of preference'. Active toggles (teal) are: Timer, Invoices, Deals, Contacts, and Companies. Inactive toggles (grey) include: Meetings, Calls, Tasks, Quotations, and Work orders. There is a close 'X' button in the top right corner.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: A duration input field in Teamleader Focus with the value set to 90 minutes.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A close-up of a form field labeled 'Duration'. It consists of a text input box containing the numerical value '90', followed by the unit label 'minutes'. This field is typically used when logging time, setting up calendar events, or defining task durations.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Product preferences settings in Teamleader Focus showing toggles for product IDs and stock management
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A settings panel under the 'Products' section titled 'Preferences'. It contains two toggle switches, both currently enabled (teal color). The first toggle is labeled 'Display the ID of products on documents' and the second is labeled 'Manage product stock'. Both options have a small information icon next to the text for additional context.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Create invoice from quotation' dialog box showing options for a fixed amount invoice.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A modal window titled 'Create invoice from quotation'. It contains a 'Choose...' dropdown menu currently set to 'Fixed amount'. To the right, there is a 'Fixed amount' input field with the value '5000' entered. The dialog has a drag handle icon on the top left and a close (X) button on the top right.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: A 'Several lines' multi-line text field in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This image shows a custom field or standard field of the 'Several lines' type. It consists of a header labeled 'Several lines' with a pencil icon on the right for editing, and a large, empty white text area below it for entering multiple lines of text. This field type is commonly used for notes, descriptions, or addresses within CRM modules like Contacts, Companies, or Deals.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The Files widget in Teamleader Focus showing a list of uploaded documents and an add button.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A screenshot of the 'Files' section within a Teamleader Focus module. It displays a table with three columns: 'Name', 'Folder', and 'Date added'. Two files are listed: 'Signature.pdf' and 'Text.doc', both located in 'Folder 1'. A plus (+) icon in the top right corner, highlighted with a teal box, indicates the button used to upload or add new files. Each row has a vertical ellipsis (three dots) on the far right for additional file actions.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The Users management overview in Teamleader Focus showing the Deactivated users tab.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A screenshot of the 'Users' management page. The interface features three tabs: 'ACTIVE (6)', 'INVITED (1)', and the currently selected 'DEACTIVATED (3)'. Below the tabs is a search bar with the placeholder 'Search on name, email'. The table shows a list of deactivated users with columns for 'Name' (including initials in colored circles) and 'Email'. At the top right, there are buttons for 'View report (.pdf)' with a dropdown arrow and a teal 'Add user' button. This view is used for managing account access and viewing historical user data.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Zapier integration setup showing the 'Choose Account' step for creating a contact in Teamleader.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A screenshot of a Zapier automation workflow step titled '2. Create Contact in Teamleader'. The 'Choose App & Event' section is collapsed and marked with a green checkmark. The active section is 'Choose Account', featuring a required dropdown field for 'Teamleader account' which is currently set to 'Teamleader Eline in Eline_92_Demo #2'. There is an 'Edit Accounts' link to the right of the label. Below the dropdown is a security note stating 'Teamleader is a secure partner with Zapier'. At the bottom, there is a large blue 'CONTINUE' button.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Microsoft account permission request dialog for Vectera integration
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A Microsoft OAuth permission screen for the app 'Vectera'. It shows the user 'matthiasvectera@outlook.com' and asks for permission to: 1. Have full access to calendars (read, update, create, delete events), 2. Maintain access to data even when not using the app, and 3. Read the user profile. At the bottom, there are two buttons: 'No' (gray) and 'Yes' (blue). This is a standard step when connecting a Microsoft Outlook calendar to Teamleader Focus via Vectera.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Meeting room access level settings for team admins and team members.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A settings interface showing two dropdown menus for configuring meeting room access. The first field, 'Meeting room access level for team admins', is set to 'Should knock'. The second field, 'Default meeting room access level for team members', is set to 'Can always join'. Both labels include a help icon (question mark) for additional information.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Calendar settings interface in Teamleader Focus Lead capture Booster for syncing Google Calendar.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: The screenshot shows the 'Calendar settings' page within the Lead capture Booster. The sidebar navigation has 'Calendar settings' highlighted under the 'Scheduling' menu. The main panel displays: 'Connected calendar' showing 'name2@gmail.com (Google)' with a 'Disconnect' link. Below this, 'Calendars to check for availability' lists two unchecked checkboxes for 'name@gmail.com' and 'Name2@gmail.com'. There is a dropdown menu to 'Choose a calendar in which events will be created' currently set to 'name@gmail.com'. A 'Timezone' dropdown is set to 'Europe/Brussels'. A teal 'Save' button is located at the bottom of the form. This interface is used to manage calendar synchronization for meeting scheduling.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Email signature with a 'Book a meeting' button for Teamleader Focus scheduling.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: An example of an email signature integrated with Teamleader Focus. It displays the sender's name (John Doe), title (Head accountant), and company logo (XYZ Accountancy Company). Below the signature details is a prominent dark grey 'Book a meeting' button, which links to the user's scheduling tool. At the bottom, standard email action buttons for 'Reply' and 'Forward' are visible.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Project management interface showing how to add a new phase to a project.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: The screenshot shows a project planning view in Teamleader Focus. It features an existing phase titled 'Phase 1' with options to 'Close phase' and 'Add task'. At the top right, there are primary action buttons for 'Add phase' and 'Add task'. A red box highlights a secondary '+ Add phase' button located at the bottom center of the screen, indicating the workflow for expanding a project structure. Filters for 'Filters' and 'Time' are visible in the top left corner.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Export and save options for reports in Teamleader Focus, including Excel, CSV, and PDF formats.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A close-up of the report action bar in Teamleader Focus. It features a dropdown menu for exporting data with options: 'Export to Excel' (primary button), 'Export to CSV', 'Export to PDF', and 'Copy link'. Next to the export menu are a blue 'Restore' text link, a teal 'Save as new report' button, a history icon on the left, and a vertical three-dot menu icon on the far right.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Time tracking form in Teamleader Focus showing duration, start/end times, and dates.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A detailed view of a time tracking entry form. At the top, it displays 'DURATION: 00H39'. The form includes four input fields: 'Date' (set to 17/08/2021), 'End Date' (set to 17/08/2021), 'Start' time (09:29), and 'End' time (10:08). At the bottom, there is a toggle switch for 'Add products' which is currently enabled (teal color), and a teal 'Save' button. This interface is used for logging billable or non-billable hours on tasks or projects.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: A 'Cancel meeting' confirmation dialog with options to send a cancellation email to guests.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: The dialog box is titled 'Cancel meeting' with a trash can icon. It asks the user: 'Do you want to send a cancellation email to the guest?'. There are three action buttons in the bottom right: 'Don't cancel' (black text), 'Don't send' (orange text), and 'Send' (white text on an orange button). This interface appears when a user attempts to delete or cancel a scheduled calendar event or meeting in Teamleader Focus.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Action buttons for exporting projects to Excel and adding a new project in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A close-up of the action bar in the Projects module. It features a toggle for list/board view on the left. In the center, highlighted by a teal box, is the 'Export to Excel' button. To the right is a teal 'Add project' primary action button with a dropdown arrow for additional options. This interface is used for managing project data and initiating exports.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The working hours configuration interface for a user in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This interface allows users to set their weekly availability. It features a toggle at the top next to 'My name' and tabs for 'Hours' (selected) and 'Calendar'. The timezone is set to 'Europe/Brussels' with a 'Change' button. Each day of the week (Monday through Sunday) is listed with a checkbox (all checked), a 'From' time field (09:00), a 'To' time field (17:30), and a '+' icon to add multiple time slots per day. At the bottom, there is a 'Copy availability from' dropdown menu currently selecting 'Chris Jones' with a 'Copy' button, and a 'Reset to default' button.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Form to link a division in Teamleader Focus using Start date, Company ID, and API key.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A configuration form for connecting an external division or integration. It contains three empty text input fields labeled 'Start date', 'Company ID', and 'API key'. At the bottom, there is a teal action button labeled 'LINK DIVISION'. This interface is typically used when setting up accounting integrations or multi-entity synchronization.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: A list of meeting room recordings in Teamleader Focus showing date, room name, user, and file size.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A table titled 'RECORDINGS IN YOUR MEETING ROOMS' displaying a list of video call recordings. Each row includes: a play icon button, the date and time of the recording (e.g., '1 September 2022 08:51'), a clickable link to the meeting room ('john-doe'), the user who recorded it ('My Name' with initials 'MN'), the duration of the recording (e.g., '38m 30s'), and the file size (e.g., '38 MB'). This view allows users to manage and review past meeting recordings.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Quotation preview screen showing how to access the 'Show version history' option via the menu.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: The screenshot shows the 'PREVIEW' tab of a quotation in Teamleader Focus. In the top right corner, there are buttons for 'Convert to invoice' and 'Send quotation'. Within the Quotation header, a three-dot menu is opened, revealing options for 'Edit layout', 'Copy', 'Print', and 'Show version history'. The three-dot menu icon and the 'Show version history' text are highlighted with teal boxes to guide the user to the versioning feature.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: OAuth 2 configuration screen for Teamleader Focus API integration
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A technical interface showing OAuth 2 authentication settings for the Teamleader Focus API. The screen includes fields for Grant Type (set to Authorization Code), Authorization URL (https://app.teamleader.eu/oauth2/authorize), Access Token URL (https://app.teamleader.eu/oauth2/access_token), Client ID, Client Secret, and Redirect URL (https://www.mywebsite.eu/redirect). An 'Enabled' checkbox is checked. Below, a section displays a Refresh Token and an Access Token (expiring in 17 minutes) with buttons for 'Clear' and 'Refresh Token'. The top bar shows a POST request to the customFieldDefinitions.list endpoint.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The Details section of a deal in Teamleader Focus highlighting the Margin field.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A screenshot of the 'Details' widget within a deal or opportunity view. It shows several fields: Amount (€ 1.000,00), Probability (50%), Assignee (Eline), and Margin (€ 1.000,00). The Margin field is specifically highlighted with a teal box. Below these fields is a 'CUSTOMER' header showing the Company name 'EN CLIENT' as a clickable blue link. There is an edit pencil icon in the top right corner of the widget.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Form editor for adding a telephone number question to a Teamleader Focus lead capture form.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This interface shows the configuration for a form question. The 'Question' field contains 'What's your telephone number?'. The 'Type' dropdown is set to 'Phone number'. A checkbox 'An answer is required' is checked. The 'Link answer to Teamleader Focus' section shows a mapping to the 'Contact - Mobile' field. On the right, a 'PREVIEW' box displays how the question will appear to users. Action buttons at the bottom right include 'Cancel' and 'Save question'.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Generic reply to ticket' form for creating email templates in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A dialog window titled 'Generic reply to ticket' used for setting up automated or manual ticket responses. It contains three main fields: 'Template name' with the value 'Generic reply example', a 'Language' dropdown set to 'English', and an 'Email content' text area. The email content includes placeholder tags like #MY_FIRST_NAME and #MY_NAME for personalization. The interface features a teal header with a settings icon and a close button (X).

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Configuring specific user access levels and permissions for a team member in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This screenshot shows the 'Specific access' settings for a user. It features an 'Invite via email' button in teal. Below, a specific user (eline@teamleader.eu) is listed with a 'Resend invite' link. A dropdown menu is open, showing four permission options: 'Should knock', 'Can always join' (currently selected), 'Is host', and a red action link to 'Remove specific user access'. Each option has a help icon (?) next to it for further clarification on user roles and meeting access.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Journals' configuration screen showing settings for a Sales bookings journal.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This interface displays the detailed configuration for a journal entry. At the top, the 'Type / Code' is set to 'V' and 'V1'. A language table shows the name 'SALES' for English and 'VERKOOP' for Dutch. Under the 'General' tab, the 'Entry Type' is set to 'Sales bookings'. Other fields include 'Active period' (0), 'Secured till period' (0), 'Closed until period' (0), 'Number next entry' (1), and 'Closed' (No). A red 'X' button is visible next to 'Delete last invoice/LN'. The top toolbar contains icons for adding, editing, saving, and navigating records (Record 2 of 3).

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Selecting a company entity for CloudSign and InvoiceCloud customisation in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A screenshot of the 'CloudSign and InvoiceCloud customisation' settings page. It shows a dropdown menu labeled 'Company entity' with the value 'Elinedemoaccount' selected. The dropdown is open, revealing two options: 'Elinedemoaccount' (highlighted) and 'Eline_92'. This setting allows users to choose which company entity's branding and configuration should be applied to their customer-facing document portals.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The Booking buffer setting field in Teamleader Focus scheduling
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A settings field titled 'Booking buffer' with an information icon next to the label. It contains a numerical input box currently set to '16', followed by the unit 'hours'. This setting is used in the scheduling or meeting tool to prevent last-minute bookings by requiring a minimum lead time.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Teamleader Focus 404 error page indicating a missing or deleted page.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A standard 404 error screen in Teamleader Focus. It features an illustration of a ladder coming out of a hole with stars around it. The text reads 'Sorry, the page is missing. It might have been deleted or it never existed. Try using search or navigation on the left to find what you’re looking for.' Below the text is a teal button labeled 'Back to the dashboard'.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The quotation actions menu in Teamleader Focus, highlighting the 'Copy quotation' option.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A screenshot of the quotation details header in Teamleader Focus. The deal information includes Deal title (EN DEAL), Company entity (Red Cross), Deal status (Open), and Deal phase (Quotation sent). A dropdown menu is open from the three-dots icon, showing options: Edit quotation, Rename quotation, Copy quotation (highlighted with a teal box), Customise header, and Delete quotation. At the bottom right, there are action buttons for 'Convert to invoice' and 'Send quotation'.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Date input fields for Booking start date and Booking end date
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: Two side-by-side date selection fields in a form. The first field is labeled 'Booking start date' with a value of '2023-03-01'. The second field is labeled 'Booking end date' with a value of '2023-03-31'. Both labels feature a small information icon (i) next to the text. This is typically used for setting the financial or reporting period for an invoice or project in Teamleader Focus.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Checkout screen for adding the Accounting connector Booster in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: The screen titled 'Add Accounting connector Booster' displays details for purchasing an add-on. The left panel lists features: error-free transfers, two-way sync for invoices/expenses/payment status, linking up to 4 company entities, and sync history tracking. An information box states users gain immediate access. The right sidebar shows the pricing summary: billed yearly at €5.00/month, with a breakdown including Prorated amount, Total excl. VAT (€47.00), Total incl. VAT 21% (€56.87), and a Credited amount (-€56.87) resulting in a Total amount due of €0.00. A 'Buy now' button is at the bottom right, along with an 'Add code' link for discounts.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Adding items to a quotation in Teamleader Focus with recurring cost options.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: The 'ITEMS ON THE QUOTATION' section shows a line item for a 'Computer' priced at 1000 with a quantity of 1. The 'Excluding VAT' toggle is selected. A dropdown menu for the 'Type' field is open, showing options for 'One-time cost' and various subscription intervals like 'Recurring every week', 'Recurring every 2 weeks', 'Recurring every 4 weeks', 'Recurring monthly', 'Recurring every 2 months', and 'Recurring quarterly'. The UI includes fields for Description, Price, Quantity, Subtotal, Purchase price, Margin, and VAT rate (set to Sales 21% VAT). There is also an '+ Add discount' button and icons for reordering, adding text, and deleting the line item.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Preview of a draft invoice for NV Teamleader showing the status and amount.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A snippet from the Teamleader Focus interface showing an invoice entry. It displays the client name 'NV Teamleader', the booking status 'Not booked yet', the date '30/11/2020', the total amount of '€ 2.420,00', and a purple 'Draft' status badge. https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The Accounting tab in Teamleader Focus settings showing a connected Octopus integration.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Project budget and profit tracking dashboard showing budget spent and profit margins.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Project task list view showing task groups, assignees, and status labels.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Email notification from Teamleader Focus showing the sender address and contact options menu.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A popover menu for 'Formatting' showing conditional formatting rules applied to a data table. https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Interface for digitally signing a quotation with options for manual or typed signatures.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Configuration settings for meeting buffers before and after scheduled appointments.

It includes two sections: 'Meeting buffer (before)' with a numerical input field currently set to '30' minutes, and 'Meeting buffer (after)' which features a toggle selector with options for 'No buffer' (selected), '5 minutes', and '10 minutes', along with a 'Custom...' link for specific time entries.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: A Teamleader Focus document template showing shortcodes for quotations and sales documents.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This image displays a document layout template using shortcodes for dynamic data population in Teamleader Focus. It features placeholders for a quotation or sale document, including headers like $SALE_TITLE_DETAILED$, $QUOTATION_TEXT$, and $PAGEBREAK$. A table structure is shown with headers such as $DESCRIPTION_HEADER$, $AMOUNT_HEADER$, $PRICE_PER_UNIT_INCL_VAT_HEADER$, and $LINE_TOTAL_INCL_VAT_HEADER$. The body of the table contains shortcodes for item details like $DESCRIPTION$, $LONG_DESCRIPTION$, $AMOUNT$, and $LINE_TOTAL_INCL_VAT$. The bottom of the template includes summary fields for totals using $LABEL_TOTALS$, $VALUE_TOTALS$, and a final $TOTAL_INCL_VAT$ field. This is used for customizing PDF templates for quotes and invoices.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Interface for creating a single selection question in a Teamleader Focus form or survey.

Action buttons at the bottom right are 'Cancel' and 'Save question'.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Instructional banner to select a specific tab to start recording.

Step 3: Fill in the generated MFA token into a text field labeled 'MFA token'. The dialog includes a 'Cancel' button and a currently disabled 'Activate MFA' button at the bottom right.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Add questions' interface in Teamleader Focus for building forms or surveys.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Configuration form for creating or editing a meeting type in Lead capture Booster.
