https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Tooltip explaining the 'Total expected' calculation in the sales forecast dashboard.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A tooltip triggered by clicking a question mark icon (highlighted in red) next to the 'Total expected' amount of € 1.470,80. The tooltip, titled 'Calculation', shows a breakdown: 'Won this month' (€ 300,00) and 'Forecasted to win' (€ 1.170,80). It includes a 'How is this calculated?' section explaining that the total is the sum of the amount already won and the amount forecasted to win for the current month. This feature helps users understand revenue forecasting and deal tracking.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Dropdown menu for selecting data visualization display options
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A dropdown selection menu in Teamleader Focus with three options for displaying data: 'Chart and table' (currently selected and highlighted), 'Chart', and 'Table'. This UI element allows users to toggle between different views for reports or dashboard widgets.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The Insights library in Teamleader Focus showing various sales and deal report categories.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This screenshot displays the 'Insights' module, specifically the 'All categories' library view. The left sidebar contains navigation for 'My Reports' (Favourites, By me), 'Library' (All categories, Customers, Deals, Quotations, Products, Timetrackings, Users), and a 'Coming Soon' section. The main area shows a grid of report cards including: 'Deal distribution across Phases', 'Deal cycle length', 'Best performing Deal Sources', 'Deal distribution across Cities', 'Time until first contact & Touchpoints on a Deal', 'Deal Distribution across Deal Status', 'Top customers by deal profit margin', 'Recurring customers', 'Sales Performance Year over Year', 'Deal Lost Reasons', 'Top products Sales', and 'Average Hourly rate for Employees'. Each card includes a brief description, tags like 'Deals', and the target audience 'Sales manager'.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: A toggle switch to enable noise suppression (BETA) in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This image shows a specific setting within the Teamleader Focus interface. It features a text label '(BETA) Enable noise suppression' followed by a toggle switch. The toggle switch is currently in the 'off' position (grayed out/white circle on the left). This setting is likely found in audio or video call configurations within the platform.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: User permissions and access rights settings in Teamleader Focus
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A detailed view of the user permissions interface divided into several sections: General, Deals and Quotations, Work Orders, CRM, and Invoices. In the General section, 'Calendar' and 'Dashboard' are toggled on, with 'Calendar access' set to 'Own only'. Under Deals and Quotations, 'Deals and quotations' and 'Margin on quotations' are enabled. The Work Orders section shows 'Work Orders' toggled on. In the CRM section, 'Contacts' and 'Companies' are enabled, while 'Mailing', 'Authorisation for time tracking', 'Limited access to CRM', and 'Trends Top' are disabled. The Invoices section shows the 'Invoices' access toggled off. Each permission includes a toggle switch and a brief description of the access right it controls.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Configuration settings for redirecting respondents to a custom URL after form submission.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A settings section titled 'Redirecting' with the subtitle 'Send your respondents to your custom URL'. It features two radio button options: 'Show success page' (unselected) and 'Redirect to' (selected). The 'Redirect to' option includes an input field containing the URL 'https://blog.teamleader.eu'. This interface is used to define the post-submission behavior for web forms or surveys within Teamleader Focus.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The duplicate icon in Teamleader Focus, highlighted with a red box next to a trash icon.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A close-up screenshot of the user interface showing the 'Duplicate' icon (represented by a document symbol with two horizontal lines) highlighted by a red square. To its right is an orange trash can icon for deleting. Below these icons is the top edge of a dropdown menu or input field with a grey downward-pointing arrow.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The CloudSign view for an expired quotation with a 'Request new quotation' feedback sidebar.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This image shows the Teamleader Focus CloudSign interface for an expired quotation (Offerte 327-1). A red warning banner at the top states 'This quotation has expired. Request a new quotation.' The main view displays the PDF preview of the quotation. On the right, a feedback sidebar is open with the following fields: 'To' (elinegrootaert@gmail.com), 'Subject' (Request new quotation), and a 'Content' text area containing the message 'Hi, Is it possible to reopen this quotation?'. Action buttons in the top right include 'Refuse', 'Send feedback', and 'Sign quotation' (which is greyed out). At the bottom of the sidebar, there are 'Cancel' and 'Send' buttons.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Add time tracking' dialog box in Teamleader Focus for logging work hours.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A modal window titled 'Add time tracking'. At the top, an orange notification banner states: 'You are adding a time tracking for: Sara.' The 'DETAILS' section contains several input fields: 'Customer' (dropdown), 'Project' (dropdown), 'Task' (dropdown), and 'Work type' (dropdown). There is also a 'Billable' checkbox which is currently unchecked. All dropdown fields show placeholder text like 'Search customer...' or 'Search project...'.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Add company' dialog in Teamleader Focus showing the company lookup and autofill feature.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This screenshot displays the 'Add company' modal. At the top, a 'Company lookup' field contains a VAT number (BE 0899.623.035) with the status 'Autofill completed'. The form is divided into 'CONTACT INFORMATION' and 'INDUSTRY' sections. Fields populated by autofill include: Company name (NV Teamleader), Primary address (Belgium, Dok-Noord 3A/101, 9000 Gent, East Flanders), and Type of business (NV). Empty fields available for manual entry include Email, Website, Phone, Fax, Sector, and Tags. The interface uses dropdown menus for address regions and business types.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The General information and OAuth2 Credentials setup page for a Teamleader Focus integration.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This screenshot shows the configuration form for creating a new integration in the Teamleader Marketplace. Section 1, 'General information', includes fields for Integration name (filled with 'test'), Contact email, Category dropdown, Author, Install URL, and an upload area for an Integration icon. Section 2, 'Oauth2 Credentials', is highlighted with a teal box and contains read-only fields for 'Client ID' (with a copy icon) and 'Client Secret' (masked with a visibility toggle icon). Below these are fields for 'Valid Redirect URIs', 'OAuth 2 scopes' dropdown, and 'Terms of Service URL'.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Approval status dropdown menu for bookkeeping documents in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A close-up of the action buttons for document approval. It shows a primary teal button labeled 'Mark as approved' with a dropdown arrow. The expanded dropdown menu contains two additional options: 'Mark as refused' and a greyed-out 'Mark as pending'. To the left, there is a blue text link for 'Configure bookkeeping email'. This interface is used for managing the approval workflow of financial documents or invoices.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The Organization details form in Teamleader Focus for entering company information.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A settings form titled 'Organization details' within the 'Basic information' section. The form includes fields for Business name (with a search placeholder), Address, Postal code, City, a 'Legal form' dropdown, and a 'Monthly online revenue' dropdown with a note stating 'Do not include revenue earned offline.' The left sidebar navigation shows other setup steps: Stakeholders, Website profile, Payment methods, Registration document, ID verification, and Bank account.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Overview of the Contact widgets page in Teamleader Focus showing created widgets and embed codes.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: The 'Contact widgets' settings page. At the top right is a teal 'Create a widget' button. Two existing widgets are displayed in cards: 'Contact us' and 'Meet John Doe'. Each widget card includes: a title, delete and edit icons, a preview of the linked form or booking page, a preview of the button style, and a 'USE CODE' section containing the HTML script tag. Below the code block are two buttons: 'Send to webmaster' and 'Copy to clipboard'. The first widget links to 'Contact form 1' with a teal 'Contact us' button. The second widget links to a 'Team booking page' with a dark brown 'Meet John Doe' button.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Mapping a VAT rate to a ledger account and enabling automatic ledger assignment for invoices.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A settings interface in Teamleader Focus showing the mapping of a VAT rate to an accounting ledger. On the left, the text 'Sales 21% VAT' is displayed. To the right, a dropdown menu is selected with the value '700100 Ventes TVA 6 ...'. Below this, there is a toggle switch in the 'on' (teal) position next to the text 'Set ledger accounts for existing invoice lines without ledger account.' This setting is used for bookkeeping integrations and financial automation.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The contents section of a document showing line items, prices, and VAT calculations.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A detailed view of the 'Contents' section within a Teamleader Focus document (likely a quotation or invoice). It features a table with columns for Description, Price excl. VAT, Quantity, Subtotal, and VAT. One line item is visible: 'Random product 1' with a price of € 100, quantity of 1, subtotal of € 100,00, and 0% VAT. Below the table, the 'Total excl. VAT' and 'Total incl. VAT' are both displayed as € 100,00. An edit pencil icon is located in the top right corner of the section header.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Overview of the Teamleader Focus mobile app showing contact details, home agenda, and time tracking.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A composite image of three mobile screens from the Teamleader Focus app. The left screen shows a contact profile for 'Andy Goossens' with general information including address, email, phone, website, and account manager 'Kristof Smets'. The middle screen displays the 'Home' dashboard with a chronological agenda of meetings and tasks like 'Meeting about future', 'Team meeting' (marked as 'Now'), and 'Design website'. The right screen shows the 'Time tracking' interface with an active timer at the top and a list of previous time logs with play buttons to restart them. All screens feature a bottom navigation bar with icons for Home, Timetracking/Timer, Search, and Menu/More, along with a floating action button (+) for adding new items.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Graphic banner with the text 'Teamleader Focus & Ponto' on a teal and white background.
The 'Edit Product' dialog in Teamleader Focus showing product info and pricelist fields.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A modal window titled 'Edit Product' used for managing inventory items. The form is divided into two sections: 'PRODUCT INFO' and 'PRICELIST (EXCL. VAT)'. Fields under Product Info include: Name (set to 'Computer'), ID (set to 'PC11'), Stock (set to '100'), and Min. stock (empty). Fields under Pricelist include: Price (set to '1000.0000') and a Unit dropdown (set to 'None'). Note that the 'Unit cost' and 'Main supplier' fields at the bottom are crossed out with red lines, likely indicating they are unavailable or being removed in this specific context.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Teamleader JIRA integration widget showing action buttons for tracking and conversion.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A small UI component for the Teamleader JIRA integration. It displays a profile icon placeholder and the title 'Teamleader JIRA' with a link to 'Add extra data'. On the right side, there are three teal action buttons: 'TRACK' for time tracking, 'FOLLOW-UP TASK' for creating related tasks, and 'CONVERT TO TICKET' for turning the item into a support ticket.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Edit Time Tracking' dialog box in Teamleader Focus for modifying a time log entry.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A modal window titled 'Edit Time Tracking'. It contains fields for: Customer (set to 'Teamleader'), a 'Billable' toggle switch (enabled), a Project dropdown, a Type dropdown (set to 'Working hours'), and a Description text area containing 'test'. The Duration section shows '07H37' with date pickers for 'Date' and 'End Date' (both 15/07/2021) and time pickers for 'Start' (08:17) and 'End' (15:54). At the bottom, there is a 'Delete' button, an 'Add products' toggle (disabled), and a 'Save' button.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Selecting a start date for a project using the calendar date picker in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This image shows the process of setting a date within a project list or planning view. A date picker pop-up for 'December 2023' is visible over a list of projects (e.g., '61: Project', '60: Project', '59: Offerte 100'). The date '20' is highlighted in grey. Below the calendar, a specific input field with a calendar icon is highlighted with a teal border, indicating where the user is currently typing or selecting a date. At the bottom, another project shows the '+ Start date' button highlighted, demonstrating the action that triggers the date picker. This is used for project planning, setting deadlines, or scheduling tasks.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The Marketplace configuration form for setting up an integration's public listing details.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This image shows the '3. Marketplace' section of an integration setup in Teamleader Focus. It contains fields to define how the integration appears in the public marketplace. Fields include: 'Countries' (dropdown), 'Languages' (dropdown with 'English' selected), 'Short description' (text field containing 'Add outgoing invoices to Exact automatically.'), and a 'Long description' rich text editor. The editor contains a detailed marketing text about the 'Exact' accounting tool, including bulleted lists for 'Advantages of using Exact' and 'Advantages of integrating Exact'. The rich text toolbar includes options for Bold, Italic, Unordered List, Ordered List, and Hyperlink.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: A sample quotation document in Teamleader Focus showing layout, line items, and totals.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: An example of a generated PDF quotation. The document includes: 'From' and 'To' address blocks for Red Cross and NV Teamleader; a quotation number '2025 / 479: Quotation 500'; a date and validity period. The main table contains columns for Description, Quantity, Unit price, VAT %, and Total incl. VAT. It shows two line items ('Example 1' and 'Example 2') under a subtitle. The bottom right displays a financial summary including Total excl. VAT (€ 300,00), VAT 21% (€ 63,00), and a final Total amount of € 363,00. The footer includes a signature area with a digital signature from 'Eline' at Red Cross.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The help and support dropdown menu in Teamleader Focus with 'What's new' highlighted.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A screenshot of the top navigation bar and the help menu dropdown. The top bar includes a plus icon, notification bell with a badge, user icon, help question mark icon, and a time tracker showing 00:00. The open help menu contains links to 'Support Centre', 'Status page', and a 'LEARN' section with links for 'What's new' (highlighted with a red box), 'Getting started', 'Video tutorials', and 'API documentation'. Several links include an external link icon.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: A meeting booking form in Teamleader Focus with attendee details and invitation options.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This image shows a meeting confirmation or booking form. The top teal banner displays the meeting details: Monday 22 January 2024, 11:00 AM – 11:30 AM, Online meeting, with John doe. Below the banner, there are required form fields for 'First name' (John), 'Last name' (doe), and 'Email address' (johndoe@email.com). A checkbox labeled 'Invite more people' is checked, revealing an additional section stating 'You can invite up to 4 more people by email'. Two additional email fields are filled with 'janedoe@email.com' and 'jamesdoe@email.com', each with a red trash can icon next to them for removal.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Add downloadable file' dialog in Teamleader Focus showing the option to add a link.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A close-up of the 'ADD DOWNLOADABLE FILE' interface. It displays the instruction 'Choose a way to present the downloadable file'. A radio button for 'Add link' is selected (indicated by a teal circle), and an adjacent text input field contains the URL 'https://teamleader.eu/downloadwhitepaper'. This feature is typically used when setting up lead capture forms or automated follow-ups where a file needs to be provided to a contact via a URL.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Details panel of a deal in Teamleader Focus showing financial info and customer contact data.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A 'Details' widget from a deal or project page. It displays key fields: Amount (€ 100,00), Probability (10%), Assignee (Eline), Close Date (14/05/2020), Source (Facebook), PO Number (123), and Margin (€ 90,00). Below this, a 'CUSTOMER' section lists the Company (NV Teamleader), Contact (Jeroen De Wit), Contact email, Company email, and Phone number. There is a pencil icon in the top right corner for editing these details.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Send email' dialog in Teamleader Focus showing the email template selection dropdown.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A 'Send email' pop-up window. It features a 'Templates' dropdown menu currently open, showing options categorized by language: Dutch (dep 1, dep 2, lege mail Ghislaine) and German (Danke fürs Telefonat). The interface includes fields for recipient, subject line, and buttons for '+ CC' and '+ BCC'. There is a rich text editor toolbar with formatting options (lists, links, alignment) above a large blank message body area. At the bottom, there is an 'Attachments..' button, a 'Track under' dropdown currently set to 'Deal 176 Sale', and a teal 'SEND' button with a checkmark.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Configure your view dialog for financial forecast settings in Teamleader Focus
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description:
A modal window titled 'Configure your view' used to filter the financial forecast. It contains three main sections: 
1. VAT RATE: Radio buttons to toggle between 'Including VAT' (selected) and 'Excluding VAT'.
2. COMPANY ENTITIES: A dropdown menu currently set to 'All company entities'.
3. STATUSES: Checkboxes to filter the forecast by invoice status. Selected options include 'Draft', 'Subscription', 'Not paid', 'Overdue', and 'Credited'. Unselected options are 'Partially paid' and 'Paid'. 
At the bottom, there are 'Cancel' and 'Save configuration' buttons.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Detailed view of an approved and paid expense for 'Parking' in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: The screenshot shows the detailed overview of an expense titled 'Parking'. The expense is marked with 'Approved' and 'Paid' status badges. Key fields include Company entity (Red Cross), Type (Incoming invoice), Invoice date (16-09-2025), Supplier (NV Teamleader), Total excluding VAT (€ 100,00), and Total including VAT (€ 120,00). The 'Linked items' tab is active, showing that no items are currently linked, with a button to '+ Link items to expense'. Action buttons at the top right include 'Send to bookkeeper' and a dropdown for 'Mark as refused'. Other tabs visible are Preview, Details, and Payments.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Export timesheet' dialog window in Teamleader Focus showing PDF and Excel export options.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A modal dialog titled 'Export timesheet'. It features two large selectable cards for file formats: 'Export to PDF' (currently selected with a teal border and checkmark) and 'Export to Excel'. Below the format selection is a language dropdown menu set to 'English'. At the bottom right, there are two buttons: a white 'Cancel' button and a teal 'Download timesheet' action button.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Lookup for Teamleader dialog showing company data match results and credit cost.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A modal window titled 'Lookup for Teamleader' used for enriching company data. It displays three status messages: 'Match found for this company', a list of 'Fields found' (including Name, Address, Phone number, Email, Trends Top Rating, Financial data like Turnover and Profit, and Employees), and a cost notification stating 'Fetching data costs € 0,20' with the remaining wallet balance. A teal 'BUY NOW' button with a checkmark is located in the bottom right corner.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Customizing the layout of the Company overview page in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This interface allows users to rearrange and toggle the visibility of widgets on the Company overview page. At the top, there are options to 'Restore default view', 'Cancel', or 'Apply changes'. The layout editor shows several draggable widgets: 'Company information' (with a 'Full width' toggle currently off), 'Background information', 'Deals', 'Quotations', 'Linked contacts', 'Linked companies', and 'Meetings'. Each widget has a drag handle on the left and an eye icon on the right to toggle visibility. A note states 'Changes will only be applied to your view'.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Invoices' tab in a Teamleader Focus project showing billable items and invoice creation.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A view of the 'Invoices' tab within a project. It displays a list of billable groups with columns for Title, Billing method, Billable amount (excl. VAT), Subtotal (excl. VAT), and Billing status. 'Group 1' is marked as 'Partially billed' with a fixed price. A sub-item 'G' is marked as 'Billed' with a user rate. 'Group 2' is selected via a checkbox, showing a fixed price of €1.600,00 (80% of €2.000,00) and a status of 'Billable'. At the top right, there is a total 'Amount: € 1.600,00' next to 'Cancel' and 'Create invoice' buttons. A dropdown menu on the left is set to 'Show all'.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Project access level settings in Teamleader Focus user permissions
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A close-up of the user permissions settings for the Projects module. The 'Projects' toggle is enabled (teal). A dropdown menu for 'Access' is open, showing three options: 'According to participation', 'Access to all projects', and the currently selected 'Admin access to all projects' (highlighted in blue). Below this, two partially visible toggles are enabled for 'Show financials on projects' and 'Show costs on projects'. At the bottom, the 'Delivery notes' module toggle is shown as disabled (grey).

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Referral settings for the Teamleader Focus plugin including logo display and referral token field.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A screenshot of the 'Additional settings' section specifically showing 'Referral settings'. It contains a checkbox labeled 'Show Teamleader logo in the footer' which is currently checked. Below this is a text field for 'Referral token' containing the placeholder text 'token'. A help link at the bottom directs users to Teamleader.eu to find their personal referral token. This section is used to manage the referral program visibility and tracking for the plugin.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Edit vacation type employee' dialog box for managing individual leave settings.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This dialog allows administrators to customize vacation settings for a specific employee. It includes a toggle for 'Overwrite the default settings for this person' (currently off) and 'Enable this vacation type for this person' (set to YES). Under the 'LIMITATIONS' section, there are fields for 'Valid from' (01/01/2017), 'Valid until' (31/12/2035), 'Request deadline' (Any time), and 'Duration blocks' (Free choice of hours). Two additional toggles for 'Unlimited' and 'Approval needed' are both set to 'YES'. A 'SAVE' button is located at the bottom right.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Step 2 of a setup process showing user availability toggles for team members.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A workflow step titled '2 Availability' within a setup wizard. It displays a list of team members with toggle switches to enable or disable their availability. The list includes 'My name' (enabled), 'Chris Jones' (enabled), 'Jane Doe' (disabled), and 'John Doe' (disabled). Each user entry has a dropdown arrow and a profile icon or initials. A teal 'Continue' button is located at the bottom right to proceed to the next step.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Export and sharing options dropdown menu in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A close-up of a navigation header in Teamleader Focus showing a dropdown menu triggered by the 'Copy link' button. The dropdown menu contains four options: 'Export to Excel', 'Export to CSV', 'Export to PDF', and 'Share with colleagues'. To the right of the dropdown, there are disabled buttons for 'Restore' and 'Save changes', along with a vertical ellipsis (three dots) icon. Below the header, an '+ Add filter' button is visible.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The quotation details header in Teamleader Focus showing the actions menu for a draft quotation.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A screenshot of the header for 'Quotation 220' with a 'Not sent' status badge. The interface shows key details: Customer (Teamleader), Company entity (Red Cross), CloudSign activity (Online), Margin (+ € 1,00), Assignee (Eline), and Date created (01/07/2021). https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Weekly calendar view in Teamleader Focus showing task distribution and workload.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A screenshot of the Teamleader Focus calendar module in 'Week' view for a user named 'Eline'. Below the dates, progress bars indicate workload for each day: Tuesday, Thursday, and Friday show partial completion in teal, while Wednesday shows a full orange bar. A teal box highlights the '1 task' links under Tuesday through Friday, indicating scheduled tasks for those specific days.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: View switcher toggle between list view and board/kanban view, with board view selected.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A UI element consisting of two buttons used to change the layout of a module. The left button features an icon representing a list or table view. This toggle is commonly used in modules like Deals or Projects to switch between different data visualizations.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The Activities filter dropdown menu in Teamleader Focus showing different activity types.

The 'Customer interaction (13)' option is highlighted, indicating a hover or selection state.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Markdown formatting preview for meeting notes or messages in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This image demonstrates how Markdown syntax is rendered in the interface. It shows a text input field containing Markdown code for three levels of headings: '# Heading 1', '## Heading 2', and '### Heading 3'. https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Meeting link settings in Teamleader Focus showing public and private link options.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A close-up of the meeting link configuration interface. It displays two main options: 'Public link' with a globe icon and 'Private link' with a crossed-out eye icon. Next to the Public link, there is a teal 'Copy link' button. A dropdown menu for the public link is open, showing two access permission settings: 'Should knock' (currently selected) and 'Can always join'. Both options in the dropdown and the main link labels have help icons (?) for additional information.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Status filter dropdown menu in Teamleader Focus showing active and inactive project statuses
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A UI element showing a status filter dropdown. The top button indicates one filter is active with a blue '1' and an 'x' to clear. The dropdown is divided into two sections: 'ACTIVE' containing 'Planned', 'Running', and 'Overdue'; and 'INACTIVE' containing 'Done', 'On hold', and 'Cancelled'. The 'Done' status is currently selected, indicated by a light blue background and a blue 'x' icon next to it.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Dialog box to add a new email forwarding address in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A simple modal window titled 'Add a forwarding address'. It contains a text prompt 'Please enter a new forwarding email address:' followed by an empty input field. At the bottom, there are two buttons: 'Next' and 'Cancel'. A close icon (X) is visible in the top right corner. This interface is used during the setup of email integration or ticket forwarding to redirect external emails into the CRM.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Spreadsheet view showing the syntax for the Dutch VLOOKUP function (VERT.ZOEKEN).
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A screenshot of a spreadsheet cell where the Dutch VLOOKUP formula (=VERT.ZOEKEN) is being entered. A tooltip displays the function's syntax: VERT.ZOEKEN(zoekwaarde; tabelmatrix; kolomindex_getal; [benaderen]). This is a common step when preparing or cleaning data in Excel before importing it into Teamleader Focus, specifically for matching records across different sheets.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Unbilled Time Trackings list in Teamleader Focus with bulk actions for invoicing and management.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A view of the 'Unbilled Time Trackings' section showing 5 total entries. One entry for 'Tom Van Hoecke' (Work Order, 13/03/2024, 1h00) is selected. Selecting an item reveals bulk action buttons: 'Create invoice', 'Mark as unbillable', and 'Move'. The header includes a 'Billing settings' button and a '+' icon to add new time tracking. This interface is used for managing billable hours and converting them into invoices.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Generate invoice Excel export' dialog box in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This dialog window allows users to configure an Excel export for invoices. It features two main dropdown menus: 'Columns', which is currently open showing options for 'Basic columns', 'test', and a '+ Create template' button; and 'Segment', which is currently set to 'None'. The header includes the title 'Generate invoice Excel export' with a drag handle icon on the left and a close 'X' icon on the right.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Form to configure a file upload question for a project overview in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A configuration dialog for adding a question to a form or project. It includes a 'Question' text field with the value 'Upload an overview of your upcoming projects?', a 'Type' dropdown set to 'Upload files', and an unchecked checkbox for 'An answer is required'. On the right, a 'PREVIEW' pane shows how the question will appear to users, featuring a drag-and-drop area with a cloud icon, the text 'Drag and drop your file right here or upload a file', and a 'Max size: 5 MB' limit. Action buttons at the bottom right are labeled 'Cancel' and 'Save question'.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Email confirmation for a booked online meeting in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: An automated email notification sent to a participant (John) confirming a meeting with Eline. The email includes: 1) A greeting and confirmation message. 2) Three tips for a successful online meeting. 3) Meeting details: Date (Wednesday 3 May 2023), Time (9 a.m. Europe/Brussels), Duration (30 minutes), and a direct link to the online meeting room. 4) A list of participants with their names and email addresses. This demonstrates the automated scheduling and communication feature within the Teamleader Focus calendar or lead capture tools.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Windows Control Panel search result for BDE Administrator (32-bit)
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A screenshot of the Windows Control Panel interface. The search bar in the top right corner has 'BDE' typed into it. The search results display the 'BDE Administrator (32-bit)' application icon and link. Below the result, there is a blue link that says 'Search Windows Help and Support for "BDE"'. This step is often required when configuring local database engine settings for specific legacy integrations or sync tools.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Create quotation' form in Teamleader Focus with fields for customer, entity, and validity date.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A screenshot of the 'Create quotation' interface. It includes fields for 'Quotation name' (required), 'Customer' (required, currently 'NV Teamleader'), 'Contact' (searchable dropdown), 'Company entity' (dropdown set to 'Red Cross'), and 'Assignee' (set to 'Sara'). The 'Valid until' date picker field is highlighted with a teal box. At the top, there is a prompt asking 'Would you rather base your quotation on an existing one?'.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Project planning timeline view with a side panel showing details for 'Project 68'.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: The screenshot shows the project planning module in Teamleader Focus. On the left, a timeline view displays several projects as colored bars (Project 68 in orange, Project 67 in purple, and 'Launch new website' in teal) across December and January. A cursor is hovering over the 'Project 68' bar. On the right, a side panel has opened for 'Project 68' showing its details: Project number (68), Owner (Eline), Assignees (Unassigned), and clickable options to add Customers, Company entity, Deals, and Quotations. The top left includes a dropdown for 'Open projects (67)' and a 'Filters' button.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Add Product' dialog box in Teamleader Focus showing fields for product info and pricing.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A modal window titled 'Add Product' containing several sections for data entry. 'Product Info' includes text fields for Name, ID, Stock, Min. stock, Purchase price, and a searchable dropdown for Main supplier. 'Pricelist (Excl. VAT)' includes a Price field and a Unit dropdown (currently set to 'None'). 'Bookkeeping Info' features dropdowns for VAT rate, Company entity (pre-selected as 'Elinedemoaccount'), and Account. A 'Translation' section provides fields for Name FR, Name NL, and Name SK. A teal 'Save' button is located in the bottom right corner.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Payout frequency settings in Teamleader Focus for bank transfers.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: The screenshot shows the 'Payouts' section within the Settings menu. It features a 'Payout frequency' selection list with radio buttons. The options include: 'Every business day', 'Twice a week (Tuesday and Friday and on the 1st business day of the month)', 'Weekly on:' (currently selected with a dropdown set to 'Wednesday'), 'Twice a month (1st and 15th)', 'Once a month (1st business day of the month)', and 'Pause my payouts'. Below the frequency settings is a 'Payout information' section explaining that accounts must be approved and have a balance of more than €5 to receive a payout. The sidebar shows the navigation path: Settings > Payouts.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Email notification for a new incoming invoice received via Peppol in Teamleader Focus
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: An email notification from Teamleader Focus informing a user about a new incoming invoice via the Peppol network. The email contains the Teamleader Focus logo at the top, an icon of a document with a checkmark, and the heading 'New incoming invoice via Peppol'. It specifies the invoice details as '2024 / 1 - Test Company' and includes a blue 'View Document' hyperlink. At the bottom, there is a footer explaining that the email was sent because notifications are enabled, with a link to manage preferences.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Example of a generated invoice PDF in Teamleader Focus showing layout and line items.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A sample invoice document generated within Teamleader Focus. It includes the sender (Red Cross) and recipient (NV Teamleader) details, invoice date (24/09/2025), and due date. The invoice table displays columns for Description, Quantity, Unit price, VAT %, and Total incl. VAT. It features two line items: 'Product 1' (1 unit at €1.000,00 with 21% VAT) and 'Product 2' (0 units). The bottom section shows a financial summary with 'Total excl. VAT', 'VAT 21%', 'VAT 7%', and a final 'Total amount' of €1.210,00. It also includes a structured payment reference and bank account details (IBAN/BIC) at the footer.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The Billing method preferences menu in Teamleader Focus project settings.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A settings card titled 'Billing method preferences' containing a list of configurable billing options. The list includes: 'Project billing methods', 'Group billing methods', 'Task billing methods', 'Material billing methods', and 'Meeting billing methods'. Each row features a pencil icon on the right side, indicating that these preferences can be edited. This menu is used to define how different types of work and costs are invoiced within a project.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Bulk actions toolbar and item selection in a Teamleader Focus project or quotation list.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A screenshot showing a list of items with checkboxes selected. At the top, a bulk action toolbar indicates '10 Selected' and provides buttons for 'Duplicate', 'Convert' (dropdown), and an orange 'Delete' button. The list below shows a grouped structure: 'Group 2' (Time and materials) containing 'Material 1' (Fixed price, € 0,00/item), 'Task 3' (User rate, € 0,00/h), and 'Taak 4' (User rate, € 0,00/h). Each item has a status badge set to 'To do' and a three-dot menu icon on the right. This UI is typically used for managing project tasks, materials, or quotation lines.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: User permission settings for the Deals and Quotations module in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A settings interface titled 'DEALS AND QUOTATIONS' showing toggle switches for specific user permissions. The options include: 'Deals and quotations' (enabled), 'Margin on quotations' (enabled) which allows users to view unit costs and margins, 'Limited deal access' (disabled) which restricts users to their own deals, and 'Dedicated quotations module' (disabled) which adds a separate Quotation module to the main navigation.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Add Project' dialog box in Teamleader Focus showing project details and template selection.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A close-up of the 'Add Project' modal window. The form includes fields for 'Project title' (required), 'Customer' (searchable dropdown), 'Template' (dropdown menu currently open with options: 'Don't use', 'project 4', and 'Team task template' selected), 'Start date' (set to 17/08/2021), 'End date', and 'Budget planning' (set to € 0,00). This interface is used for creating new projects and applying pre-defined task templates to them.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Form fields for selecting Currency, Deal, and document Layout variation in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A close-up of a form showing three dropdown menus. The 'Currency' field is set to 'EUR - Euro'. The 'Deal' field, which includes an information icon, is set to 'Select...'. The 'Layout' dropdown is active, displaying a list with two options: 'Default layout' and 'Second layout variation', with the latter being highlighted in blue. This interface is typically used when creating or editing documents like invoices or quotations to define their appearance and linked data.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: A dashboard widget showing a bar chart for deals in the 'Aanvaard' phase for a specific user.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A Teamleader Focus dashboard widget titled '5 deals in the phase Aanvaard weekly for Samuel Van Daele'. It features a green bar chart showing deal progress against a numerical scale (0 to 8). There is a pencil icon in the top right corner for editing the widget settings. This visualization helps track sales performance and deal stages for individual team members.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Project management interface showing how to close a project phase in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A screenshot of the project planning view. At the top, there are filter options for 'Filters' and 'Time', along with teal buttons for 'Add phase' and 'Add task'. Below this, a project phase titled 'Phase 1' is visible. Inside the phase row, a grey button labeled 'Close phase' is highlighted with a red selection box, indicating the action to complete a phase. Next to it is a secondary 'Add task' button with a dropdown arrow.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The Stripe authorization page for connecting a Stripe account to Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A browser window showing the 'Get started with Stripe' page for the Teamleader integration. The page includes a 'Back to Teamleader' link at the top. It features an email input field with the placeholder 'ik@example.nl' and a message stating that the form must be completed by a business owner or person with management responsibility. At the bottom, there is a teal 'Continue' button with a right arrow icon. This is a step in setting up online payments via Stripe within Teamleader Focus.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: AdGuard Preferences window showing Stealth Mode settings and Browser API options.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: The screenshot displays the 'Stealth Mode' section of AdGuard Preferences. The main 'Advanced tracking protection' checkbox is enabled. Within the 'Browser API' sub-tab, the following settings are visible: 'Block WebRTC' (unchecked), 'Block Push API' (checked), and 'Block Location API' (checked). The top navigation bar includes icons for General, Filters, Stealth Mode, Security, Extensions, and Network.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: A simplified illustration of the Teamleader Focus invoice preview interface.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A stylized graphic representing the Teamleader Focus user interface. It shows a dark sidebar on the left with navigation placeholders. The main content area is titled 'Invoice' and displays a simplified document layout representing an invoice template, including sections for header information, a line-item table with columns for descriptions and prices, and a total amount at the bottom. Two action buttons are visible in the top right corner.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Status filter dropdown in the Work breakdown tab of a Teamleader Focus project.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A close-up view of the 'Work breakdown' tab within a project. The 'Status' filter dropdown is open, showing four color-coded options: 'To do' (grey), 'In progress' (purple), 'On hold' (orange), and 'Done' (teal). https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Budget spent widget in Teamleader Focus showing project costs for time and materials.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A project budget tracking widget showing 'Budget spent (23,8%)' with a progress bar. It displays a total spent amount of € 2.378,42 out of a total budget of € 10.000,00. Below the total, the costs are broken down into two categories: 'Time' (€ 2.278,42) and 'Materials' (€ 100,00). This view is used for monitoring project profitability and budget management.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Contact information header in Teamleader Focus with the actions dropdown menu open.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A screenshot of the 'Contact information' section for a contact named Donatello Di Niccolo. The contact is linked to 'Mirage Studios', 'Teamleader', and 'NV Teamleader'. In the top right corner, there is a pencil icon for editing and a three-dot vertical menu button that is currently open. https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Preferences setting to send quotations as attachments to customers.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A screenshot of the 'Preferences' section in Teamleader Focus. It shows a single toggle switch that is currently enabled (teal color). The text next to the toggle reads: 'Send quotations in attachment when sending to customers'. This setting controls whether a PDF version of a quotation is automatically attached to the email sent to a client.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Add segment' dialog in Teamleader Focus showing how to create a segment with specific rules.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This screenshot displays the 'Add segment' interface. Under 'GENERAL INFORMATION', the segment is named 'Linked contacts + linked compan' and the visibility toggle 'Only I can see this segment' is set to 'YES'. There is a link for 'Show advanced options'. In the 'SEGMENT RULES' section, the logic is set to 'All rules must apply'. Rule 1 is highlighted in a red box and consists of three dropdowns: 'Companies', 'Is in segment', and 'All companies (17)'. A plus (+) button allows adding more rules, and a trash icon is available to delete the current rule. At the bottom, there is a toggle for 'Export segment to Mailchimp' (currently off) and a teal 'SAVE' button with a checkmark.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Warning message for an online meeting type indicating a missing calendar connection.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A card for an 'Online meeting' type in Teamleader Focus. It features a blue 'Online' tag with a video icon. An orange exclamation mark icon is next to the title, which triggers a dark tooltip message stating: 'John Doe has not set up their calendar connection. Customers won't be able to book this meeting type with them until this connection is set up.' The card also shows a duration of '30 minutes', a share icon, a three-dot menu, and a user avatar with the initials 'JD'.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The Excel Export Template configuration screen in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This screen allows users to create a custom Excel export template. It features a 'Template name' text input field. Below, there are two side-by-side selection boxes: 'Available columns' on the left and 'Selected columns' on the right. The 'Available columns' list includes fields like APE Code, Account manager, Active, BIC - SWIFT, and Background information (which is highlighted with a red circle). Arrow buttons between the boxes allow moving fields between lists. The right side includes up and down arrows for reordering selected columns. A 'Save' button is located at the bottom right, and a 'Go back' button at the bottom left. A red circle also highlights the right arrow button, indicating the action of adding a field to the export template.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Activity log entry showing a deal close date change in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A single line from a deal's activity history or timeline. It features a red calendar icon on the left. The text states: 'Billy Madison changed the close date of deal Transport to 19/04/2019 (2 days later).' On the far right, a timestamp indicates this happened '2 minutes ago'. This illustrates how the system tracks manual changes to deal closing dates and provides a clear audit trail.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Column settings menu in a Teamleader Focus table showing the 'Add as percentage column' option.

A three-dot vertical menu is open, highlighting the 'Add as percentage column' option with a teal box. Other menu options include: Sort ascending, Sort descending, Move left, Move right, Pin, Calculation: Sum, and Hide column. The table shows currency values in Euros and a total sum of € 28.445,34.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: A table showing line items for an invoice or quotation with descriptions, prices, and VAT rates.

VAT, Quantity, Subtotal, and VAT. https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Unbilled time spent' table in Teamleader Focus showing a workorder entry.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Add Autoreply' form in Teamleader Focus for setting up automated ticket responses.

It contains fields for 'Name' (required), a toggle for 'Default reply', and a dropdown for 'In name of' (currently set to Samuel Van Daele). There is a link for 'Advanced options'. https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Global search results in Teamleader Focus showing categorized results for the term 'apple'
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A screenshot of the global search interface. At the top, a search bar contains the keyword 'apple' with a clear (x) button. https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Interface for designing a custom button with color, text, and icon options in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: The 'DESIGN YOUR BUTTON' configuration screen allows users to customize a call-to-action button, likely for a meeting scheduler or lead capture form. The interface includes input fields for 'Button color' (hex code #362626), 'Button text color' (hex code #ffffff), and 'Button text' (set to 'Meet John Doe'). It features an 'Icon' toggle switch that is currently active, with an 'Upload icon...' button for JPG or PNG files. A 'PREVIEW' pane on the right side shows a live rendering of the button based on the selected settings.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The screen sharing options within a Teamleader Focus video meeting room.

The bottom toolbar includes meeting controls: 'Cam off', 'Mic off', 'Leave', 'Settings', 'Recordings', 'Invite', 'Raise hand', 'Chat', and 'Private notes'.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Information banner about saving meeting room content like whiteboards and chat history.
Configuration form for the 'Additional invitee confirmation email' in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This settings screen allows users to customize the confirmation email sent to additional invitees for meetings. It includes an information banner stating that this feature requires allowing additional invitees in advanced settings, with a 'Got it' button. The form contains a 'Subject' field with the placeholder text 'You are invited by {guest_full_name} to join a meeting' and a 'Text' area for the email body using variables like {guest_full_name}, {host_full_name}, {company_name}, and {details}. At the bottom, there are buttons for 'Show preview', a help icon '?', and 'Reset to default'.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: A document template showing shortcodes for department, client, and quotation information.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This image illustrates the use of variables or shortcodes in a Teamleader Focus document template (likely for quotations or invoices). It features a teal geometric logo at the top left. Below the logo, placeholders include $DEPARTMENT_INFO$ and $RESPONSIBLE_PERSON_CONTACT_DATA$ on the left, and $CLIENT_INFO$ and $CLIENT_CONTACT_PERSON_INFO$ on the right. Further down, there are placeholders for $SALE_TITLE_DETAILED$, $QUOTATION_TEXT$, and a $PAGEBREAK$ command. This is used for customizing document layouts with dynamic CRM data.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: How to find WebHooks in the form integration settings.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The Quotations overview page in Teamleader Focus featuring the CloudSign activity column.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Confirmation dialog for closing a project in Teamleader Focus.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Dropdown menu showing file upload options from Computer, Google Drive, Dropbox, and OneDrive.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Dropdown menu showing available numeric and unit-based field types in Teamleader Focus.
