https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Interface for creating or editing a regular email template with placeholders.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A form titled 'Template for regular mails' used to configure email templates in Teamleader Focus. It includes fields for 'Template name' (set to INFO_REQUEST), 'Subject' (set to Thank you), and a 'Language' dropdown (set to English). There is a blue '+' button for adding attachments. The 'Email content' section features a rich text editor with formatting options (Source, Bold, Italic, Underline, Lists, Indentation, Image, and Link) and demonstrates the use of dynamic variables/placeholders like #SALUTATION and #CLIENT_FORENAME within the message body.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Export to Excel' dialog box in Teamleader Focus for exporting data segments.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A modal window titled 'Export to Excel' with a teal header. It contains three dropdown menus: 'Segment' (set to 'Select all'), 'Select' (set to 'Basic columns'), and 'Pipeline' (set to 'Select all'). In the bottom right corner, there is a teal button labeled 'START EXPORT' with a checkmark icon. This interface allows users to filter and choose specific columns before exporting CRM data to an Excel file.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Detailed view of an expense in Teamleader Focus showing line items and attachments.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: The screenshot shows the 'Details' tab of an expense for '2025 / 4 - Test Company'. The expense status is 'Pending' and 'Not paid'. The 'Invoice line items' table includes columns for Title, Description, Unit price (€ 1,00), Quantity (1), Discount, VAT (21%), and Subtotal (€ 1,00). Below the table, the totals are displayed: Total excl. VAT (€ 1,00), VAT (€ 0,21), and Total incl. VAT (€ 1,21). A highlighted 'Attachments' section at the bottom lists four files: two PDFs, one XLSX, and one PNG. Action buttons in the top right include 'Send to bookkeeper' (disabled) and 'Mark as approved' (teal button with dropdown).

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The interactive whiteboard interface within a Teamleader Focus video meeting.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A screenshot of the digital whiteboard feature during a video call. The central area is a blank canvas with the placeholder text 'Schrijf hier iets...'. A vertical toolbar on the left contains drawing tools: undo/redo, image upload, selection tool, move tool, eraser, pen, highlighter, shapes, text tool, and formula tool. The top bar shows page navigation (1/1), the whiteboard name 'Whiteboard 2', zoom controls (90%), and a layout toggle. The right sidebar displays collaboration options: 'Whiteboard', 'Upload file...', 'Share screen', and 'Cobrowse'. The bottom control bar includes meeting actions: 'Cam off', 'Mic off', 'Leave', 'Settings', 'Recordings', 'Invite', 'Raise hand', 'Chat', and 'Private notes'. A participant list at the bottom right shows one user named 'gast'.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: A toggle switch labeled 'Show advanced settings' in the off position.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A simple UI element from the Teamleader Focus settings menu. It features a grey toggle switch on the left and the text label 'Show advanced settings' to its right. The toggle is currently in the 'off' or 'disabled' state, meaning additional configuration options are hidden from the user.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Access settings menu showing options for Private link, Team access, and Specific access.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A settings interface for managing access permissions within Teamleader Focus. It includes three main sections: 'Private link' (highlighted with an orange box), 'Team access', and 'Specific access'. A dropdown menu for 'Team access' is open, showing three selectable states: 'Disabled' (currently selected), 'Can always join', and 'Is host'. At the bottom, there is a teal button labeled 'Invite via email' with a mail icon. Each setting label is accompanied by a help icon for additional information.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Add Product' dialog box in Teamleader Focus showing product info and price unit options.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A modal window titled 'Add Product' used for inventory management. The form is divided into two sections: 'PRODUCT INFO' with empty text fields for Name, ID, Stock, Min. stock (with a help icon), and Purchase price; and 'PRICELIST (EXCL. VAT)' with a field for Price and a dropdown for Unit. The 'Unit' dropdown is open, showing options: None, Price per Meter (selected), Price per Unit, Price per STUK, Price per SET, Price per km, and Price per Richtprijs. A close 'X' button is visible in the top right corner.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Financial forecasting dashboard in Teamleader Focus showing expected revenue across three months.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: The 'Your financial forecasting' screen displays a multi-column view of projected income. It includes a sidebar for 'DATE PASSED/MISSING' invoices and three main columns for specific months (December, January, February). Each month shows the total expected amount (incl. VAT) with a 'View calculation' link. Individual cards within columns represent outgoing invoices, displaying the client name (e.g., Teamleader, Apple, Elinetest2), invoice number or status, date, and amount. Status badges like 'Overdue', 'Not paid', and 'Subscription' are visible on the cards. Top navigation includes filters for entity selection and status, plus a search bar and global action buttons.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The Meetings overview in the Lead capture Booster showing upcoming scheduled appointments.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: The screenshot shows the 'Meetings' section within the Teamleader Focus Lead capture Booster. A sidebar navigation on the left highlights 'Meetings' under the 'Scheduling' menu. The main view features a toggle between 'Personal' and 'Team' meetings, with 'Personal' currently selected. There is a 'Plan a meeting' button in the top right. A table titled 'Upcoming meetings' lists a meeting with 'John Doe' scheduled for December 25, 10:00 AM–10:30 AM. The table columns include 'Meeting with', 'Meeting Type' (Online meeting), 'Type' (Online badge), 'Duration' (30 minutes), and 'Location' (link to john-doe). An options menu (three dots) is available for the meeting entry.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The Projects overview page in Teamleader Focus showing search, filters, and a saved filters dropdown.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This screenshot displays the top section of the Projects module. It includes a general 'Search...' bar and a 'Filters' button. The 'Saved filters' dropdown is open, revealing a secondary search field and a list of existing filters, with 'Project filters 1' visible. Below the header, a table shows project columns for 'Title' (e.g., '359') and 'Owners' (e.g., 'Eline' with a circular avatar). Checkboxes are available for bulk actions on project items.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Project work breakdown view in Teamleader Focus showing budget spent and task completion status.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A detailed view of a project titled 'Work Breakdown' with an 'Overdue' status badge. The interface includes a 'Details' card showing the project number (116), customer (NV Teamleader), and dates (16/04 - 06/08/2020). Below the details, there are project metrics: 'BUDGET SPENT' highlighted in a red box showing € 630,00, 'BUDGET PROVIDED' (empty), and 'COMPLETED' tasks (2/5) with a progress bar. At the bottom, there are filter options including a 'Budget' dropdown highlighted in red, and action buttons for 'Add phase' and 'Add task'. This screen is used for project management and tracking financial progress against tasks.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Adding line items and discounts to a quotation in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: The 'ITEMS ON THE QUOTATION' interface showing how to add products and discounts. It features a toggle for 'Including VAT' or 'Excluding VAT' (currently set to Excluding). The table includes columns for Description, Price, Quantity, Subtotal, Type, and VAT rate. Line 1 shows an 'Extra product' at 100 EUR. Line 2 shows an 'Early bird discount' entered as a negative price of -20 EUR. Both items are set to 'One-time cost' and 'Sales 21% VAT'. Action icons on the right allow for reordering, adding subtitles, or deleting lines. The bottom right displays the calculation: Total excl. VAT (€80.00), VAT 21% (€16.80), and Total incl. VAT (€96.80).

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Notification that a person was not found in Teamleader Focus with an 'Add to Teamleader' button.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A horizontal banner or notification bar typically found in browser extensions or integrations. On the left, it displays the text 'This person was not found in Teamleader.' On the right, there is a teal action button labeled 'ADD TO TEAMLEADER' to create a new contact record for the unrecognized person.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: A grey circular sync or refresh icon with two arrows.
The 'Add Invoice' form in Teamleader Focus showing layout selection options.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A close-up of the 'Add Invoice' creation screen. It features several input fields: 'Company entity' (set to Elinedemoaccount), 'Customer' (with a search icon and placeholder 'Select customer...'), 'Attn.', 'Project', and 'Bank account'. The 'Layout' dropdown menu is expanded, showing options: 'Default layout', 'Layout 2' (highlighted in blue), 'Abonnement', and 'Alternative layout'. This interface allows users to choose specific document templates when creating a new invoice.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Calendar week view in Teamleader Focus showing scheduled meetings and online appointments.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A screenshot of the Teamleader Focus Calendar module in 'Week' view. The interface shows a schedule for Week 38 (19 - 25 September). Navigation buttons (left/right arrows) and view toggles (Day, Week, Month, Team) are visible at the top. On Monday 19/9 at 9:00 AM, there is a blue event block labeled 'Test Sala Riunioni Online'. On Friday 23/9 at 10:00 AM, there is a blue event block highlighted with a red box labeled '[Online] 30 minute', demonstrating how online meeting bookings appear in the calendar schedule.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Notification showing the results of an accounting synchronization with Octopus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A confirmation dialog titled 'Accounting synchronization finished' for the Octopus integration. It displays a summary of the sync results: '1 invoices not synchronized' (warning icon), '1 expense invoices not synchronized' (warning icon), and '1 invoices synchronized' (green checkmark). It includes a link to the support center for troubleshooting steps.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Add-on management screen for Project management and Shared inbox features in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This image shows two feature add-on cards within the Teamleader Focus subscription or settings area. The first card is for 'Project management' priced at €35/month (billed yearly), featuring a 'What's in it?' expandable link and a 'Try for free' button with a dropdown menu showing the 'Add' option. The second card is for 'Shared inbox' priced at €50/month (billed yearly), also with a 'What's in it?' link and a 'Remove' button, indicating this feature is currently active. These cards allow users to manage their subscription by adding or removing specific modules.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: A segmented toggle switch with options for Personal, Team, and All views.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A horizontal segmented control or toggle switch used for filtering data views in Teamleader Focus. It contains three buttons: 'Personal', 'Team', and 'All'. The 'Personal' button is currently selected, indicated by a dark blue-grey background and white text. The 'Team' and 'All' buttons are unselected, shown with a light grey background and black text. This UI element is typically used in modules like Tasks, Calendar, or Deals to switch between individual and shared visibility.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Preview of a 'Contact us' web2lead form configuration in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This image shows a card for a specific web2lead form named 'Contact us'. The card includes a document icon with the label 'Contact form 1' and a preview of a teal button labeled 'Contact us' with the Teamleader logo. In the top right corner, there are action icons for deleting (trash can) and editing (pencil). Below the main preview area, a section header 'USE CODE' is visible, indicating where users can find the integration code for their website.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Google reCAPTCHA registration form for setting up website security keys.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: The screenshot shows the 'Register a new site' form in Google reCAPTCHA, which is a prerequisite step for integrating secure forms in Teamleader Focus. The form includes a 'Label' text field (placeholder 'e.g. example.com') and a 'reCAPTCHA type' selection. In this view, 'reCAPTCHA v2' is selected, specifically the 'Invisible reCAPTCHA badge' option, which validates requests in the background. Other visible options include 'reCAPTCHA v3', 'I'm not a robot Checkbox', and 'reCAPTCHA Android'. This setup is necessary for users wanting to protect their Teamleader Focus web2lead forms from spam.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The Payment information step in the 'Fill in company information' setup wizard in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A setup wizard screen titled 'Fill in company information'. On the left, a sidebar shows a checklist of steps: 'Company details', 'Company address', 'Payment information' (currently selected), and 'Company logo', all marked with teal checkmarks. The main panel is titled 'Payment information' with the subtitle 'This information gets used in Teamleader Focus for your invoices.' It contains three 'RECOMMENDED FIELDS' with example data: 'Bank' (KBC), 'IBAN' (BE54 0689 3497 0697), and 'Swift/BIC' (KREDBEBB). This interface is used for initial account configuration and setting up invoice templates.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The Teamleader Focus mobile app dashboard showing the Quick access menu with the Expenses shortcut.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A screenshot of the Teamleader Focus mobile app home screen. At the top, a personalized greeting 'Hello! Eline' is visible. Below this is a 'Quick access' section containing circular shortcut buttons for 'Deals', 'Contacts', and 'Expenses'. The 'Expenses' button is highlighted with a teal box, and an 'Edit' link is visible in the top right of this section to customize shortcuts. The bottom half of the screen shows an 'Upcoming today' section for Tuesday, 5 Aug, currently displaying 'No upcoming events' with a message stating 'No calls, tasks, meeting for today. Tap + to create one'.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Exact Online integration page showing an administrator rights error message.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: The screenshot shows the marketplace page for the Exact Online integration in Teamleader Focus. It features the Exact logo and the text 'Exact Online: Add outgoing invoices to Exact automatically.' On the left sidebar, it lists the developer as 'Teamleader' and provides links for 'Support' and 'Knowledge base'. A light blue warning banner is displayed with the message: 'We are sorry, but you do not have administrator rights.', indicating that the current user lacks the necessary permissions to configure this integration.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Browser dialog for screen sharing via Vectera within Teamleader Focus
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A 'Share your screen' browser pop-up window initiated by Vectera Helper. The dialog shows a grid of available 'Application Window' options to share, including Snagit Capture, Vectera Meet in Google Chrome, Snagit Editor, and a folder named 'Internship'. At the bottom right, there are two buttons: a 'Share' button (highlighted with an orange arrow) and a blue 'Cancel' button. This interface is used when a user wants to share their screen during a meeting or support session integrated with Teamleader Focus.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The Files section in Teamleader Focus showing uploaded PDF documents and action icons.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A close-up of the 'FILES' widget in Teamleader Focus. It displays a list of two uploaded PDF files: 'Confirmación ...pdf' (55.77 kB) and 'Presupuesto 130.pdf' (151.61 kB), both with timestamps from 28/07/21. At the top, there is a plus (+) icon to upload new files and a folder icon highlighted with a red border, likely representing a file manager or document storage link.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: A confirmation dialog asking to clear meeting room content before leaving.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A modal window titled 'Clear meeting room content' with a refresh icon and a close 'X' button. The main text asks 'Clear the meeting room content before leaving?' and explains that by default, chat history, whiteboards, and files are kept. It features two primary buttons: 'Keep the data' and 'Clear'. At the bottom, there is a checkbox labeled 'Don't show this again'. This dialog appears in the Teamleader Focus meeting tool when a user attempts to exit a session.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: A column in a Teamleader Focus table showing the status of the 'Latest reminder' for invoices.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This image shows a specific column titled 'Latest reminder' from an invoice or payment overview list. The column displays the status of payment reminders sent to customers. Most entries show the status 'Not sent yet', indicating no reminder has been triggered. One entry shows '12 days ago (#1)', indicating the first reminder was sent 12 days prior. There is also one empty cell in the list.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Project budget status table showing spent, provided, forecasted, and remaining budget figures.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A table displaying budget tracking for projects. Columns include: Budget status, Spent budget, Provided budget, Forecasted budget, and Remaining budget. The table shows three status examples: 1) 'Over budget' with a red exclamation icon and a negative remaining budget of -€ 3.152,83. 2) 'At risk' with a yellow exclamation icon showing a small remaining margin of € 1,25. 3) 'On track' with a green checkmark icon. This interface helps project managers monitor financial health and budget burn rates.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Teamleader Focus dashboard filters for users, segments, and inboxes with ticket statistics.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This screenshot shows a dashboard filtering interface in Teamleader Focus, likely for the Ticketing module. At the top, a 'Users' section displays team members organized by groups: 'Charlie's Angels', 'Team Ghislainetest', 'Management', and 'No team'. Each user has a circular avatar icon. A teal 'APPLY' button is located in the top right. Below this are two dropdown filter sections: 'Segment' and 'Inbox', both currently set to 'Show everything'. The bottom of the image displays three key performance indicators (KPIs) for tickets: 'Autoclosed tickets' (0, -100%), 'Reopened tickets' (0, =), and 'Average replies to close a ticket' (0, -100%).

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: General calendar settings in Teamleader Focus for managing tasks, meetings, and access permissions.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A screenshot of the 'General' settings section for the Calendar feature. It includes a toggle switch for 'Calendar' (currently enabled) with the subtitle 'Manage tasks, meetings and calls.' Below this, there is a dropdown menu for 'Calendar access' currently set to 'All'. At the bottom, there is a toggle switch for 'Team members can see my agenda', which is also enabled (teal color).

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Export options menu in Teamleader Focus showing PDF, Excel, CSV, and Bookkeeping export.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A dropdown menu for exporting data. The primary button is labeled 'Export to PDF' with a downward arrow icon highlighted in a teal box. When clicked, it reveals a list of additional options: 'Export to Excel' (also highlighted in a teal box), 'Export to CSV', and 'Bookkeeping export'. This UI element is typically used for exporting lists of invoices, contacts, or projects.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The filtering interface in Teamleader Focus showing a project status filter set to 'Template'.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This screenshot shows the expanded filter menu in a list view. At the top, a blue 'Filters' button indicates one active filter. A 'Saved filters' dropdown is also visible. Within the filter panel, there is a 'Project status' filter with the value 'Template' selected. Options include a 'Clear' link to reset filters, a 'Save filter' button to create a reusable segment, and an '+ Add filter' button to include additional criteria. A link icon next to the 'Filters' heading allows for sharing the filtered view.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The Cloud recordings table in Teamleader Focus showing meeting room recordings and management options.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A table titled 'Cloud recordings' displaying a list of recorded meetings. The columns include: 'Created at' (showing date and time with a play icon), 'Meeting room' (showing the room slug, e.g., john-doe), 'Creator' (showing the user's name and avatar), 'Duration' (e.g., 38m 30s), and 'Size' (e.g., 38 MB). On the right side of each row, there are action icons for: (2) copying the recording link, (3) downloading the recording, and (4) deleting the recording. The header 'RECORDINGS IN YOUR MEETING ROOMS' categorizes the list.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Add file to contact' dialog showing the folder selection dropdown with 'Add new folder' option.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A screenshot of the 'Add file to contact' interface in Teamleader Focus. It features a 'Folder' dropdown menu currently set to 'Choose...'. The dropdown list is open, showing a blurred list of existing folders under the heading 'Other folders'. At the bottom of the dropdown, highlighted with a red box, are the options 'More' and 'Add new folder'. Below the folder field is a 'File' field. This image demonstrates how to create a new folder while uploading a document to a contact.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: A single line item for a product in a Teamleader Focus document like an invoice or quotation.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This image shows a row from a product table, likely within a quotation, invoice, or order module. The row contains the following columns: product name and code ('123456: Testprodukt'), quantity ('1'), unit price ('€ 90,00'), discount percentage ('0%'), and the total line amount ('€ 90,00').

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Confirmation dialog showing the results of a product import with an option to undo.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A notification box titled 'IMPORTS PRODUCTS' summarizing a completed import. It states: 'You completed an Import around 12:00.' and provides statistics: 'Number of Products edited: 4' and 'Number of related companies inserted: 2'. Two action buttons are available: a teal button labeled 'OK, DISMISS' with a checkmark icon, and a grey button labeled 'UNDO IMPORT' with an 'X' icon.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The Teamleader Focus mobile time tracking interface showing a timer list for the current day.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A mobile view of the 'Today' time tracking screen. At the top, there is a prominent purple button labeled 'Start new timer' with a stopwatch icon. Below this, a list shows two existing entries: 'Timetracking 1' with a duration of 02:00:00 and 'Timetracking 2' with a duration of 01:00:00. Each entry has a play icon button to resume tracking. At the bottom, the screen displays a 'Total: 03:00:00' summary. Navigation arrows for switching between days are visible at the top left and right.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The filter management menu in Teamleader Focus showing options to update, save, or delete filters.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A detailed view of the project filtering interface. The active filter set is named 'Project filters 1'. Two specific filters are applied: 'Customer' is set to 'Apple' and 'Budget status' is set to 'Over budget'. A dropdown menu is open, highlighted by a teal box, showing options to 'Update saved filter', 'Save as new filter', and 'Delete saved filter'. The interface also includes a 'Clear' button to remove all filters and an '+ Add filter' button to include more criteria.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Location settings for a meeting in Teamleader Focus with online and in-person options.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A 'Location' configuration section within a form. It features three checkboxes: 'Online' (checked, with a 'Video Meeting Room' tag next to it), 'In person' (checked), and 'Phone call' (unchecked). Below these options is an 'Offline Location' text input field containing the address '3A/101, Dok-Noord, 9000 Gent'. This UI is used for setting up meeting types and physical locations for appointments or lead capture forms.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: User permission settings for the Insights module and formula-based fields in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A settings interface under the 'INSIGHTS' header showing two toggle switches. The first toggle, 'Insights', controls access to the Insights module and is currently enabled (teal). The second toggle, 'Manage formula-based fields', allows users to create, edit, or delete formula-based fields and is also currently enabled (teal). This screen is used for managing user roles and permissions.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Example of a generated quotation PDF document in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A sample quotation document (Quotation 2025 / 479) showing the layout of a professional proposal. It includes the sender (Red Cross) and recipient (NV Teamleader) details, dates, and a line-item table with columns for Description, Quantity, Unit price, VAT %, and Total incl. VAT. The table shows two example items with a subtotal, VAT calculation, and a final total amount of € 363,00. The bottom of the document features a signature area with a digital signature from 'Eline' for Red Cross.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Notification settings for form completions in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A settings section titled 'Notifications' with the subtitle 'Set notifications for yourself, colleagues and customers.' It contains two active checkboxes: 'Notify a team member when a form is completed' and 'Allow respondents to get a copy of the completed form'. Under the first option, a dropdown field 'Team member to notify' is visible, currently set to 'John doe (You)' with a user avatar 'JD'.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Fill your wallet' page in Teamleader Focus for managing credits and automatic refills.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This settings page allows users to top up their Teamleader credits for Bpost, text messages, and VOIP Twilio integration. It features two main sections: 'Automatic refill' and 'Single refill'. The Automatic refill section includes dropdowns to set a threshold (e.g., 'When wallet drops below €100') and a refill amount (e.g., 'Refill wallet with €500'), with buttons for 'Update auto refill' and 'cancel automatic refill'. The Single refill section contains a dropdown to 'Select an amount' and a teal 'Add to wallet' button. The page is located under the 'WALLET' tab next to 'SUBSCRIPTION'.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: A 'How To' tutorial banner featuring a wrench and gear illustration on a light blue background.
A project phase view showing a completed task with a green checkmark icon.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This image shows a section of a project management interface in Teamleader Focus. It displays 'Phase 1' with a 'Details' link. Below it, there is a list of items: 'Task 1' with a clipboard icon, 'Task 2' which is highlighted with a red box around a green circular checkmark icon indicating completion, and a calendar icon with the number '1'. This UI snippet demonstrates how to identify finished tasks within a specific project phase.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The Meeting rooms overview in Teamleader Focus showing active waiting room requests.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: The 'Meeting rooms' interface displays a list of active waiting room requests. At the top, there are filter tabs for 'Personal', 'Team', and 'All', with 'Personal' currently selected. A 'Create a meeting room' button is visible in the top right. Below the header, there are links for 'Personal waiting room' and 'Team waiting room', along with a notification bell icon. The 'Waiting room' section lists three entries: 'Jane doe is waiting at your personal waiting room', 'john doe wants to join john-doe-2', and 'James doe is waiting at your team waiting room'. Each entry has buttons for 'Join' (teal) and 'Can't join' (white), plus a vertical three-dot menu for more options.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Teamleader Focus support footer with links to help resources and a 'Contact us' button.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A dark-themed footer section divided into four columns. 'Categories' includes links for Getting Started, FAQ, Best Practices, and Training Videos. 'Resources' lists the Teamleader website, Blog, and E-books. 'Support' contains links to the Status page, API docs, Integrations, and Product Updates. The 'Contact' column features the text 'Still some questions? We love to hear from you!' above a prominent white-bordered 'Contact us' button, which is highlighted with a red selection box.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Fill in company information' setup wizard showing company details and date format options.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A multi-step setup dialog titled 'Fill in company information'. The left sidebar shows the workflow steps: Company details (checked), Company address, Payment information, and Company logo. The main panel displays the 'Company details' form with fields for Country (Belgium), Company name (test), Email (test@mail.com), VAT (f), and Invoicing email (test@mail.com). Under 'Other fields', there are inputs for Short name, Phone, and Fax. A red box highlights the 'Date format' dropdown menu, which is open and shows four options: 31/01/2022, 01/31/2022, 31-01-2022, and 31.01.2022.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Excel spreadsheet showing a VLOOKUP (VERT.ZOEKEN) formula for data preparation before import.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A screenshot of an Excel spreadsheet being prepared for a Teamleader Focus data import. The columns include 'First name', 'Companies', 'Country', 'Email address', and 'Company Street+Number'. In cell E2, a Dutch VLOOKUP formula '=VERT.ZOEKEN(B2' is being entered to link company names to their addresses. This illustrates a common data cleaning step to ensure contact and company information is correctly associated before uploading the CSV or Excel file to the CRM.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Browser permission dialog for screen sharing in a Teamleader Focus meeting room.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This screenshot shows the Teamleader Focus meeting room interface with a browser-level permission pop-up asking to 'Allow cloud.teamleader.eu to see your screen?'. The dialog includes a dropdown to 'Select window or screen', a checkbox to 'Mute web site notifications while sharing', and buttons for 'Block' and 'Allow'. The meeting room UI in the background features a right-hand sidebar with options for Whiteboard, Upload file, Share screen, and Cobrowse. The bottom toolbar contains icons for Camera (off), Microphone (off), Leave call, Settings, Recordings, Invite, Raise hand, Chat, and Private notes. This image illustrates the workflow for initiating a screen share during a video meeting.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Resizing a project block in the project planning timeline view using the drag handle.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A close-up of the project planning timeline showing a grey bar labeled 'Project'. A double-headed horizontal arrow icon is visible on the left edge of the bar, indicating the ability to click and drag to adjust the project's start date or duration. The background consists of a grid representing time slots, with some cells featuring diagonal hatching to denote non-working periods.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Items on the invoice' section in Teamleader Focus showing line item details and ledger accounts.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A detailed view of the 'ITEMS ON THE INVOICE' form. It shows two line items with columns for Description, Price, Quantity, Subtotal, VAT rate, and Account. The first line item is filled with: Description 'Bathroom', Price '3750', Quantity '1', Subtotal '3750', VAT rate 'Sales 21% VAT', and Account 'Unknown' (highlighted with a red box). Icons for reordering, adding text, and deleting are visible on the right. A 'SAVE' button is located at the bottom right. This interface is used for manual invoice creation and bookkeeping ledger account assignment.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Screen sharing interface in Teamleader Focus Meeting Rooms showing the Chrome tab selection dialog.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This image shows the process of sharing a screen during a Teamleader Focus meeting. On the right, a sidebar menu highlights the 'Share screen' button with an orange border. Other options in this menu include Whiteboard, Upload file, and Cobrowse. On the left, a native Chrome browser dialog titled 'Share a Chrome tab' is visible, listing open tabs such as 'Settings', 'Customer Meeting add-on | Meeting Rooms', and 'Teamleader Focus'. The dialog includes a 'Share tab audio' checkbox (checked), a preview area, and 'Share' and 'Cancel' buttons. This is part of the Vectera-powered meeting integration.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Overview of the Meeting rooms feature within the Lead capture Booster in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: The screenshot shows the 'Meeting rooms' overview page in the Lead capture Booster. The interface includes a sidebar with navigation for Dashboard, Scheduling, Meeting rooms (Overview, Recordings, Room templates), Contact widgets, and Contact forms. The main content area features a toggle for 'Personal', 'Team', and 'All' views. A 'Create a meeting room' button is visible at the top right. Below this is a 'Waiting room' section with links for 'Personal waiting room' and 'Set up your team waiting room'. The 'Meeting rooms' section includes a search bar, view toggles (grid/list), and several room cards (meeting-room-1 through meeting-room-4) showing their last opened status. A prompt to install the browser extension is visible in the bottom left corner.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Step 3 of the Excel Convert Text to Columns Wizard for formatting data before importing to Teamleader
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A dialog box titled 'Convert Text to Columns Wizard - Step 3 of 3'. It allows users to set the 'Column data format' with radio button options for General (selected), Text, Date (with a DMY dropdown), and 'Do not import column (skip)'. There is an 'Advanced...' button and a 'Destination' field set to '$G$1'. The 'Data preview' section shows a table where the first column is highlighted, containing email addresses like 'info.google.com' and 'sales@amazon.com'. Navigation buttons at the bottom include 'Cancel', '< Back', 'Next >' (greyed out), and 'Finish'. This tool is used to prepare CSV or Excel files for a clean data import into Teamleader Focus.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: A row in the Contact Forms list showing the 'Share your form' button highlighted.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A single row from the Teamleader Focus Contact Forms overview table. The row contains the form name 'Contact Form 1', the number '3', the user 'Eline', and the description 'Contact, company and deal'. On the right side, there are action icons: a pencil icon for editing, a share icon (circled in teal) with a tooltip that reads 'Share your form', and a vertical three-dot menu icon.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Action buttons for 'Send to bookkeeper' and 'Mark as refused' in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A close-up of two action buttons typically found on an invoice or quotation detail page. On the left, there is a white button with a grey border labeled 'Send to bookkeeper'. On the right, there is a teal-colored primary action button labeled 'Mark as refused' with a dropdown arrow on the right side of the button, indicating further status options are available.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Add payment' dialog box in Teamleader Focus for recording invoice payments.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This dialog window titled 'Add payment' allows users to manually register a payment for an invoice. It contains a 'DETAILS' section with three main fields: 'Payment date' (set to 16/02/2023 with a calendar icon), 'Payment method' (a dropdown menu currently set to 'Unspecified'), and a toggle switch for 'Full payment (€ 100,00)' which is currently enabled (teal color). There is a close 'X' button in the top right corner.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Customization settings for the Lead capture Booster in Teamleader Focus
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: The screenshot shows the 'Customization' section within the Lead capture Booster settings. On the left, a sidebar menu lists options like Dashboard, Scheduling, Meeting rooms, Contact widgets, Contact forms, and Settings (with sub-items: Team settings, Customization, Team members, and Integrations). The main 'Customization' panel includes a 'Brand' section with fields for: 'Team name' (currently 'Company name'), 'Homepage' URL, 'Brand color' (hex code #00b2b2 with a 'Preview' button), and a 'Logo' upload section. An orange warning box notes that changing the team name will update meeting room and booking links, with an 'Undo changes' option and a 'More information' link.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Selecting or creating a deal from a dropdown menu in a Teamleader Focus document form.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A close-up of a form, likely for an invoice or quotation, showing the 'Deal' selection field. The 'Currency' field is set to 'EUR - Euro'. The 'Deal' dropdown is open, displaying a list of existing deals (e.g., 'Deal 283: IT DEAL', 'Deal 282: DE DEAL') with a scrollbar. At the bottom of the dropdown list, there is a '+ New deal' button highlighted with a teal border, allowing users to create a new deal directly from this interface. Other visible labels include 'Layout', 'Discount', 'Discount2', 'Quantity', and 'Subtotal'.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Add company' dialog box in Teamleader Focus with fields for contact and industry information.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A modal window titled 'Add company'. It features a 'Company lookup' search bar for VAT, KVK, or SIRET numbers. The form is divided into sections: 'CONTACT INFORMATION' includes fields for Company name, Email, Primary address (Street, No, Zip code, City, Province), Website, Phone, Fax, Language (set to Dutch), Account manager (set to Eline), External ID, and a toggle for 'Opt-in marketing emails'. The 'INDUSTRY' section on the right has dropdowns for Type of business, Sector, and Tags. At the bottom, there is a 'FINANCIAL INFORMATION' section with a VAT number field and VAT liability dropdown. Action buttons 'Cancel' and 'Save' are located in the bottom right corner.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Approval and payment options for an expense in Teamleader Focus with a validation tooltip.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A close-up of the expense management interface. It shows a teal 'Mark as approved' button with a dropdown menu containing options 'Mark as refused' (disabled), 'Mark as pending' (active), and 'Add payment' (disabled). To the left, a greyed-out 'Send to bookkeeper' button is visible. A white tooltip points to the disabled 'Add payment' option, stating: 'In order to manage payments your expense must have a total amount incl. VAT.' This highlights the requirement for a total amount before a payment can be recorded on an expense.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Payments' tab in a Teamleader Focus invoice or document showing linked payments.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This screenshot shows the 'Payments' tab of a document, likely an invoice. At the top right, there are action buttons: 'Send to bookkeeper' and a teal 'Mark as refused' button with a dropdown arrow. Below the navigation tabs (Preview, Details, Payments), there is a 'Linked payments' section. This section contains a table with columns for Date, Remark, Payment method, and Amount paid (incl. VAT). Two payment entries are visible, both dated 17-09-2025, with 'Unspecified' as the payment method and an amount of € 50,00 each, totaling € 100,00. Each row has icons for editing (pencil) and unlinking (broken chain link). A plus icon (+) is available at the top right of the table to add new payments.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: API request interface showing a GET call to the companies.list endpoint in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A screenshot of an API testing tool interface, likely from a developer portal. The 'DEBUG' tab is active among options for DESIGN and TEST. The interface shows a GET request method selected for the endpoint URL 'https://api.focus.teamleader.eu/companies.list'. A purple 'Send' button is visible on the right. This demonstrates how to perform a manual API call to retrieve a list of companies from the Teamleader Focus database.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Step 1 of the booking page setup: connecting a calendar provider.

There is a greyed-out 'Continue' button in the bottom right corner, indicating a selection must be made to proceed.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: A 'Track email to...' dialog box with a dropdown menu for selecting where to save an email.

It features a dropdown menu with the following options: 'Save to contact' (currently selected), 'Active projects' (with a specific project '20147 - Demo' listed), and 'Other' (with a 'Choose...' option). There is a close 'x' button in the top right corner of the dialog.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Dropdown menu for selecting or adding a meeting room in Teamleader Focus.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Assignees' dropdown menu in Teamleader Focus showing a list of team members.

This UI component is used for task management and resource allocation within the platform.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Tooltip explaining that tasks linked to a fixed price project are hidden from the invoice.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A close-up view of the project invoicing interface in Teamleader Focus. It shows a 'Project fixed price' header with a checked box. Below it, 'Task 1' and 'Task 2' are listed, both also checked and marked with a 'Project fixed price' status. A cursor hovers over a crossed-out eye icon next to 'Task 1', triggering a tooltip that reads: 'Work that is part of a fixed price is not shown on the invoice.' This demonstrates how the system handles the visibility of billable items when a fixed price agreement is in place.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Date range and duration selector in Teamleader Focus
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A UI component for selecting a time period. It displays a specific date range (06 NOV - 17 DEC, 2017) with left and right arrow icons for navigation. Below the date range, there is a duration selector showing '6 weeks' with minus (-) and plus (+) buttons to decrease or increase the number of weeks in the view.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Excel spreadsheet showing the VLOOKUP (VERT.ZOEKEN) formula being used for company address data.

The cell header is 'Company Street+Number'. In the cell below, the user is typing '=vert', which triggers the Excel formula autocomplete dropdown. The function 'VERT.ZOEKEN' (the Dutch version of VLOOKUP) is highlighted. This image illustrates how to use Excel formulas to clean or map data before importing it into the CRM.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Form fields for assigning an Account manager, Pricelist, External ID, and Tags in Teamleader Focus.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Action buttons for a task including Track time, Mark as done, edit, and delete.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Edit team' dialog box in Teamleader Focus for managing team settings and approvals.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Edit segment' dialog box in Teamleader Focus for configuring CRM filters and segment rules.

Under 'SEGMENT RULES', a dropdown for the main rule logic is set to 'All rules must apply'. 'Rule 1' is configured with two dropdowns: the first is set to 'Name' and the second to 'Is filled out'. There is a green '+' button to add more rules and a trash can icon to delete the current rule. A teal 'SAVE' button with a checkmark is located at the bottom right.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Top navigation bar icons in Teamleader Focus highlighting the sync and notification buttons.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A close-up of the top-right navigation menu in Teamleader Focus. From left to right, it shows: a teal '+' button for quick actions, a sync icon (circular arrows), a notification bell icon with a red badge indicating '1' new notification, a 'refer a friend' icon (two people), a help icon (question mark), a time tracking stopwatch showing '00:00', a marketplace icon, and a user profile avatar with the letter 'E'. The sync and notification icons are highlighted with a teal border.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Invoice line items table showing a deduction for an advance invoice.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A table displaying invoice details with columns for Description, Quantity, Unit price, VAT, and Total. The rows include 'Product X' (€8.000,00), 'Working hours' (€2.000,00), and a negative line item for 'Advance invoice 2016/14' (€-5.000,00). All items have a 21% VAT rate. The footer calculates the 'Total excl. VAT' (€5.000,00), 'VAT 21%' (€1.050,00), 'Total incl. VAT' (€6.050,00), and a final 'Total amount' of €6.050,00. This demonstrates how to subtract a prepayment or advance payment from a final invoice.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: PrestaShop integration page in the Teamleader Focus Marketplace showing features and pricing.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This image shows the marketplace listing for the PrestaShop integration by Synchron.io. The page includes the PrestaShop logo, an 'ADD' button, and a price of '€65.00 per month'. It lists key integration features: importing orders in real time to create invoices, automatically creating new customers and products in Teamleader, and updating inventory levels. The developer is listed as Synchron, with links for Support and Support centre. A bulleted list details Synchron.io features such as real-time data observation, encrypted communications, and no-code platform integration.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Header of the Tickets module showing search, segment selection, and action buttons.

On the far right, there is an 'Actions' dropdown menu button, also highlighted with a teal box.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'New material' dialog box in Teamleader Focus for adding a material line to a project.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: A report table in Teamleader Focus showing billability rate and billable time tracked per user.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Microsoft Outlook General settings showing User Interface options for multiple displays.

Two radio button options are visible: 'Optimize for best appearance' and 'Optimize for compatibility (application restart required)'. https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The Activities timeline in Teamleader Focus showing quotation history and expiration updates.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Teamleader Focus meeting room interface showing a presentation slide and collaboration tools.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Booking form for an online meeting in Teamleader Focus with guest invitation options.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Choose Trigger Event' dropdown menu for setting up an automation or integration.

It features a search and select dropdown menu with two visible options: 'New or Updated Response in Spreadsheet' (triggered when a row is added or modified) and 'New Response in Spreadsheet' (triggered when a new row is added to the bottom). https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Scheduled actions' and 'Files' widgets on a deal detail page in Teamleader Focus.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: HTML Settings dialog for adding a website address or code snippet in Teamleader Focus.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Teamleader Focus API documentation showing webhook registration endpoints and request attributes.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A split-screen view of the Teamleader Focus API documentation for Webhooks. The left panel lists three endpoints: 'webhooks.register' (Register a new webhook), 'webhooks.list' (List registered webhooks ordered by URL), and 'webhooks.unregister' (Unregister a webhook). The right panel shows the technical details for the selected 'webhooks.register' endpoint, including the POST method, the endpoint URL 'https://api.focus.teamleader.eu/webhooks.register', and a 'Request' section. Under 'ATTRIBUTES', it specifies a required 'url' field of type 'string' with a placeholder example 'https://example.com'.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Add payment' dialog box in Teamleader Focus showing payment details and a QR code.

It contains a 'Details' section with fields for 'Payment date' (set to 17-09-2025), 'Payment method' (dropdown set to Unspecified), a toggle for 'Full payment (€ 30,00)' which is enabled, and a 'Remark' text area. It displays read-only fields for 'Supplier name' (NV Teamleader), 'Supplier IBAN', 'Payment reference', and 'Amount' (€ 30,00). A large QR code is visible on the right with the caption 'Scan with your bank app'. The dialog concludes with 'Cancel' and 'Add payment' buttons.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Actions' dropdown menu in the Teamleader Focus contacts list view.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A screenshot showing the bulk action options for contacts. At the top, there are buttons for 'Export', 'Import', and a teal 'Add contact' button. Below these, the 'Actions' dropdown menu is open, displaying the following options: 'Merge' (greyed out), 'Create calls', 'Create tasks', 'Print labels', 'Add tag', 'Remove tag', 'Create invoices', 'Delete', and 'Sync with Dropbox'. To the left, a table column header 'Favourite Colour' is visible.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Teamleader Focus Exchange calendar integration login form powered by Cronofy.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This screen shows the configuration form for connecting a Microsoft Exchange calendar to Teamleader Focus via Cronofy. It lists the permissions required: create new calendar items, delete items created by the app, and view items. The form includes input fields for 'E-mail address', 'password', 'Exchange Server URL - optional', and 'User name - optional'. At the bottom, there is a checkbox to agree to Cronofy's Terms of Use and Privacy Policy, followed by a teal 'Connect Exchange account' button.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Warning message stating 'Some records are not matching' during email domain setup.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: An orange warning banner in Teamleader Focus indicating a DNS mismatch during email domain verification. The text reads: 'Some records are not matching. Check out our troubleshoot guide to resolve the issue. It can take up to 48 hours before everything is processed. Meanwhile, emails are sent via the default "mail@teamleader.eu" domain.' It includes a hyperlink to a 'troubleshoot guide'.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Customizing columns and adding formulas in Teamleader Focus Insights reports.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This screenshot shows the Insights reporting interface in Teamleader Focus. A bar chart displays 'Time tracked' (purple) and 'Non-billable time tracked' (teal) for a user named Eline. Below the chart is a table with columns for User, Date, Time tracked (sum: 4h), Billable time tracked (sum: 0h), and Non-billable time tracked (sum: 4h). A settings gear icon is highlighted, which opens a sidebar menu for managing columns. The menu includes toggles for 'Unbilled time tracked', 'Unbilled time trackings price', 'Work type', 'Cost', 'Role', 'Status user', and 'Team'. At the bottom of this menu, a button labeled '+ Add formula' is highlighted, showing how users can create custom calculated fields within their reports.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Add task' dropdown menu in Teamleader Focus showing the 'Add material' option.

It features two teal buttons: 'Add group' and a split button 'Add task' with a dropdown arrow. The dropdown menu is open, showing a single option 'Add material' being hovered over by a mouse cursor. This interface is used for adding different types of line items to a project or work breakdown structure.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The Statistics widget in Teamleader Focus showing invoice counts and totals.

VAT' (count: 454 in a teal badge, total: € 339.646,86), and 'Overdue' (count: 448 in a red badge, total: € 339.639,02). This view provides a quick financial overview of outstanding payments.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Bulk action to invoice multiple selected projects in the Teamleader Focus project overview.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Add work hour' form in the Teamleader Focus mobile app for time tracking.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Dialog window for logging time tracking and travel distance for a meeting.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Language selection dropdown menu in Teamleader Focus
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A close-up of a form section showing fields for 'Language', 'Pricelist', and 'Tags'. The Language dropdown is open, with 'Dutch' currently selected and highlighted in blue. https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Interface of the Teamleader Focus video meeting tool with a shared whiteboard and control bar.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This screenshot shows the internal video conferencing interface within Teamleader Focus. The main area features a large white canvas with the Dutch text 'Schrijf hier iets....' (Write something here....), indicating a whiteboard or shared notes feature. https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Confirmation dialog for marking multiple invoices as paid in Teamleader Focus.

The dialog features a 'Cancel' button and a teal 'Confirm' button.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Project actions dropdown menu with 'Export timesheet' highlighted.

At the top of the menu, there is a 'Hide header' link and a three-dot vertical ellipsis icon.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Add meeting' dialog in Teamleader Focus for scheduling appointments and meetings.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A modal window titled 'Add meeting' used to create new calendar events. The form is divided into sections: 'CUSTOMER' with fields for Customer (searchable) and Projects (dropdown); and 'DESCRIPTION' which includes Title (required), Assign to (dropdown, currently Laura van Belleghem), Date (16/08/2021), Start time (09:00), Duration (01:00), Demo done, Type, Zoom link, and a large Description text area. A red box highlights the bottom row containing a Resources dropdown and a Location dropdown (selected value: 'BE - The Unicorn').

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Cancel your subscription' section in Teamleader Focus settings.

It includes a warning message stating that access will be revoked on the final day of the license and all data will be deleted, advising users to export data beforehand. https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Add to existing project' dialog box for linking a quotation to a project budget.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This dialog window allows users to link a quotation to an existing project in Teamleader Focus. It includes a project selection dropdown (currently showing '232: Project'). Under 'PROJECT BUDGETS', there are two dropdowns: 'Based on' (set to 'Quotation lines') and 'Impact' (set to 'Add to project budgets'). A summary box calculates the financial impact: 'Current project budget' (€ 10.000,00), 'Price of quotation lines' (+ € 1.350,00), and the 'New project budget' (€ 11.350,00). There is an unchecked checkbox to 'Increase budgets of current project lines by 13.50% as well'. Action buttons at the bottom are 'Cancel' and 'Add to project'.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The color picker and styling options for a form or document in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This screenshot shows the styling settings for a document or form. Under the 'Body' section, there is a font dropdown set to 'Pixelify Sans' and a 'Text color' field with the hex code #000000. The 'BACKGROUND' section includes 'Page color' and 'Form color' fields, both set to #e1e1c7. A color picker dialog is open, showing a visual gradient map, an eyedropper tool, a color preview circle, a hue slider, and RGB input fields with values R: 225, G: 225, B: 199.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The follow-up tab of a quotation showing linked invoices and projects.

At the top right, there are primary action buttons: 'Convert to invoice' (with a dropdown arrow) and 'Send quotation' (teal button). The main content area contains two collapsible sections: 1. 'Invoices (0)', which currently shows no invoices and provides a '+ Convert to invoice' link. 2. 'Projects (1)', which lists a linked project titled 'Administration' with a provided budget of '€ 1.111,00', an end date of '03/04/2023', and a status tag of 'Active'. This view is used to track the post-sales workflow of a quotation.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Mapping Unbounce form fields to WebHook (POST to URL) fields for Teamleader Focus integration.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This interface shows the field mapping process between an Unbounce form and a WebHook. The left column 'Unbounce Form Field' lists source fields like Company name, First Name, Last Name, Telephone, Email, and employees, all identified as 'Text (string)'. Green arrows point to the right column 'WebHook (POST to URL) Field', where dropdown menus are used to select the corresponding destination fields. Below the mapping table, there is a button labeled '+ Add another custom field' and a help link 'How do I use Custom Fields?'. This is used for setting up lead capture automation from Unbounce to Teamleader Focus via webhooks.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Agenda synchronization settings for calendar integration in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This settings screen shows the configuration for an external calendar integration. It includes a toggle for 'Agenda' (enabled) and 'Contacts' (disabled). Under 'Push meetings to', a dropdown is set to 'Calendar'. The 'Available agendas' section shows three enabled toggles: 'Pull from Calendar', 'Pull from Birthdays', and 'Pull from United States holidays'. Under 'Extra options', there are two disabled toggles: 'Also push Scheduled tasks' and 'Also push Calls'. A teal 'SAVE' button is located at the bottom left.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Invoicing preferences dialog box in Teamleader Focus for setting default invoice rules.

It includes three dropdown menus: 'Send invoices to' (set to Automatic), 'Payment terms' (set to 30 Days), and 'Currency' (set to Euro). Below the dropdowns is a toggle switch for 'Automatic reminders' which is currently enabled (teal color). https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Email tracking settings and account connection options in the Teamleader Focus email composer.

The background shows standard email fields like 'From', 'To', and 'Subject', along with a 'Templates' dropdown and a gear icon for settings.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The Scheduling selection dialog in Teamleader Focus with options for tasks and meetings.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The Deals list view in Teamleader Focus with a red box highlighting the 'Close date' column.

The table includes columns for Number, Title, Customer, Responsibility, Phase, Date added, Amount, and Close date. Above the table, there is a search bar, a 'Show all' filter dropdown, view toggle buttons (list vs. pipeline), an 'Export' button, and a teal 'Add deal' button. Example data rows show deals for 'NV Teamleader' with phases like 'Accepted' and 'Contacted'.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Column options menu in a Teamleader Focus list view for a custom formula field.

The dropdown menu includes options to: Sort ascending, Sort descending, Move left, Move right (greyed out), Pin, Calculation: Sum, Edit, and Hide column. A cursor is hovering over the 'Edit' option. This interface allows users to manage custom fields and column displays in list views.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Dropdown menu showing time tracking variables for custom field formulas in Teamleader Focus.

The list includes options like 'Time tracked', 'Non-billable time tracked', 'Billable time tracked' (highlighted), 'Billed time tracked', and 'Billability rate'. Below the input box, a helper text states: 'Type @ to insert a field. You can use basic calculations such as +, -, *, /, ( )'. This interface is used for creating calculated custom fields related to time tracking and billing.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Activity log in Teamleader Focus showing deal updates and a filtering option.

On the right side, a three-dot menu is open for the top entry, displaying the option 'Only show this type of activity', which allows users to filter the timeline by specific event types.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Preferences card in Teamleader Focus for contact functions and salutations.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A settings card titled 'Preferences' within the CRM. It displays two configurable options: 'Number of contact functions: 2' and 'Manage contact salutations'. Each option has a pencil icon (edit button) on the right side, allowing users to modify the number of roles assigned to a contact or customize formal greetings/titles used in the system.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Example of a generated PDF invoice in Teamleader Focus showing layout and branding.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A sample PDF invoice document generated by Teamleader Focus. It features a custom logo at the top, sender (Red Cross) and recipient (NV Teamleader) address details, and invoice metadata including Date (24/09/2025), Due date (24/10/2025), and Payment terms. The line items table includes columns for Description, Quantity, Unit price, VAT %, and Total incl. VAT. It shows two products with different VAT rates (21% and 7%). The bottom section includes a financial summary (Total excl. VAT, VAT breakdown, Total amount), a structured payment reference, a QR code for easy payment, and bank account details (IBAN/BIC).

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Add product' dialog box in Teamleader Focus showing entity, layout, and discount fields.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: A simple gray gear icon representing the settings or configuration menu.
The 'Add contact to meeting' dialog box for sending meeting invitations in Teamleader Focus.

Below the title, there is a 'Search...' input field with a magnifying glass icon and a 'Show all' segment/filter dropdown menu.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The Waiting room interface showing pending meeting requests for personal and team rooms.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Working hours and availability settings in Teamleader Focus
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A settings interface for defining weekly working hours. It features a toggle between 'Hours' and 'Calendar' views. Monday shows a split schedule (09:00-12:00 and 13:00-17:00) using the '+' and trash icons to add or remove time blocks. Tuesday through Friday are set to a standard 09:00-17:00 block. Saturday and Sunday are unchecked. A 'Reset to default' button is located at the bottom right.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Error message for Twinfield integration regarding invoices with undefined booking accounts.

This indicates a synchronization issue between Teamleader Focus and Twinfield accounting software due to missing ledger account information.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Setting to allow guests to cancel or reschedule a meeting in Teamleader Focus.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Info' section of an invoice with a dropdown menu showing 'Change layout' and 'Change Customer'.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: A grouped list view in Teamleader Focus showing deals categorized by month and year.

VAT' column shows sub-totals for each group and a grand total sum of €24.528,86 at the top. https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The Meeting Types overview in the Lead capture Booster, showing personal and team booking options.

Each card features a share icon, a three-dot menu, and user initials (RP, BP) indicating assignment. The left sidebar navigation shows 'Scheduling' expanded with 'Meeting types' highlighted.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Actions' dropdown menu in the Teamleader Focus CRM company overview.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The top navigation bar in Teamleader Focus with the help icon highlighted in a red box.
