https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Spreadsheet example showing how to combine multiple tag columns for a Teamleader Focus import.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A table demonstrating the data preparation step for importing contacts with multiple tags. It contains three columns: 'Tag 1', 'Tag 2', and 'Tags together'. The 'Tags together' column shows the result of merging the first two columns using a comma separator (e.g., 'Lead,Starred' or 'Lead,Prospect'). This illustrates the required format for the Teamleader Focus importer to recognize and assign multiple tags to a single record from a CSV or Excel file.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Example of a generated invoice document in Teamleader Focus showing line items and totals.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A screenshot of a sample invoice document layout. The header displays the invoice number (2016 / 14), date (09/03/2016), and payment terms (14 days after date). The main table contains a single line item with the description 'Closing invoice', quantity '1', unit price '€ 5.000,00', VAT '21%', and a total of '€ 5.000,00'. The totals section provides a detailed breakdown: Total excl. VAT (€ 5.000,00), VAT 21% (€ 1.050,00), and a final Total amount of € 6.050,00. At the bottom, a structured communication reference is shown: +++000/6569/60081+++.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Gmail settings for Forwarding and POP/IMAP configuration
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A screenshot of the Gmail 'Forwarding and POP/IMAP' settings tab, often used when connecting an email inbox to Teamleader Focus. It shows three main sections: 1. Forwarding, with a button 'Add a forwarding address'. 2. POP Download, showing 'Status: POP is disabled' with radio buttons to enable it for all mail or new mail. 3. IMAP Access, showing 'Status: IMAP is disabled' with the 'Disable IMAP' radio button selected. At the bottom, there are 'Save Changes' and 'Cancel' buttons. This interface is critical for users setting up email integration via IMAP/SMTP.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Firefox browser tracking protection settings for the Teamleader Meeting tool.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A screenshot of the Firefox browser's Enhanced Tracking Protection menu for meeting.teamleader.eu. The shield icon in the address bar is circled in orange to indicate where to click. The menu shows 'Enhanced Tracking Protection is ON for this site' with a blue toggle switch enabled. Under 'Blocked', it lists 'Cookie traccianti intersito' (Cross-site tracking cookies). Under 'Allowed', it shows 'Tracking Content'. At the bottom, the 'Protection settings' row is highlighted in an orange box, showing a 'Standard' level. This image is typically used in troubleshooting guides when the Teamleader Meeting feature is not loading correctly due to browser privacy or security settings.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Compatibility table for Microsoft Surface browsers and Teamleader Focus meeting features.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A technical compatibility matrix showing supported browser versions for Microsoft Surface users. The table columns include: Audio & video sharing, Basic support, Screensharing, Co browsing, and Recording. Browsers listed are Chrome (>= 78), Brave (>= 78), Firefox (>= 115, with 'Cooperate only' for co-browsing and 'Viewing only' for recording), Safari (unsupported/red), Opera (>= 113), Edge (>= 131), and Internet Explorer (unsupported/red). Green cells indicate full support with version requirements, orange indicates partial support, and red indicates no support.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The header section of the 'Add Invoice' form in Teamleader Focus, highlighting the Start number field.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This screenshot shows the top portion of the 'Add Invoice' creation screen. It includes fields for Company entity (set to 'Eline_92'), Customer (searchable dropdown), Attn., Prepaid billing (toggle switch), and Currency (set to 'EUR - Euro'). On the right side, there are fields for Layout (set to 'Default layout'), Project selection, PO number, Invoice date (set to 16/08/2021), and a mandatory 'Start number' field which is highlighted with a red box. This form is used when manually creating a new invoice for a client and setting the initial sequence number.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Information dialog about Peppol registration status and instructions for switching providers.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A modal window titled 'Already registered somewhere else' regarding Peppol e-invoicing setup. It features a green success box stating 'You can send invoices via Peppol in Teamleader Focus' and a grey info box explaining 'You cannot receive invoices via Peppol because you’re already receiving in another e-invoicing software.' The dialog provides a two-step instruction list for users who want to switch their Peppol receiving status to Teamleader Focus. It includes a link to 'www.peppolscanner.be' to check current registration and a 'Read more about deregistration' help link. A teal 'Close' button is located in the bottom right corner.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Tutorial banner for profit, loss and budget calculation in projects
Draft work order details in the Teamleader Focus mobile app showing customer and address info.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A mobile screen for a 'Work Order - NV Teamleader' in 'Draft' status. It contains three main sections: 'General information' with a primary address in Gent and company entity 'Red Cross'; 'Customer' section showing 'NV Teamleader' with an edit icon; and 'Working hours' which is currently empty and marked as 'Required' with a '+' button to add hours. At the bottom, a 'Review work order' button is disabled with the helper text 'Please add all required items to continue'. A floating action button with a plus sign is also visible.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Configuration form for adding a date-based question to a Teamleader Focus form.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This interface allows users to edit a specific question within a form builder. It includes a 'Question' text field with the value 'What's your date of birth?', a 'Type' dropdown menu set to 'Date', and an unchecked checkbox for 'An answer is required'. A 'PREVIEW' pane on the right shows how the question will appear to end-users, featuring a date picker field. Action buttons at the bottom right are labeled 'Cancel' and 'Save question'.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'To' section of a campaign setup showing audience segmentation and recipient selection.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This interface allows users to define the recipients for a campaign. It features dropdowns for 'Audience' (selected: ElineG) and 'Segment or Tag' (placeholder: Group or new segment). Below, a 'New Segment' tab is active, showing conditional logic for filtering contacts. The logic is set to 'Contacts match any of the following conditions:'. A specific rule is being built using 'Teamleader.contacts' with the operator 'one of'. A scrollable list of values is visible, including 'België', 'Chimp2', 'E-mailadres', 'Everything', and 'gelinkt bedrijf'. A button labeled 'Update Recipient Count' is in the top right, and an '+ Add' button is at the bottom to add more conditions. There is also a 'Paste Emails' tab option.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Public meeting booking page showing a 60-minute online meeting option with a 'Schedule meeting' button.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A customer-facing booking page integrated with Teamleader Focus. It features a header with the Teamleader logo and the text 'Book a meeting with John Doe'. Below, a card displays details for a '60 minute online meeting with John Doe', including a duration of '1 hour' and the location 'Online meeting'. A teal button labeled 'Schedule meeting' allows the visitor to proceed with the booking process. This interface is part of the Lead Capture and Scheduling feature.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Customer view of a support ticket in the Teamleader Focus ticketing system.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A screenshot showing the external customer portal for a support ticket. On the left, a sidebar displays 'TICKET 6216890' with the status 'WAITING FOR CLIENT' in blue. Below this are two navigation buttons: 'REPLY' and 'TICKET HISTORY'. The main area shows a message from 'Eline' dated '26/11/2019 11:22' with the text 'Would you also like to work smarter?'. The page is branded with 'powered by Teamleader' at the bottom.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Teamleader Focus dashboard showing widgets for Tasks, Meetings, and Calls.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: The dashboard view titled 'Hello! Here's what's up today:' displays three main columns: Tasks, Meetings, and Calls. Each column features a '+' icon to add new items and a list icon for a full overview. The 'Tasks' widget shows sections for 'Overdue last 7 days', 'Today' (e.g., Prepare Mailing list), and 'Upcoming 7 days' (e.g., Intake report, Lead qualification). The 'Meetings' widget displays overdue items like 'Evaluation' and 'Meeting' with relative dates. The 'Calls' widget lists scheduled calls for 'Today' with specific times and contact names like Romanie Assez and Jeroen De Wit. Each item includes a checkbox to mark it as complete.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The Activities timeline in Teamleader Focus showing notes and communication history.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A screenshot of the 'Activities' section within a CRM record. At the top right, there is an 'Email tracking' button. Below the header, an '+ Add note' link allows for new entries. A dropdown filter is set to 'Show all'. The timeline displays two recent entries from 'Eline': one tagged as 'Virtual meeting' with the note 'Meeting went fine, will sign quotation tomorrow', and another tagged as 'Whatsapp' with the note 'He let me know he could meet on Thursday'. Both entries are timestamped '1 hour ago' and include a star icon for favoriting and a three-dot menu for more actions.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The configuration interface for adding a question to a meeting request form.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This interface shows the setup for a custom question in a meeting scheduler or lead capture form. On the left, there are input fields for 'Question' with the text 'What would be the subject of this meeting?', a 'Type' dropdown set to 'Short text (150 characters)', and an unchecked checkbox for 'An answer is required'. On the right, a 'PREVIEW' pane displays how the question and its empty text input field will appear to the end-user.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Dropdown menu for selecting a Billing method in Teamleader Focus.

The dropdown menu is open, showing three selectable options: 'Time and materials' (currently selected and highlighted), 'Fixed price', and 'Non-billable'. This setting determines how a project or task will be invoiced to a client.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The API keys settings page for connecting a Mollie payment account to a website or platform.

The left sidebar navigation shows the 'Developers' menu expanded, highlighting 'API keys'. Other sidebar options include Transactions, Orders, Payment requests, Statistics, Administration, and Settings.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The Meetings overview in Teamleader Focus with a dropdown menu to filter by inactive users.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Example of a generated invoice document in Teamleader Focus showing layout and line items.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A sample PDF invoice generated by Teamleader Focus. The invoice number is 2025 / 40. The line items table includes columns for Description, Quantity, Unit price, VAT %, and Total incl. VAT. VAT (€1.600,00), VAT breakdowns (21% and 7%), and a final Total amount of €1.852,00. Payment information including IBAN and SWIFT/BIC is displayed at the footer.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Unbilled time spent' table in Teamleader Focus with the 'Actions' dropdown menu open.

Three entries are visible, assigned to 'Eline'. An 'Actions' dropdown menu is open in the top right corner, showing options to: 'Create invoice', 'Do not invoice', 'Edit', and 'Export to Excel'. This interface is used for managing billable hours and converting time tracking into invoices.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Activity log entry showing client feedback added to an invoice in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A single entry from the activity timeline or history log. It features a document icon on the left. The text states 'feedback was added to the invoice by the client.' Below the text is a blue 'Read more' dropdown link. On the right side, it shows a timestamp of '< 1 minute ago' and a vertical three-dot menu icon for additional actions.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: User management actions in Teamleader Focus showing the 'Edit week schedule' option.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A close-up of the user management interface. At the top, there are buttons for 'Deactivate user' and 'Make admin'. A dropdown menu is open from the three-dot icon, showing options for 'View report (.pdf)', 'View report (.xls)', and 'Edit week schedule', with a cursor hovering over the latter. On the left, user details like an hourly rate of '€ 99,00/h' and the department 'Administratie' are visible.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Success message after creating a new meeting type in Teamleader Focus
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A confirmation dialog box showing a teal checkmark icon and the text 'Success! You have successfully created a meeting type.' It contains two action buttons: a primary teal button labeled 'Test it live' and a secondary white button with a grey border labeled 'Go to meeting types'. This screen appears at the end of the meeting scheduler setup workflow.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Configuration settings for a Twilio phone number integration in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A detailed settings form for a Twilio phone number (+3278480479). The interface is divided into three sections. The top section includes fields for Purchase date, Last date charged, Label ('BE Sales'), Ring group pattern ('Single user'), and 'Send missed calls to' ('CS TEAM'). It also features toggles for 'Record calls' (YES) and 'Welcome message' (YES), with an 'UPLOAD' button for custom audio. The 'Business hours' section allows setting start (08:00) and end (20:02) times, plus a lunch break toggle. The 'Voicemail, Queue & Forward' section includes dropdowns for 'Mode to use in business hours' (Voicemail), 'Mode to use out of business hours' (Call forwarding), 'Voicemail type' (Text to speech), and 'Language of the voicemail voice' (English). There is a text area for the voicemail message and a 'Forward number' field. Action buttons at the bottom include a red 'Delete' button and a teal 'SAVE' button.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Meeting reminder settings in Teamleader Focus for calendar and email notifications.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A settings section titled 'Reminders' with the subtitle 'Send reminders to invitees before meetings'. It features two configuration rows: 'Send a calendar reminder before the meeting' and 'Send an email reminder before the meeting'. Each row has a toggle button group with options: 'No reminder' (currently selected/active in blue), '15 minutes', and '60 minutes'. There is also a 'Custom...' link next to each row for setting specific time intervals. This interface allows users to manage automated notifications for scheduled appointments.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Field mapping step during a data import in Teamleader Focus
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A screenshot showing the field mapping interface during a CSV or Excel import. A green success banner at the top states '218 records were found. Please match the fields below.' On the left, a column titled 'TEAMLEADER ID' shows sample data values like '4479381', '6770451', and '4802882'. On the right, a dropdown menu labeled 'Belongs to' is set to 'Teamleader ID', allowing the user to map the source file column to the correct CRM field.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Date filter dropdown menu in Teamleader Focus showing 'Date added' criteria
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A close-up of a filtering interface. The active filter button is labeled 'Date added > 01-01-2023' in blue. Below it, a dropdown menu is open containing a comparison operator selector set to 'After' and a date input field containing '01-01-2023'. At the bottom of the dropdown, there is a blue text button labeled 'Remove filter'. This UI is typically used in list views or reports to narrow down results based on creation dates.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Unavailable dates' configuration section in Teamleader Focus settings.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This image shows a form section titled 'Unavailable dates' with an expand/collapse arrow. It contains fields to define a date range: 'Start date' (set to 2023-04-03) and 'End date (inclusive)' (set to 2023-04-07). To the right of the date fields is a trash can icon for deleting the entry. Below the fields, there is a button labeled '+ Add dates' to create additional unavailability periods. This is typically used for managing user availability or holiday schedules within the planning or calendar features.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Google Agenda integration settings in Teamleader Focus showing calendar sync options.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This screenshot displays the configuration panel for the Google Agenda integration. The 'Google Agenda' toggle is enabled. It includes a dropdown for 'Push meetings to' set to 'anneliesdemo@gmail.com'. Under 'Available calendars', toggles are enabled for 'Pull from anneliesdemo@gmail.com' and 'Pull from Holidays in Belgium', while 'Pull from Contacts' is disabled. In 'Extra options', toggles for 'Also push Planned tasks' and 'Also push Calls' are both enabled. There is a link for 'Enable resources in google' with a help icon. Below, 'Google Drive' and 'Google Contacts' integrations are shown as disabled. A teal 'SAVE' button is at the bottom.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Verification modal for Verifactu showing steps to download, sign, and upload identification documents
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A 'Let's get you verified' dialog box in Teamleader Focus. It outlines a three-step workflow for Verifactu compliance: 1. Download the identification document (with a 'Download' link), 2. Sign document (with a 'Read more' link explaining the need for explicit confirmation), and 3. Upload the signed document. The upload section features a drag-and-drop area with an 'upload a file' link, specifying a maximum size of 20 MB and PDF format. A teal 'Close' button is located at the bottom right.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Time tracking dialog for a meeting titled 'Scheduled actions' in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A modal window for logging time on a meeting. The header displays 'Time tracking for meeting: Scheduled actions'. Under the 'CUSTOMER' section, there are fields for 'Project' (dropdown set to 'Choose...'), 'Customer' (filled with 'NV Teamleader'), and a 'Billable' toggle set to 'YES'. There is also an 'Add report' toggle set to off. The 'DURATION: 01H00' section includes 'Start' time (09:00), 'End' time (10:00), and a 'Travel distance' field (0 km) with a 'Calculate...' link. A teal 'SAVE' button with a checkmark is located at the bottom right.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Cloud recordings list view showing meeting room recordings categorized by ownership.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A table interface titled 'Cloud recordings' displaying a list of recorded meetings. The table includes columns for 'Created at' (date and time), 'Meeting room' (hyperlinked room name), 'Creator' (user name with initials icon), 'Duration', and 'Size'. The recordings are organized into three collapsible or distinct sections: 'RECORDINGS IN YOUR MEETING ROOMS', 'RECORDINGS IN MEETING ROOMS OF YOUR TEAM', and 'RECORDINGS IN MEETING ROOMS OUTSIDE YOUR TEAM'. Each row features a play icon button on the left to view the recording. Example data includes meeting rooms like 'john-doe', 'test-meeting-room-1', and 'eileen-thompson'.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The top navigation bar in Teamleader Focus highlighting the time tracking stopwatch icon.

From left to right, it shows: a teal '+' button for quick actions, a 'Shared with me' icon, a help '?' icon, a gift icon for 'What's new', a time tracking stopwatch showing '00:00' (highlighted with a red box), and a user profile avatar. This image specifically points out where to find the time tracker tool in the interface.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Monthly calendar view in Teamleader Focus showing a multi-day event highlighted in red.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A screenshot of the Teamleader Focus calendar module in 'Month' view for August 2020. The interface includes navigation arrows, a view selector (Day, Week, Month, Team), and a user dropdown currently set to 'Sophie Decloux'. Weekend days (Saturday and Sunday) are shaded in a light blue color.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Close-up of the Mini-stats button, pagination controls, and table settings icon.

Next to the pagination is a gear icon used for accessing table settings or column customization.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Table showing CNAME record names for email domain verification in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A table with two columns: 'Record' and 'Name'. It lists three CNAME records required for domain white-labeling or email verification. The 'Name' column contains values with yellow highlight boxes around the prefixes: 'em6905.teamleader.eu', 'tlf94759._domainkey.teamleader.eu', and 'tlf947592._domainkey.teamleader.eu'. https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Forgot password?' screen for Teamleader Focus with an email input field and reset button.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Selection screen to link a contact type, showing options for Meeting type, Contact form, or Waiting room.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Suggestions from your calendar' widget in Teamleader Focus for time tracking.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Beeceptor interface showing a successful POST request for a webhook test.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Browser compatibility table for Teamleader Focus features on Android tablets.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description:
A compatibility matrix showing feature support for various browsers on Android tablets. The table columns are: Android (tablets), Audio & video sharing, Basic support, Screensharing, Co browsing, and Recording. 

- Chrome & Brave: Support version >= 78 for audio/video/basic; 'Viewing only' for screensharing, co-browsing, and recording.
- Firefox: Support version >= 132 for audio/video/basic; 'Viewing only' for screensharing, co-browsing, and recording.
- Opera: Support version >= 80 for audio/video/basic; 'Viewing only' for screensharing, co-browsing, and recording.
- Edge: Support version >= 131 for audio/video/basic; 'Viewing only' for screensharing, co-browsing, and recording.
- Safari & Internet Explorer: Shown with red empty cells, indicating no support for these features on Android tablets.
