https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Edit Deal' dialog box in Teamleader Focus showing deal details and probability settings.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A modal window titled 'Edit Deal' containing several input fields for managing a sales opportunity. The fields include: Title (set to 'Administration'), Customer ('Bill Gates'), Pipeline (dropdown set to 'Second pipeline'), Template (dropdown set to 'Don't use'), Close date (date picker), Amount ('5000'), Assigned to (dropdown set to 'Eline'), Source (dropdown set to 'Unknown'), Probability (%) (highlighted with a teal box and set to '50'), and PO number (empty). A teal 'Save' button is located at the bottom right of the dialog.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The Teamleader Focus meeting room interface showing collaboration tools like whiteboard and screen sharing.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A screenshot of a Teamleader Focus meeting room (URL: cloud.teamleader.eu/.../meeting-rooms/john-doe/). The interface is mostly white, indicating an active session. On the right sidebar, several collaboration options are visible in Dutch: 'Whiteboard' with a pencil icon, 'Bestand uploaden...' (Upload file) with a cloud icon, 'Scherm delen' (Share screen) with a screen icon, and 'Cobrowse' with a browser icon. The top right corner includes utility icons for presentation mode, full screen, signal strength, and a user profile circle with the initials 'MN'.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Microsoft Word Save settings showing how to embed fonts in a document template.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A screenshot of the Microsoft Word 'Save' settings dialog box, often used when preparing document templates (like invoices) for Teamleader Focus. The image shows the 'Save Options' menu with 'Turn on AutoSave by default', 'Allow background saves', and 'Save AutoRecover info' (set to 10 minutes) checked. A red rectangle highlights the 'Font Embedding' section for the file 'Template-Facturen.docx'. In this section, the 'Embed fonts in the file' checkbox is enabled, while 'Embed only the characters used in the document' is disabled. This setup is crucial for ensuring custom fonts display correctly when documents are generated and sent to customers.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Gantt chart view showing project timelines and task groups in Teamleader Focus
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A visual timeline or Gantt chart representing 'Project 67' and its associated task groups (Group 1, Group 2, and Group 3). Each row displays the name of the group, its specific date range, and a corresponding colored horizontal bar indicating the duration on a calendar grid. The project itself is shown at the top in purple, while the groups are color-coded in brown, blue, and orange respectively.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The Excel Export Template configuration screen in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This interface allows users to create a custom Excel export template. It features a 'Template name' text input field. Below, there are two side-by-side selection boxes: 'Available columns' on the left and 'Selected columns' on the right. Currently, 'Teamleader ID' is the only item in the selected list. Between the boxes are arrow buttons (right and left) to move fields between lists. To the right of the selected columns are up and down arrow buttons for reordering. Available columns shown include Maandagvm, Maandagnm, Test2, Dinsdagvm, BIC - SWIFT, Birthday, City, and Country. The footer contains a 'GO BACK' button and a 'SAVE' button with a checkmark icon.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: A list view in Teamleader Focus showing columns for Amount, Latest activity, and Activity status.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A close-up of a table in Teamleader Focus, likely from the Deals or Invoices module. It features three columns: 'Amount (incl.)' showing currency values in Euros, 'Latest activity' showing dates, and 'Activity' which contains color-coded status bars. A red rectangle highlights the 'Activity' column, which displays four red bars, two blue bars, and four green bars. At the bottom right, there are pagination options (10, 20, 50) and a wrench icon for table settings.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Pagination controls showing page numbers 1, 2, 3 and a next arrow
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A standard pagination component used in Teamleader Focus list views. It features the number '1' highlighted in a grey box to indicate the active page, followed by clickable blue links for pages '2' and '3'. A blue right-pointing chevron icon is used to navigate to the next page of results. This element is typically found at the bottom of tables for contacts, companies, deals, or invoices.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Mapping custom fields using IDs and values in a Teamleader Focus integration form.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This interface shows the 'Custom Fields (optional)' section within an integration or automation setup (likely Zapier). It includes instructions to provide a 'Custom Field ID' and a 'Value'. There is one row visible with a text input containing a long alphanumeric ID (be56c4fe...) and a second input field containing a dynamic variable tag labeled 'Step 1 test'. To the right, there are buttons to remove (-) or add (+) additional custom field mapping rows.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Company information settings page showing active company entities and the edit button.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: The screenshot shows the 'Company information' settings section in Teamleader Focus. It features a 'Company entities' list with tabs for 'ACTIVE' and 'DEACTIVATED'. An active entity named 'Red Cross' is displayed with a 'Default' badge, email (test@gmail.com), and VAT number (BE0413773294). Within the entity details, there are sub-tabs for 'Company information', 'Terms and conditions', and 'Peppol'. A prominent 'Edit' button with a pencil icon is located at the bottom right. Other UI elements include a '+' icon to add entities and a link for 'Only send documents via Peppol?'.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Company information card in Teamleader Focus with Trends Top integration button.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A screenshot of the 'Company information' section for a CRM contact. It displays the company name 'NV Teamleader', VAT number 'BE 0899.623.035', and a full address in Gent, Belgium. At the top right, there is a prominent 'Trends Top' button (highlighted with a red box), an edit pencil icon, and a three-dot menu icon. This view demonstrates how external data integrations like Trends Top appear on a company profile.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Add multiple time trackings' interface in Teamleader Focus showing a weekly timesheet view.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This interface allows users to log time across multiple days for specific tasks. The top header displays 'Add multiple time trackings' with a date range selector (20 - 26 Sep). The main area is a grid where rows represent work items and columns represent days of the week (Mon 20, Tue 21, Wed 22). Each row has a dropdown field 'What have you been working on?' with the placeholder 'Select an item'. To the right of each item, there are time input fields (hours and minutes) for each day. The interface includes icons for reordering rows and a trash can icon for deleting a row. The current day (Wed 22) is highlighted with a blue circle.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: A confirmation dialog in Teamleader Focus for updating product unit cost and price.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This image shows a 'Update product' modal window triggered when editing a material or product. The dialog asks: 'Do you want to update the unit cost and unit price of your material?' It features a checkbox labeled 'Update unit cost and unit price' which is currently unchecked. At the bottom, there are two buttons: a white 'Cancel' button and a teal 'Update product' button. In the background, a product detail view is visible with fields for 'Assignees' (Unassigned), 'Quantity' (1), 'Product' (PC11: Computer - highlighted with a teal box), and 'Stock' (100).

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Teamleader Focus calendar view showing a scheduled meeting with distance tracking.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A screenshot of the Teamleader Focus Calendar module. It displays a weekly view for 'Week 25: 15 - 21 June'. The view shows columns for Monday 15/6, Tuesday 16/6, and Wednesday 17/6 with hourly time slots on the left. On Wednesday at 08:00, there is a light blue event block titled 'Meeting at Company one'. Above the meeting title, a location icon and the text '109 km' are visible, indicating distance tracking for the appointment. Navigation arrows and a 'Day' view toggle are located at the top.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Share: Contact Form' dialog window showing options to share or embed a Teamleader Focus form.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A modal window titled 'Share: Contact Form 1' displaying four sharing methods: 1. 'Via a link' with a URL field and a 'Copy link' button. 2. 'Via embedding HTML code' with an iframe code snippet and a highlighted 'Copy embedded HTML' button. 3. 'Via a QR code' showing a generated QR code with buttons to 'Copy QR', 'Copy QR embedded HTML', and a 'Download image' link. 4. 'Via a Contact widget' with a 'Create a widget' button. This interface is used to publish lead capture forms on websites or share them directly with contacts.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The advanced filtering menu in Teamleader Focus with active filters for budget status and customer.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A screenshot of the 'Filters' dropdown menu. It shows two active filter criteria: 'Budget status' set to 'Over budget' and 'Customer' set to 'Apple'. Each filter has an 'X' icon to remove it individually. At the top right, there are buttons for 'Clear' (highlighted with a teal box) and 'Save filter'. At the bottom, there is an '+ Add filter' button. The main 'Filters' button at the top left indicates that 2 filters are currently active.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'New column template' dialog in Teamleader Focus for customizing table views.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A modal window titled 'New column template' used to customize table columns. It includes a 'Template name' text field with the value 'Best-selling items'. Below, there are two side-by-side lists: 'Available columns' on the left (showing options like Address of the customer, Attn, Available payment methods, etc.) and 'Selected columns' on the right. The selected columns are numbered and include 'Amount of items (Item)', 'Item name (Item)', and 'Item price excl. VAT (Item)'. Each selected item has a drag handle and a 'X' to remove it. The dialog features 'Cancel' and 'Save' buttons at the bottom right.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'My account' settings page in Teamleader Focus, highlighting the MFA security setup section.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: The screenshot shows the user profile settings under 'My account'. It is divided into several cards: 'Details' (user name Sara, role Administratie, and language dropdown set to English), 'Account security' (with buttons for 'Link Google account', 'Change password', and 'Log out of all browsers'), 'Email addresses' (listing primary and outgoing addresses), and 'Notifications'. A specific section for 'MFA security' is highlighted with a teal border, containing a mandatory setup warning from the admin and a link to '+ Activate Multi-Factor Authentication'.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Project planning navigation bar with view toggles and 'Add project' button
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A navigation and action bar for project management in Teamleader Focus. It includes a 'Today' link, a toggle switch between 'Days' (selected) and 'Months' views, two icons for switching between list and timeline/Gantt views (timeline selected), and a prominent teal 'Add project' button.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Detailed view of an invoice draft in Teamleader Focus showing info, remarks, and line items.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A screenshot of an invoice draft interface. The 'Info' widget shows the status 'Invoice Draft' with a teal 'Book' button. It lists details like Company entity (Red Cross), Customer (NV Teamleader), and Project (test conversion products). Below this is a 'Download draft (pdf)' link and action buttons for Paid, Send, Incasso, and Credit note. A 'Remarks' widget is visible on the right. The 'Contents' section at the bottom displays a table with columns for Description (PC11: Computer), Price excl. VAT ($1,000), Quantity (1), Subtotal ($1,000.00), and VAT (21%). The totals are summarized as Total excl. VAT: $1,000.00, VAT 21%: $210.00, and Total incl. VAT: $1,210.00.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Project info header in Teamleader Focus showing budget spent and time tracked for a project.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: The screenshot displays the 'Project info' tab for a project titled 'Quotation conversion to project'. The top section includes metadata such as Owners (Eline), Assignees (Unassigned), Customers (NV Teamleader), and Billing method (Time and materials). The bottom section features two main widgets: 'Budget spent' showing a total of € 3.230,00 (broken down by Tasks and Materials) and 'Time tracked' showing 05h00 of billable time.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Selection interface for linking a contact type, with 'Waiting room' selected.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A configuration section titled 'LINK CONTACT TYPE' featuring three selectable cards: 'Meeting type' (calendar icon), 'Contact form' (document icon), and 'Waiting room' (video camera icon). The 'Waiting room' card is highlighted with a teal border and a checked checkbox in the top right corner. Below the cards, a dropdown menu is visible with the selection 'Waiting room of John Doe', indicated by a person icon.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The Invoices tab within a Teamleader Focus project showing financial overview and add invoice buttons.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This screenshot shows the 'Invoices' tab of a project. The header displays project details including Owner (Eline), Assignees (Unassigned), Customer (Fixed price client 150), and Billing method (Time and materials). A financial summary bar shows a 'Billable amount (excl. VAT)' of € 1.300,00, 'Amount billed' of € 0,00, and 'Amount paid' of € 0,00. There are two prominent '+ Add Invoice' buttons: one teal button in the top right and one blue link in the empty state area. The table columns for invoices include Invoice nr., Customer, Date, Amount billed (excl. VAT), Amount paid, and Status.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Banner with the text 'Explore', 'Manage', and 'Build' on a teal background.
Country search dialog in the Wings Boekhouding accounting software integration
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A screenshot of the Wings Boekhouding interface, an accounting integration for Teamleader Focus. The 'Zoeken landen' (Search countries) dialog is open over the 'Landen' window. It features a search tab with a 'Code' input field and a list of countries with columns for Code, Naam (Name), and Oude code (Old code). 'BE België' is currently selected. Action buttons on the right include OK, Annuleren (Cancel), Nieuw (New), Kopiëren (Copy), and Bewerken (Edit). The left sidebar contains quick buttons (Snelknoppen) for Klanten, Leveranciers, and various transaction types. A 'Teamleader Test' button is visible in the top right corner.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: A list of available variables for document or email templates in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A two-column table titled 'VARIABLES' showing placeholders used for personalization in templates. The left column lists the variable tags (e.g., #CLIENT_NAME, #CLIENT_EMAIL, #MY_NAME), and the right column provides a description of what data each tag pulls (e.g., Name of the customer, Email of the customer, Your name). Key variables shown include client contact details like forename, surname, address, phone, and GSM, as well as sender information like name, mobile, function, and email.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: A table showing a successful DNS record verification test in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A small table with two columns: 'Test' and 'Result'. The first row shows a green checkmark icon followed by the test name 'DNS Record Published'. The corresponding result is 'DNS Record found'. This interface is used during the email domain verification process to confirm that the required DNS settings have been correctly configured.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Column header menu in Teamleader Focus showing sorting, moving, pinning, and calculation options.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A close-up of a table column header menu in Teamleader Focus. The primary menu includes options for 'Sort ascending', 'Sort descending', 'Move left', 'Move right', 'Pin', and 'Calculation: Sum'. A secondary sub-menu for 'CALCULATION' is open, showing 'Sum' and 'Average' as selectable options. The background shows a table column titled 'Amount excl. VAT' with a calculated sum of € 6.626,35. This interface allows users to manipulate table views and perform basic data aggregations on numeric columns.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The icon upload setting in Teamleader Focus with a toggle switch and upload button.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This UI element shows the 'Icon' configuration section. It features a teal toggle switch set to the 'on' position. To the right, there is a preview of the current icon (a dark geometric shape) and a button labeled 'Upload icon...'. Below the button, a helper text specifies 'Supported files: JPG, PNG'. This is typically used in settings for customizing document templates or company branding.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The material detail view in Teamleader Focus showing the product selection dropdown.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A detail dialog for a material named 'Material 2' with a 'To do' status badge. The image highlights the 'Product' field with a teal border, showing a dropdown menu with options like 'Service & Support' and '1234: Shower'. Other visible fields include 'Add material description...', 'Assignees' (currently set to Unassigned), '+ Quantity' button, and a 'Planning' section with a 'Start date' field. This interface is used for linking specific products from the database to project materials or tasks.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Edit segment' dialog box in Teamleader Focus showing general information and segment rules.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This interface allows users to modify a CRM segment. Under 'GENERAL INFORMATION', there is a 'Name' field set to 'Dollar', a 'Show advanced options' link, and a toggle for 'Only I can see this segment' set to 'YES'. Under 'SEGMENT RULES', the logic is set to 'All rules must apply'. Two rules are defined: Rule 1 filters for 'Currency' 'Equals' 'USD', and Rule 2 filters for 'Exchange rate type' 'Equals' 'Preset'. There is a plus button to add more rules and trash icons to delete existing ones.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Technical view of the BOB 50 accounting export process using batch files and command prompt.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A Windows File Explorer window showing export files for Teamleader Focus integration with BOB 50. Files include 'Import_facturen.bat', 'Import_klanten.bat', and various .sch and .txt files like 'Sales_customers.txt'. Overlaid is a Windows Command Prompt (cmd.exe) executing a BOBLINK.exe command with parameters for company (CIE=IF), user (USR=JAN), and module (MOD=CUSTOMER). A progress dialog titled 'Link naar BOB 50 (vers. 4.0)' shows a full blue progress bar, fields for 'Dossier' (IF) and 'Gebruiker' (JAN), and an 'Afsluiten' (Close) button, indicating a completed data synchronization or import step.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The Companies overview list in Teamleader Focus, sorted by the 'Total to be invoiced' column.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A list view of companies in Teamleader Focus. The table includes columns for Name, City, Country, Last edited, Unbilled time, and Total to be invoiced. The 'Total to be invoiced' column header is highlighted with a red box and shows a downward arrow, indicating the list is sorted by this value in descending order. Top actions include 'Export', 'Import', and 'Add company' buttons. A search bar and a 'Show all' segment filter are visible above the table. The navigation bar at the top shows global icons for search, quick add (+), sync, notifications, and time tracking.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Preferences menu in Teamleader Focus showing invoice and subscription toggle settings.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A screenshot of the 'Preferences' section within Teamleader Focus settings. It contains five toggle switches. The first three are disabled (grey): 'Use PO numbers on your Invoices', 'Receive all invoice email in bcc', and 'Auto-create task when renewing subscriptions'. The last two are enabled (teal): 'Enable currency conversion for invoices' and 'Enable send by postal service'. The 'Enable send by postal service' option is highlighted with a red rectangular box and includes an information icon next to the text.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Add Invoice' form in Teamleader Focus highlighting the PO number field.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A partial view of the 'Add Invoice' creation screen. The form includes fields for Company entity (set to Elinedemoaccount), Customer (searchable dropdown), Attn., Prepaid billing (toggle switch), Layout (set to Default layout), Project, and Bank account (set to Standard). A red box highlights the 'PO number' field at the bottom right, indicating where users can enter a purchase order reference for the invoice.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The Meeting Types overview page in Teamleader Focus Lead capture Booster.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This screen shows the 'Meeting types' section under Scheduling in the Lead capture Booster. It displays a list of configured meeting templates. At the top, there are tabs for 'Personal' (selected) and 'Team', along with buttons for 'Bulk update settings', 'Booking links', and a teal 'Create new' button. A search bar allows filtering meeting types. Three meeting cards are visible: 'Online meeting' (36 minutes), '60 Minute online meeting with John Doe' (1 hour), and a disabled 'Duplicaat van Online meeting' (36 minutes). Each card includes a share icon, a three-dot menu, and the user's initials (JD). The left sidebar navigation shows links for Dashboard, Scheduling (Meetings, Meeting types, Calendar settings), Meeting rooms, Contact widgets, Contact forms, and Settings.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Illustrative banner with the text 'TEAMLEADER FOR' and icons representing CRM contact management.
The Info section of a pending invoice with the actions menu open.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A close-up of the 'Info' widget for an invoice in Teamleader Focus. The status is 'Invoice Pending' with a blue 'book' link next to it. A three-dot vertical ellipsis menu is open, showing three options: 'Print proforma invoice', 'Enter PO number', and 'Convert the currency'. The 'Enter PO number' option is currently highlighted. There is also a pencil icon for editing the info section. The 'Company entity' field is partially visible below.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Shortcodes for document templates in Teamleader Focus, highlighting sale and quotation variables.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A table titled 'THE DOCUMENT' showing a list of shortcodes used for document template customization. The first three rows are highlighted with a red box: 'SALE_TITLE' (Title), 'SALE_NUMBER' (Number), and 'SALE_TITLE_DETAILED' (Title+Number). Other listed shortcodes include 'QUOTATION_PO_NR' (PO number), 'DATE' (Date), and 'QUOTATION_TEXT' (Text). The bottom row, 'QUOTATION_NAME' (Quotation name), is also highlighted with a red box. These variables are used to dynamically pull information into quotations and invoices.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The initial setup form for creating a new quotation in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This screenshot shows the 'Create quotation' dialog box. It includes a prompt asking 'Would you rather base your quotation on an existing one?'. The form contains three fields: 'Quotation name' (required, pre-filled with 'Quotation 279-1'), 'Customer' (required, selected as 'EN CLIENT' with a search and clear icon), and 'Company entity' (a dropdown menu currently set to 'Red Cross'). This is the first step in the quotation creation workflow.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Integrations settings page in the Lead capture Booster showing active and inactive connections.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: The screenshot shows the 'Integrations' section within the Lead capture Booster settings. The left-hand navigation menu highlights 'Integrations' under the 'Settings' dropdown. The main content area is divided into two sections: 'Active integrations', which currently lists 'Teamleader', and 'Inactive integrations', which lists 'Stripe'. A text banner at the top explains that CRM integrations push data automatically when meetings are booked, while the Stripe integration allows for payments during the booking process. Other sidebar menu items include Dashboard, Scheduling, Meeting rooms, Contact widgets, Contact forms, Team settings, Customization, and Team members.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The top-right navigation icons in Teamleader Focus, including notifications and the time tracker.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A close-up of the utility icons in the top navigation bar. From left to right: a sync/refresh icon, a notification bell with a red badge showing '1', a 'Refer a friend' icon (two people), a help/support question mark icon, a gift icon for 'What's new' updates, a time tracking widget showing '00:00' with a stopwatch icon, and a blue circular user profile icon with the initial 'E'.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Yearly calendar view for 'Days off' in Teamleader Focus showing leave balances and requests.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: The screenshot displays the 'Days off' management interface for the year 2020. It features a full 12-month calendar where weekends are highlighted in grey. On the right side, a summary panel shows leave balances for different categories: 'Verlof ADV' (0h Recorded, 22h Remaining) and 'TESTKB' (0h Recorded, 50h Remaining). A warning icon indicates 'Open requests for time off' with a teal button labeled 'EVALUATE REQUEST'. Specific dates, such as October 5th and November 19th, are highlighted in light blue, representing leave entries. This screen is used for tracking employee absences, holidays, and processing time-off approvals.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Time tracking progress bars showing daily and weekly capacity percentages in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A close-up view of the time tracking and resource planning interface. It shows a grid with two columns for 'Wed 17' and 'Thu 18'. Each cell contains a ratio of tracked hours versus total capacity (e.g., '2h / 31h' and '8h / 8h'), a percentage completion (6%, 25%, 100%), and a teal progress bar visualizing the workload. This UI element is used to monitor billable hours, project progress, or team availability.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The Management dropdown menu in the Teamleader Focus navigation bar with Fiscal years selected.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A screenshot of the top navigation bar and a dropdown menu under 'Management'. The top menu bar includes options like File, Fiscal year, Bookkeeping, Invoicing, Bank, DMS, Graphic Analysis, Listings, Management, and Help. The 'Management' menu is open, showing options: Change password..., Users (grayed out), Files, File Manager (grayed out), Fiscal years (highlighted in purple), Journals, and VAT-codes. A toolbar with various icons for quick actions is visible below the main menu text.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: A form snippet for creating a project, showing the 'Project title' field and 'Template' dropdown.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This image shows a portion of the 'Add project' form in Teamleader Focus. It includes a mandatory text field for 'Project title' (marked with a red asterisk) and a 'Template' dropdown menu. The dropdown is currently open, with 'Don't use' highlighted as the active selection and 'ACCM template' visible as an alternative option. Below these fields, the label for 'Budget Indication' is partially visible.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Interface for converting a quotation to a project in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This screen shows the process of converting quotation line items into project elements. The header displays 'Convert quotation to project' with buttons for 'Cancel' and 'Create new project'. A line item 'PC11: Computer' is selected via a checkbox. Action buttons allow the user to 'Change to task' or 'Change to material' for the selected items. The table columns include Unit price (€ 1.000,00/item), Amount (1), and Subtotal excl. VAT (€ 1.000,00).

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: A dialog box to update budgets of project lines proportionally after a project budget increase.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This dialog window is titled 'Update budgets of project lines'. It appears when a project budget has been increased (in this example, by 10.00%). It asks the user: 'Do you want to proportionally increase budgets in project lines?'. There are two radio button options: 'Yes, increase proportionally' (which is currently selected) and 'No, keep current values'. At the bottom right, there are two buttons: a white 'Cancel' button and a teal 'Save' button.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Tutorial title slide for 'Registering timetracking' in Teamleader Focus.
CRM user permission settings showing the 'Limited access to CRM' toggle enabled.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A settings page for CRM user permissions in Teamleader Focus. It displays several toggle switches. 'Contacts' and 'Companies' are toggled ON (teal). Under 'Contacts', 'Mailing' is toggled OFF. Under 'Companies', 'Authorisation for time tracking' is toggled OFF. A teal box highlights the 'Limited access to CRM' setting, which is toggled ON. The description for this setting explains that users will only see companies where they are the account manager, as well as linked contacts, deals, quotations, or invoices for those specific companies.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Browser settings menu highlighting 'Cookies and Site Permissions' and 'Media autoplay' options.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A screenshot of a web browser's settings interface (likely Microsoft Edge). On the left sidebar, the 'Cookies and Site Permissions' category is highlighted with an orange border. On the right side, under the site permissions list, the 'Media autoplay' option is also highlighted with an orange border. Other visible menu items include Profiles, Privacy, Search and Services, Appearance, On Startup, New Tab Page, Share, Copy and Paste, Default Browser, and Downloads. This image is used to guide users through browser configuration steps that might affect Teamleader Focus performance or media playback.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Time tracking input field showing a start time of 9:00 AM and end time of 5:00 PM.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A close-up of a time tracking or calendar entry UI element in Teamleader Focus. It displays a start time of '9:00 AM' and an end time of '5:00 PM' separated by space and underlined by a grey bar. To the right, there is a square button containing a stopwatch icon with a plus sign, used for adding or logging time tracking entries.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Phase budgets table in Teamleader Focus showing spent vs provided amounts and budget forecasts.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description:
A detailed table under the 'Phase budgets' section of a project. It includes columns for Phase name, Billing method, Spent, Provided, a progress bar, and Forecast. There is a warning badge at the top right stating '1 Fixed price phase over budget'. 

Rows include:
- Ideation: Fixed price, € 4.000,00 spent of € 5.000,00 provided, with a teal progress bar and a green checkmark icon.
- Prototyping: Time & materials, € 10.000,00 spent of € 80.000,00 provided, with a yellow progress bar and a yellow exclamation warning icon.
- Visual design: Fixed price, € 20.000,00 spent of € 15.000,00 provided, showing a red progress bar indicating it is over budget, and a red exclamation error icon.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Step 2 of a setup process showing user availability toggles for America Ferrera and John Brook.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This image shows the second step of a configuration workflow titled 'Availability'. It displays a list of team members with toggle switches to enable or disable their availability. America Ferrera is shown with the toggle turned off (grey), while John Brook has the toggle turned on (teal). Each user entry has a dropdown arrow and a colored circular avatar with their initials. A teal 'Continue' button is located at the bottom right of the card.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Edit contact at company' dialog box in Teamleader Focus showing contact role details.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A modal window titled 'Edit contact at company' used to manage the relationship between a contact and a company. It contains several fields: 'Contact' (read-only: Steve Jobs), 'Function' (dropdown menu with 'UX Designer' selected and options for 'QA Advisor' and 'Other...'), 'Decision maker' (empty), 'Department' (dropdown: Unknown), and 'Subfunction' (dropdown: Back End). A teal 'Save' button is located in the bottom right corner. This interface is used to define a person's specific role and responsibilities within a linked company profile.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Customizing the customer confirmation email template for meetings in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: The interface for 'Customize email templates' specifically showing the 'Customer confirmation email' section. It includes a 'Subject' field with the value 'New meeting with {host_full_name}' and a 'Text' area containing markdown for the email body. The text uses variables like {guest_first_name} and {details}. Below the editor, there are buttons for 'Show preview' and 'Reset to default'. A live preview section at the bottom displays how the rendered markdown will look to the customer, including bold text and a numbered list of meeting tips.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Adding a line item to a quotation or invoice in Teamleader Focus
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A detailed view of a single line item entry in a document editor. The columns include: '#' (index 1), 'Description' (with a search dropdown showing '123456: Roofing' and 'Search all results..'), 'Price' (value 1), 'Quantity' (value 1), 'Subtotal' (value 1), and 'Type' (dropdown set to 'One-time cost'). Below the price field, there is a margin calculation field (value 0) and an '+ Add discount' button. A 'Calculate' button is visible under the Type column.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: A card for a disabled meeting type titled 'Duplicate of Online meeting' with a 30-minute duration.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A UI card representing a meeting template or scheduling link in Teamleader Focus. It features a 'Disabled' status badge in orange. The title is 'Duplicate of Online meeting'. Below the title, there is a clock icon with the duration '30 minutes'. In the top right corner, there are icons for sharing and a three-dot 'more' menu. In the bottom right, there is a circular user avatar with the initials 'JD'.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Internal cost and External price fields for setting hourly rates in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A close-up of two input fields used for financial settings. The first field is labeled 'Internal cost' with a value of '60.00' and a unit of '€/h'. The second field, highlighted with a red rectangular border, is labeled 'External price' with a value of '100.00' and a unit of '€/h'. This is typically used when setting up user rates or project billing rates to calculate profit margins.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The project roadmap view showing the 'Mark project as completed' action link.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A screenshot of the 'Roadmap' side panel for a project named 'Project E - NV Teamleader'. A red box highlights the action link 'Mark project as completed' located next to a checkmark icon. Below this, the 'MILESTONES' section is visible, showing a milestone labeled 'e' with a date of 05/02/2019 and a red flag icon.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Email preference management page for Teamleader Focus marketing communications.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A 'Manage your email preferences' screen titled 'Let's keep in touch'. It displays a user's email address and a language selection dropdown set to 'English'. There are three subscription options with checkboxes: 1. 'First informative email' (unchecked) for content like ebooks and webinars. 2. 'Newsletter' (checked) for monthly product updates and exclusive events. 3. 'Promotions' (checked) for special offers. A warning note mentions that unsubscribing from event invitations or all emails will prevent receiving ticket confirmations for events.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Accessing the Teamleader Focus add-in within the Outlook email composer menu.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A screenshot of the Microsoft Outlook email composition window showing how to access the Teamleader Focus integration. At the bottom of the email draft, the 'More options' (three dots) button is highlighted with a red box. This opens a vertical menu where the 'Teamleader' option is also highlighted with a red box. Other menu items visible include Editor, Save draft, Insert signature, Show From, Set importance, Switch to plain text, Check for accessibility issues, Set Permissions, Show message options, Poll, Viva Insights, My Templates, and Get Add-ins. The email composer shows standard fields like To, Cc, Subject, and formatting tools.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Create Audience' button in Teamleader Focus with a mouse cursor hovering over it.
The 'Mark as template' dialog box for creating project templates in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A modal window titled 'Mark as template' used to configure which project elements should be saved into a template. It contains three sections: 1. Project Layout (checkboxes for Header setup and Columns setup), 2. Project Information (checkboxes for Customers, Budgets, Time estimations, Assignees, and Date range), and 3. Work Breakdown (checkboxes for Groups, Meeting placeholders, Tasks, and Materials). Several options are checked by default, including Header setup, Customers, Budgets, Date range, Groups, Meeting placeholders, Tasks, and Materials. The dialog includes an information banner stating 'All users with access to projects can use project templates' and 'Cancel' and 'Save' buttons at the bottom right.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: A table view in Teamleader Focus showing 'Due date' and 'Scheduling' status for tasks or projects.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A two-column list view. The 'Due date' column contains clickable blue dates. The 'Scheduling' column displays status indicators: solid green squares indicate items scheduled on time, while light green squares followed by red numbers (e.g., 1, 20, 29, 36, 57) indicate the number of days an item is overdue or delayed relative to its schedule.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Main menu of the Teamleader Focus mobile app showing core features and user profile.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: The main menu screen of the Teamleader Focus mobile application. It features a vertical list of modules: Tasks, Time tracking, Deals, Quotations, Invoices, and Work orders. Below the list is a user profile section for 'Eline' with an email address. At the bottom, there is a prompt 'Miss the old look?' with a button labeled 'Switch to classic view'. The bottom navigation bar shows icons for Dashboard, Calendar, Search, and the active Menu tab.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: An example of a Teamleader Focus public contact form integrated on a website.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A screenshot showing a 'Contact Form 1' created in Teamleader Focus. The form is displayed on a webpage next to a lifestyle image. It includes several input fields: 'First name' (required), 'Last name' (required), 'Email' (required), a 'gender' radio button selection (Female, Male, Non-binary, Prefer not to say), 'Company name' (required), and a multi-field address section for 'Country' (dropdown), 'Street', 'Nr', 'Zip Code', and 'City'. At the bottom, there is a teal 'Submit form' button. This demonstrates how lead capture forms can be styled and used to gather customer data directly into the CRM.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The Excel Export Template configuration screen in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This interface allows users to create a custom Excel export template. It features a 'Template name' input field at the top. Below, there are two side-by-side selection boxes: 'Available columns' on the left and 'Selected columns' on the right. Users can move fields between these lists using arrow buttons (right and left arrows). The 'Selected columns' box currently shows 'Last name + First name' and 'Companies' highlighted with a red box. On the far right, there are up and down arrow buttons to reorder the selected columns. The bottom navigation includes a 'GO BACK' button and a 'SAVE' button with a checkmark icon. Available columns listed include Active, Area level two, BIC - SWIFT, Birthday, Bookkeeping customer id, and various delivery address fields.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The Excel Export Template configuration screen in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This interface allows users to create a custom export template for Excel. It features a 'Template name' text input field. Below, there are two side-by-side selection boxes: 'Available columns' on the left and 'Selected columns' on the right. Users can move fields between boxes using arrow buttons (right and left). The 'Available columns' list includes options like APE Code, Account manager, Active, BIC - SWIFT, Background information, City, Country, Date added, and various Delivery address fields. On the far right, there are up and down arrow buttons to reorder selected columns. The bottom navigation includes a 'GO BACK' button and a teal 'SAVE' button with a checkmark icon.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Dropdown menu for selecting a meeting location in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A close-up of the 'Location' field in a form, showing a dropdown menu with several options. The current selection is 'Common locations' (highlighted in blue). Other available options in the list include: 'Location of a company...', 'Location of a contact...', 'Location for single use', and 'Virtual meeting'. This is typically used when scheduling calendar events or meetings.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Bulk actions toolbar for invoices with multiple statuses selected in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A screenshot of the invoice list view showing bulk action options. At the top, a teal checkbox indicates '10 selected'. Action buttons include 'Book 2', 'Send 9', 'Mark 7 as paid' (white buttons), and a red 'Delete 2' button. A yellow warning banner states: 'You selected invoices with multiple statuses. Bulk changes will only be applied to invoices with the same status.' Below the banner, three rows of invoices are shown with teal checkboxes selected, displaying statuses like 'Pending' and invoice numbers like '2019 / 95', along with client names, amounts in Euro, and dates.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The actions menu for a quotation in a Teamleader Focus deal, highlighting the delete option.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A screenshot of the 'Follow up on your open deal' page in Teamleader Focus. The 'Quotations' tab is active, showing 'Quotation 279' with an amount of €1.000,00 and a status of 'Sent'. A vertical three-dot menu icon is highlighted with a teal box, opening a dropdown menu. The dropdown contains options: Mark as sent, Mark as accepted, Mark as refused, Rename, Copy, Go to detail page, Save quotation as template, Send via email, Remove from CloudSign, Copy link, Preview on CloudSign, and a highlighted 'Delete' button at the bottom. Below the quotation list, there are sections for 'Scheduled actions' (with buttons for Meeting, Call, and Task), 'Files', and 'Activities'.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The Expenses module overview showing documents to review and a list of approved incoming invoices.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: The Expenses dashboard in Teamleader Focus. At the top, a 'To review (2)' section displays two uploaded documents as cards: one marked 'New' and one 'Scanned'. Each card has a 'Review' link. Action buttons include 'Upload', 'Scan', and 'Delete'. A notification indicates '25 free scans remaining'. Below, a searchable list table shows processed expenses with columns for Document number, Title, Type (Incoming invoice), Supplier (e.g., Carl Doe), Date, Due date, Total excl. VAT, Total incl. VAT, and Review status (showing 'Approved' badges).

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Statistics widget for Subscriptions in Teamleader Focus showing counts and turnover values.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A sidebar or dashboard widget titled 'STATISTICS' with a line graph icon. It displays four key metrics for recurring invoices/subscriptions: 'Subscriptions' (count: 11), 'Yearly' turnover (€ 3.172,00), 'Turnover last year' (€ 7.057,44 with a blue badge indicating 153 items), and 'Next month' projected turnover (€ 264,00 with a blue badge indicating 10 items).

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Preview of a customizable Contact form in Teamleader Focus with fields for name and email.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A preview window showing a 'Contact form' setup. The form includes three required text input fields: 'First name', 'Last name', and 'Email', each marked with a red asterisk. Below the fields is a teal 'Submit form' button. The Teamleader logo is displayed at the top. At the bottom of the interface, there are two secondary action buttons: 'Change branding' on the left and 'Save the Contact form' with a floppy disk icon on the right. This interface is used for lead capture and contact management configuration.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Detailed view of a fiscal year configuration in the bookkeeping settings.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This screenshot shows the 'Fiscal years' detail view within the bookkeeping module. It displays configuration fields for a specific fiscal year (2015). Key fields include: 'Name' (multilingual: English and Dutch), 'Start date' (01/01/2015), 'End date' (31/12/2015), 'Periods' (set to Monthly), and 'Type of the declarant' (Monthly based). A table lists individual periods (e.g., 201501 to 201504) with their respective start and end dates. Additional settings at the bottom include 'Depreciation pro rata temporis' (set to No), 'Depreciation on the entire booking year' (unchecked), and 'Closed' status (set to No). The top toolbar contains icons for adding, editing, saving, and deleting records, as well as navigation arrows to move between the 5 existing records.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Dropdown menu showing available fields for related companies in document templates.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A snippet of a selection menu titled 'Fields for related companies' used for template customization in Teamleader Focus. It lists available shortcodes or placeholders to pull data from linked records. The options visible are 'Company 1: Name', 'Company 1: Name + Type of business' (highlighted in blue), and 'Company 1: VAT number'. This is typically used when setting up document templates for invoices, quotations, or emails to dynamically insert information from related company profiles.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Project invoicing screen showing billable tasks and materials grouped for invoice creation.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This interface displays the 'Invoices' tab within a project. It features a list of billable items organized into groups (Group 1, Group 2, Group 3). Each row includes a checkbox for selection, the item title (tasks or materials), billing method (e.g., User rate, Unit price), billable amount, subtotal, and a 'Billable' status badge. At the top right, a summary shows the total selected amount (€ 1.200,00) alongside 'Cancel' and 'Create invoice' buttons.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Safari browser permission dialog asking to allow cloud.teamleader.eu to share the screen.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A system-level permission dialog from the Safari browser. The header text asks: 'Allow "cloud.teamleader.eu" to share your screen?'. Below this, a subtext explains: 'You can share your entire screen or a window. While screen sharing, notifications will not be shown to users.' The dialog features three primary action buttons: 'Allow to Share Window', 'Allow to Share Screen', and 'Don't Allow'. This is typically encountered when starting a screen-sharing session within Teamleader Focus on macOS.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Microsoft Excel 'Find & Select' menu with the 'Replace' option highlighted.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A screenshot showing a step in data preparation for Teamleader Focus. In the Microsoft Excel ribbon, the 'Find & Select' button (magnifying glass icon) is highlighted with a red border. The dropdown menu is open, and the 'Replace...' option is also highlighted with a red border. This tool is commonly used to clean up data before importing it into the CRM, such as removing dots from VAT numbers or formatting phone numbers.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The Contact widgets overview page in the Teamleader Focus Customer Meeting add-on.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: The screenshot shows the 'Contact widgets' management screen. A sidebar navigation menu on the left includes Dashboard, Meetings, Scheduling, Contact widgets (active), Settings, Help, and Test audio/video. The main area displays a 'Create a widget' button at the top right. Below, a widget named 'Meet John Doe' is shown with options to delete or edit. It features a preview of the 'Meet John Doe' button and the text 'John Doe's booking page'. A 'USE CODE' section provides a script snippet for website integration, with action buttons to 'Send to webmaster' and 'Copy to clipboard'. A small banner at the bottom left encourages users to install the browser extension.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Pagination controls showing page 1 selected, page 2 available, and a next arrow.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A standard pagination component from the Teamleader Focus interface. It features a disabled left arrow, a highlighted '1' in a light gray box indicating the current page, a clickable blue '2' for the next page, and a blue right arrow to navigate forward. This is typically found at the bottom of list views or tables.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Edit currency' dialog box in Teamleader Focus for setting exchange rates.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A modal window titled 'Edit currency' used to manage currency settings. It features a 'Currency' dropdown menu currently set to 'USD - US Dollar'. Below is an 'Exchange rate' input field containing the value '0.9244', with a refresh icon on the right side being hovered over by a mouse cursor. A helper text below the input field confirms the conversion rate: '1 USD = 0.9244 EUR'. The dialog includes a close (X) button in the top right corner.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Interface for sharing a customised report with colleagues in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A header for a 'Customised report' featuring a heart icon for favorites. On the right, there is a user avatar stack highlighted with a teal box, showing initials 'S', 'L', and a '+1' indicator representing shared users. Next to the avatars is a 'Share with colleagues' button with a dropdown arrow, used for managing report permissions and visibility among team members.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The Activities timeline in Teamleader Focus showing a stock update log.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A screenshot of the 'Activities' section within a product or project view. At the top right, there is an 'Email tracking' button. Below the header, there is a '+ Add note' link. A filter dropdown is set to 'Show all'. The timeline shows a specific activity entry: 'Eline increased the stock of the product with 60 (new stock: 500).' with a timestamp of '< 1 minute ago'. This interface is used to track history, changes, and manual notes related to a specific item in the CRM.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Selecting Teamleader as the app in a Zapier automation workflow step.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This screenshot shows the second step of setting up an automation (likely in Zapier) titled '2. Do this ...'. Under the 'Choose App & Event' section, there is a search bar with the text 'Teamleader' entered. Below the search bar, the Teamleader app icon and name are displayed as the selected or filtered result, allowing the user to connect Teamleader Focus to an external automation tool.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Quotation action menu in Teamleader Focus with 'Make available on CloudSign' highlighted.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A close-up of the quotation management interface. It shows two main buttons: 'Convert to invoice' and 'Send quotation'. The 'Send quotation' button has a dropdown menu open, showing several options: 'Mark as sent', 'Mark as accepted', 'Mark as refused', 'Make available on CloudSign' (highlighted with a teal border), 'Preview on CloudSign' (greyed out), 'Copy link' (greyed out), 'Download PDF', and 'Print'. This menu allows users to manage the status and distribution of a quotation.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: User permission settings for the Products module in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A settings interface under the 'PRODUCTS' header showing three toggle switches for user permissions. 1. 'Products': Enabled (teal toggle), allowing the user to manage goods, services, prices, and units. 2. 'Product editing': Disabled (grey toggle), which restricts the user to viewing products and adding them to documents without the ability to add, edit, or delete the product records themselves. 3. 'Unit cost visible': Disabled (grey toggle), which hides the unit cost of products used for margin or markup calculations on quotations.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Add time tracking' modal window in Teamleader Focus for logging work hours.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This dialog box allows users to log time spent on tasks. It includes a 'DETAILS' section with dropdown menus for 'Customer', 'Project', 'Task', and 'Work type'. There are checkboxes for 'Billable' and 'Mark task as done', plus a multi-line 'Description' text area. The 'DURATION' section, highlighted with a teal border, contains a 'Date' picker (set to 07/05/2024) and 'Duration' fields for hours (03) and minutes (00). At the bottom, there is a checkbox for 'Add extra costs in next step' and two buttons: 'Cancel' and 'Add time tracking'.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Interface for the Whiteboard feature in Teamleader Focus meeting tool

The bottom control bar features meeting actions: Cam off, Mic off, Leave, Settings, Recordings, Invite, Chat, and Private notes.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Project header in Teamleader Focus showing owners, assignees, and customer details.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Preview of a Teamleader Focus contact form with custom branding and fields.

VAT)' (off). At the bottom, there is an '+ Add formula' button. The 'Test formula' option and the gear icon are highlighted with teal boxes to indicate user interaction or focus.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Plus' (+) quick-action menu in Teamleader Focus for creating new items.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Header for the Contact widgets section with a 'Create a widget' button

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Dialog box to add multiple time trackings from planning for a specific user and date range.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Configuration form for accounting export settings including VAT, journals, and ledger accounts.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description:
This settings screen shows the configuration for an accounting export in Teamleader Focus. It includes options for: 
- VAT: Radio buttons to select calculation 'On total' (selected) or 'On lines'.
- Customers: A checkbox for 'Export customers too'.
- Customer payment conditions: A mapping table with keys '0d', '10d', and '30d' to define specific values.
- Journal fields: Input fields for 'Invoice journal' and 'Credit note journal'.
- Accounting details: Fields for 'Book year', 'Period' (set to -1), 'Customer ledger account' (set to 400000), 'Sales ledger account' (set to 700000), and 'VAT ledger account'.

Each method has a 'Pricing & info' link and a toggle switch, all of which are currently in the 'off' position. The left sidebar shows navigation for Settings, including Profiles, Organisation, Team, Bank accounts, and Payouts.

The editor toolbar includes buttons for Broncode (source code), bold, italic, underline, lists, alignment, links, images, and tables. At the bottom, under 'ITEMS ON THE QUOTATION', there are radio buttons to choose between 'Including VAT' and 'Excluding VAT', with 'Excluding VAT' currently selected.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Invoice items' section in Teamleader Focus showing line items with an advance invoice deduction.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This screenshot shows the 'INVOICE ITEMS' section of an invoice creation or edit form. At the top right, 'Excluding VAT' is selected. The table contains two line items. Line 1 has the description 'TEST', price '10000', quantity '1', subtotal '10000', VAT rate 'Sales 21% VAT', and Account 'No accounts'. Below this, there is a reference field for 'Advance invoice 2021 / 85' with a delete icon. Line 2 shows the deduction of the advance with description 'Advance', price '-5000', quantity '1', subtotal '-5000', VAT rate 'Sales 21% VAT', and Account 'No accounts'. Each row includes icons for reordering, adding a subtitle, and deleting the item.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Financial widget showing a project loss calculation with billable amount and costs.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A small UI widget from Teamleader Focus displaying project profitability. The header shows 'Loss (-11467%)' with a help icon and a 'Details' link. The main figure is a negative amount in red: '- € 2.866,67'. Below this, a breakdown shows a 'Billable amount' of € 25,00 and 'Costs' of - € 2.891,67. This image is useful for explaining how project margins and losses are calculated and displayed within the project management or financial reporting features.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Action buttons for time tracking: Export, Add multiple time trackings, and Add time tracking.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A row of three action buttons used for managing time tracking in Teamleader Focus. From left to right: a white 'Export' button, a white dropdown button labeled 'Add multiple time trackings', and a primary teal button labeled 'Add time tracking'. These buttons are typically found at the top of a time tracking list or overview page.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Excel VLOOKUP (VERT.ZOEKEN) formula used to link contact and company data for import.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A screenshot of an Excel spreadsheet demonstrating how to use the VLOOKUP function (shown as VERT.ZOEKEN in Dutch) to prepare data for a Teamleader Focus import. The formula '=VERT.ZOEKEN($B2;Contacts!A1:F2243' is being entered into a cell under the header 'Company Street+Number'. The spreadsheet contains tabs for 'Contacts' and 'Companies', suggesting a workflow for merging related data sets before importing them into the CRM. This is a common step when users need to link contacts to company addresses using a shared identifier like an email address.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Audio, video, and meeting room settings dialog in Teamleader Focus
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A settings modal divided into two columns. The left column, 'Audio / video', contains dropdowns for 'Choose microphone' (No microphone active), 'Choose speaker' (Unknown speaker) with a 'Test your speaker' button, 'Choose camera' (No camera active), and 'Choose background mode' (No background). It also includes toggles for 'Disable incoming video', 'HD Video Quality', and 'Strict firewall mode'. The right column, 'Meeting room', shows 'Meeting room size' (0 B) and a 'Private notes' toggle (enabled). At the bottom right, there are three buttons: 'Save as template' (highlighted with a red box), 'Invite people', and 'Reset meeting room' in red text.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Copy link' button next to the Filters header in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A close-up view of the 'Filters' section header. Next to the word 'Filters' is a link icon button being hovered over by a mouse cursor. This action triggers a tooltip or button labeled 'Copy link'. Below the header, the labels 'Start date' and 'From' are partially visible, indicating this is part of a filtering sidebar or menu. This feature allows users to share specific filtered views with colleagues by copying the URL.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Edit segment' dialog in Teamleader Focus showing general info, rules, and Mailchimp export.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This dialog allows users to configure a contact segment. Under 'GENERAL INFORMATION', the segment is named 'Email address' and the toggle 'Only I can see this segment' is set to 'YES'. There is an 'Advanced options' link. Under 'SEGMENT RULES', the logic is set to 'All rules must apply'. 'Rule 1' is configured as 'Email address' 'Is filled out'. At the bottom, a toggle for 'Export segment to Mailchimp' is set to 'YES' (highlighted with a red circle). The dialog includes a '+' button to add rules, a trash icon to delete rules, and a 'SAVE' button to confirm changes.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Confirmation message showing a completed data import with options to dismiss or undo.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A notification dialog in Teamleader Focus confirming a successful data import. It displays the timestamp of completion (19/05/2017 21:11), the 'Number of Contacts inserted: 4', and the 'Number of related companies inserted: 3'. Two teal action buttons are available: 'OK, DISMISS' with a checkmark icon and 'UNDO IMPORT' with an 'X' icon. This is useful for users needing to verify import results or revert a bulk contact upload.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Configuration screen for creating a custom website contact widget button in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: The 'Contact widget' setup screen allows users to 'Create a button for your website'. The 'Design your button' section includes fields for Button color (#00b2b2), Button text color (#ffffff), and Button text ('Book a meeting'). There is a toggle for an Icon and an 'Upload icon...' button. A real-time 'PREVIEW' box shows the teal button with a calendar icon. Under 'Set button behaviour', the option 'Open in a pop-up in the same browser tab' is selected. In 'Link contact type', 'Meeting type' is selected over 'Contact form', with a dropdown menu below showing a specific meeting selection: '60 minute online meeting with John Doe'. A 'Save' button is located at the bottom right.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The subscriptions overview table in Teamleader Focus with the Actions dropdown menu open.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A view of the subscriptions list showing a table with columns for Title (test abo donatello), Term (Monthly), Renewal date (17-09-2025), Inactive (No), and Start date (17-03-2025). At the top right, there are buttons for 'Export' and 'Add subscription'. A segment filter is set to 'active (±1)'. The 'Actions' dropdown menu is expanded, showing options to 'Create calls', 'Create tasks', and 'Update product prices'. This interface is used for managing recurring billing and subscription-based services.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Time tracking table showing user Eline's work hours, hourly rate, and invoiceable status.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A table view of time tracking entries in Teamleader Focus. The columns include User, Invoiceable, Hourly rate, Total, Duration, and Description. A specific entry for the date 17/04/2020 shows user 'Eline' with an invoiceable status of 'Yes', an hourly rate of '€ 150', a total of '€ 300,00', a duration of '2h', and the description 'Working hours: Workorder'. The date header also displays a total daily duration of '2h08' for that specific day.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Action buttons for approving, refusing, or adding payments to a document in Teamleader Focus.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A close-up of the action menu for managing document statuses. It shows a grayed-out 'Send to bookkeeper' button and a primary teal 'Mark as approved' button with a dropdown menu. The dropdown menu contains three options: 'Mark as refused', 'Mark as pending' (which is grayed out/disabled), and 'Add payment'. This interface is typically used for managing the lifecycle of invoices or purchase orders.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Error message in Teamleader Focus meeting room: 'Your system does not allow sharing your screen.'
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A screenshot of the Teamleader Focus video conferencing interface (meeting room). A notification banner in the top right corner displays the error message 'Your system does not allow sharing your screen. Get help'. The main interface shows the Teamleader logo in the center. The bottom toolbar includes buttons for 'Cam off', 'Mic off', 'Leave', 'Settings', 'Recordings', 'Invite', 'Raise hand', 'Chat', and 'Private notes'. On the right side, there are options for 'Upload file...', 'Share screen', and 'Cobrowse'. This image is useful for troubleshooting screen sharing permissions within the meeting feature.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Overview of the Projects module in Teamleader Focus showing a list of active projects.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: The Projects overview screen displays a table with columns for project number (Nr), Name, Customer, Provided budget, Invoiced, Profit, Paid, End date, and Phase. A search bar and a status filter (set to 'Active') are located above the list. Action buttons include 'Export' and 'Add project'. The table shows various projects with financial data, including positive profit margins highlighted in green. Navigation tabs at the top include Overview, Planning, and People. A toggle at the top left allows users to 'Preview the new project module'. The sidebar menu on the left shows navigation to other modules like Contacts, Deals, and Invoices.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Profitability details view in Teamleader Focus showing billable amount, costs, and margin per phase.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A detailed breakdown of project profitability. The top header displays total 'BILLABLE AMOUNT' (€ 6.200,00), 'COSTS' (€ 1.970,00), and 'MARGIN' (+ € 4.230,00). A 'Group by' dropdown is set to 'Participant'. The view shows three expandable phases: Phase 1, Phase 2, and Phase 3. Phase 1 is expanded to show a participant named 'Eline' with a time entry of 4h00 on 02/09/2019, contributing € 800,00 to the billable amount with € 80,00 in costs. Each phase row summarizes its specific billable amount, costs, and margin.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: A published Teamleader Focus web2lead contact form embedded on a website.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A public-facing contact form titled 'Contact Form 1' created with Teamleader Focus. The form includes fields for First name (required), Last name (required), Email (required), and a 'gender' radio button selection (Female, Male, Non-binary, Prefer not to say). It also features a 'Company name' field (required) and a multi-field address section labeled 'What's your company's address?' containing dropdowns and text inputs for Country, Street, Nr, Zip Code, and City. A teal 'Submit form' button is located at the bottom. The Teamleader logo is visible above the form header.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Field mapping screen for importing data into Teamleader Focus
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This image shows the 'Import' interface where users match columns from an uploaded file to Teamleader Focus fields. A green success banner at the top states '5 records were found. Please match the fields below.' The interface displays three mapping sections: 1) 'NAME' column (containing values like French fries, Bicky Burger) mapped to the 'Name' field via a 'Belongs to' dropdown. 2) 'ID' column (containing numeric values) mapped to the 'ID' field. 3) 'PRICE' column (containing values like 10, 20,22) mapped to the 'Default price' field. This is a crucial step in the CSV or Excel import workflow for products or contacts.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Calendar navigation bar in Teamleader Focus showing week view and date selection.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: The screenshot displays the top navigation bar of the Teamleader Focus calendar. It shows 'Week 33: 10 - 16 August'. Navigation controls include left/right arrows, and view toggle buttons for 'Day', 'Week' (currently selected), 'Month', and 'Team'. A dropdown menu on the right is set to 'Sophie Decloux'. Below the main navigation, a horizontal list of days for the week is shown (Mon 10/8 through Sun 16/8), with a red box highlighting the first four days (Monday to Thursday). This interface is used for scheduling appointments, managing tasks, and viewing team availability.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Items on the quotation' table in Teamleader Focus for adding products and services.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This interface shows the line items section of a quotation. At the top right, there are radio buttons to toggle between 'Including VAT' and 'Excluding VAT' (currently selected). The table includes columns for: # (line number), Description (with a text field and a dropdown currently set to 'None'), Price, Quantity, Subtotal, Type (dropdown set to 'One-time cost'), and VAT rate (dropdown set to 'Sales 21% VAT'). Three articles are listed with a price and quantity of 1. Action icons on the right of each row include reorder (hamburger), add text (T), and delete (trash can). The bottom right displays the calculation summary: Total excl. VAT (€3.00), VAT 21% (€0.63), and Total incl. VAT (€3.63).

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Adding line items to a quotation in Teamleader Focus with unit price, cost, and margin details.

The line item includes: Description ('PC11: Computer'), Unit price ('1000'), Quantity ('1'), Subtotal ('1000'), Type ('One-time cost'), and VAT rate ('Sales 21% VAT'). Below the unit price, there are fields for 'Unit cost' ('750') and 'Margin' ('250'). There is a button to 'Calculate markup' and an '+ Add discount' button. Action icons on the right include reorder, text formatting, and delete (trash can).

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Zapier integration setup for mapping a Google Spreadsheet to Teamleader Focus.

Below the fields, there is a note stating that column headers and at least one entry are required to view available fields, along with a 'Refresh Fields' button. The top of the image shows a collapsed 'Choose Account' section with a green checkmark, indicating that step is complete.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Dropdown menu showing the option to 'Remove from CloudSign' for a document in Teamleader Focus.

At the bottom of the menu, there is a 'Delete' option in red text. In the background, a status badge labeled 'Sent' and a vertical ellipsis icon are visible, indicating this menu is accessed from a list or detail view of a sent document.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The synchronisation settings for the Octopus accounting integration in Teamleader Focus.

The toggle is currently enabled (teal color) for the setting 'Synchronise outgoing and incoming invoices and credit notes automatically'. A back link to 'Company information overview' is visible at the top left.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The Invoices overview table in Teamleader Focus showing a list of generated invoices.

The 'Booking number' column is currently sorted in ascending order as indicated by the arrow icon.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Info dialog in Sage BOB 50 showing version, installation folder, and data folder paths.

It displays technical details required for integration setup: the version (4.0), the installation folder (c:\b50adsdemo), and the data folder (c:\b50adsdemo\data\if). These specific paths are highlighted with red boxes and labeled 'Installatiefolder' and 'Datafolder'. The dialog also lists the license name 'SAGE DEMO' and an expiry date. Buttons for 'Details' and 'OK' are visible at the bottom of the window.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Preferences settings for automatic expense scanning and Teamleader Wallet usage.
