The second toggle is labeled 'Use Teamleader Wallet when free scans are used up' and is also in the off position. Both options feature a small information icon next to the text for additional context.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Plan task' pop-up window in the Teamleader Focus Planning module.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A dialog box titled 'Plan task' is shown over the Planning overview. It specifies a task for 'Charlotte_test' on 'Mar 20th 2017'. The dialog includes a time input field set to '08:00', an unchecked checkbox for 'Plan on one day', and a message stating 'This task will have 12h to be planned. This day will be fully booked'. A teal 'SAVE' button is located at the bottom right. In the background, the Planning board shows a task named 'Website Design' for 'Test AG'.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Teamleader Focus browser extension sidebar showing contact details and action buttons.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A screenshot of the Teamleader Focus browser extension (Gmail/Outlook integration) for a contact named 'Nederlands'. The UI includes a profile avatar with the letter 'N', the contact's email address, and a link to 'Edit in Teamleader Focus'. Three primary teal action buttons are visible: 'Track email', 'Follow-up task', and 'Convert to ticket'. The Teamleader logo is displayed in the bottom right corner.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Mapping a Data ID to the Company id field in a Zapier or automation integration
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This screenshot shows a configuration step in an automation tool (likely Zapier) for Teamleader Focus. A red arrow indicates that the 'Data ID' value (cbab88e7-41fa-02f6-a578-0624517cd822) from a previous step should be mapped into the 'Company id (required)' input field. The interface displays several fields including First Name, Id, Type, Data ID, and Data Type. A green pill label 'Step 2' is shown inside the Company id field, indicating a dynamic value is being used from a previous workflow step.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Navigation bar with icons for statistics, trends, time tracking, values, and public view.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A horizontal tab switcher or navigation bar containing five icons. From left to right: a bar chart icon, a line graph icon, a clock icon, a '123' numerical icon, and a globe icon. The globe icon is currently selected, indicated by a dark blue background. This UI element is used to switch between different data views or reporting modes within Teamleader Focus, often found in the Statistics or Insights modules.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: A list of incoming invoices in Teamleader Focus showing the document origin column.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A table view of incoming documents and invoices. The table includes columns for Document number, Title, Type, Supplier, Origin, Date, and Due date. Teal boxes highlight specific data: one box highlights the 'Type' column showing 'Incoming invoice' for several entries, and another highlights the 'Origin' column, showing values like 'Manual' and 'Peppol'. This indicates how the document was received or created in the system. The interface includes a search bar, a filter button, and pagination options at the bottom.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Project or task details panel showing owners, assignees, customers, and linked deals.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A detail view for a record titled 'Offerte' (number 290). It displays several fields: 'Owners' assigned to 'Eline (You)', 'Assignees' marked as 'Unassigned', 'Customers' linked to 'NV Teamleader', and a 'Deals' multi-select dropdown field containing the tag 'test'. There is also a 'Quotations' link labeled 'Offerte' and a '+ Time budget' action button. This interface is used for managing project or task associations within Teamleader Focus.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Onboarding service options in Teamleader Focus including self-service and paid assistance packages.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A screen showing different onboarding service tiers for Teamleader Focus. The 'Onboarding' section lists three main options: 'Do it yourself' (Free, marked as Included), 'Do it with help' (€750, with a 'Buy now' button), and 'Done for you' (€1,250, with a 'Buy now' button). Each option includes a brief description and a clickable 'How does this work?' link. Below this is an 'Other help options' section featuring a '1-hour session' for €175 with a 'Buy now' button. Prices are shown both excluding and including 21% VAT.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Follow up on your won deal' section in Teamleader Focus showing a list of open quotations.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A detailed view of the 'Follow up on your won deal' interface. It features a tabbed navigation bar with options for Quotations, Project, Invoices, Orders, Order confirmations, and Delivery notes. The 'Quotations' tab is active, displaying a list under the 'OPEN (4)' section. The table columns include Title (e.g., Quotation 254), Amount, CloudSign activity (showing 'View activity Online'), and Status (all marked as 'Unsent'). Each row has edit (pencil) and more (three dots) icons. A message states 'Only one quotation can be signed or marked as accepted.' At the bottom right, there is a 'Send quotations' button. A plus (+) icon is located in the top right corner for adding new items.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: A list of open quotations in Teamleader Focus with a 'Send quotations' button highlighted.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This screenshot shows a table of quotations within a deal or project. The table is divided into 'ACCEPTED' and 'OPEN (4)' sections. Under the 'OPEN' section, four quotations are listed (Quotation 254, 254-1, 254-2, 254-3) with their respective amounts, CloudSign activity (Online or Viewed), and status (Unsent). Each row has an edit icon and a three-dot menu. A red box highlights the 'Send quotations' button at the bottom right, indicating the action to send multiple quotes to a client for review or signing via CloudSign.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: Form fields for Sector and Tags in Teamleader Focus with a tag removal action highlighted.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A close-up of two form fields. The 'Sector' field is a dropdown with the placeholder text 'Select...'. The 'Tags' field contains a selected tag labeled 'client'. A red box highlights the 'x' button next to the 'client' tag, demonstrating how to remove a tag from a contact or company record. The Tags field also features a general clear icon (x in a circle) and a dropdown arrow on the right side.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Create quotation' dialog box in Teamleader Focus with fields for name, customer, and currency.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This screenshot shows the initial setup form for creating a new quotation. At the top, there is a prompt 'Would you rather base your quotation on an existing one?' with a button labeled 'Use existing quotation'. The form includes four main fields: 'Quotation name' (pre-filled with 'Copy of Preventivo 283'), 'Currency' (dropdown set to 'EUR - Euro'), 'Customer' (searchable input field), and 'Deal' (dropdown selector). Mandatory fields are marked with a red asterisk. There is a close 'X' icon in the top right corner.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The control bar for a video meeting in Teamleader Focus with camera, mic, and recording options.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: A horizontal toolbar containing meeting controls. From left to right: an orange 'Cam off' button with a crossed-out camera icon, an orange 'Mic off' button with a crossed-out microphone icon, a 'Leave' button with a red phone hang-up icon, a vertical separator, a 'Settings' button with a gear icon, a 'Recordings' button with a red circle icon, and an 'Invite' button with a padlock icon.

https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.summary: The 'Add expense' interface showing a side-by-side view of a scanned invoice and data entry fields.
https://support.focus.teamleader.eu/hc/a.description: This screen allows users to record an expense by viewing a digital document (left) while filling out details (right). The form includes sections for 'DOCUMENT DETAILS' such as document type, name, supplier, number, and dates, as well as 'FINANCIAL DETAILS' for total amounts excluding and including VAT. A 'Scanned' badge indicates the document was processed, and action buttons for 'Save', 'Cancel', and 'Delete' are located at the top right.
